milestones.description: By 2030, eradicate extreme poverty for all people everywhere, currently measured as people living on less than $1.25 a day
By 2030, reduce at least by half the proportion of men, women and children of all ages living in poverty in all its dimensions according to national definitions
Implement nationally appropriate social protection systems and measures for all, including floors, and by 2030 achieve substantial coverage of the poor and the vulnerable

By 2030, ensure that all men and women, in particular the poor and the vulnerable, have equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to basic services, ownership and control over land and other forms of property, inheritance, natural resources, appropriate new technology and financial services, including microfinance

By 2030, build the resilience of the poor and those in vulnerable situations and reduce their exposure and vulnerability to climate-related extreme events and other economic, social and environmental shocks and disasters

Ensure significant mobilization of resources from a variety of sources, including through enhanced development cooperation, in order to provide adequate and predictable means for developing countries, in particular least developed countries, to implement programmes and policies to end poverty in all its dimensions

Create sound policy frameworks at the national, regional and international levels, based on pro-poor and gender-sensitive development strategies, to support accelerated investment in poverty eradication actions

results.descriptionHTML:
The BlackBerry® Camera is optimized for the Schneider-Kreuznach® certified camera on PRIV. Take professional-quality photos with minimal effort! Creativity comes naturally when taking photos is this simple, and when your results are this beautiful.

The BlackBerry Camera includes professional settings that you can apply as you frame the scene, including live filter effects and exposure control. Features like Phase Detection Auto Focus, OIS, and a dual-color flash help the camera focus instantly, deliver feedback to you quickly, and capture crisp, vibrant photos, even in low light

Key Features:
• Phase Detection Auto focus – Lightning-fast autofocus technology, commonly found in professional cameras, ensures the moment is always crystal clear
• Panorama – Capture everything around you in stunning detail with massive, 140 megapixel, 360 degree panoramic photos
• 4k video – See every detail in your videos with incredible definition
• Panorama selfie – Include more of your surroundings and fit all of your friends in the photo with you
• Live filters – Express your artistic side by using filters that you can see before you even take the photo
• 60 fps video recording – Video with smooth and lifelike motion for moving subjects
results.title: BlackBerry Camera
results.summary: Capture crisp, professional-quality photos optimized for your BlackBerry device
recentChanges: • Touch and hold to lock focus and exposure

comments: Terrible Last update makes images look super clear when taking them but blurry when viewing. Also, when holding focus to lock, it freezes and doesn't allow you to take a picture. Lastly, at times, the pictures comes out almost all white like it was taken with a light shining on the lens.

Camera Problems on Priv I don't know if its software or even a hardware issue, but I struggle to get an image to stabilize before shooting a photo. I have had phone for 6 months , dropped it a couple times, nothing crazy. But getting a clear,  image  to stabilize is now hard to get. If I don't find a solution, it will sadly mean a new phone.

Sometimes it takes amazing pictures and videos. Other times the camera makes a weird sound and there is a vibration then the screen goes blurry and the images look really bad and out of focus. It's really frustrating. Please help fix this problem.

the app disappointing in latest update frequently, after taking several clear pics, the screen and pics taken will be blurred (or shaky). i need to restart the mobile or wait for sometime to make it work again

Autofocus is COMPLETELY OFF For a while I've noticed that my pictures cannot focus so I'll hold the screen and it will be ok. But lately it's been worse. Standing for a few seconds and the camera just blurs out. I press the screen to focus, it will and moments later it will blur out. I was taking pictures of a birthday cake...so no fast movements and such. Once zoomed in at various events, the focus again gets blurreD. Is there be a proper fix??? This is sad to have a 18mp camera that doesn't work proper half the time.

Completely unsatisfied Terrible as it is I now have to use android on my BlackBerry, but this camera is so slow, can't focus on moving objects (I've taka lot of pictures some if cars going 50mph while I'm standing still and perfect pictures on other BlackBerryS) the quality is great for video. I've used BlackBerry for 10 years and this needs updated ASAP!  Unless I'm missing something someone help!!!

results.descriptionHTML:
One of Google's "Best Apps of 2014 & 2015" with over 2 million downloads, the MailOnline (Daily Mail) app gives you everything you've come to expect and love from the world's largest English-language newspaper website, but with quick, easy and free access on your phone -- accessible even when you're offline.

Feed your daily addiction with stories & photos from all our top channels: US & World News, Celebrity & Showbiz, Sports, Femail, Science & Tech, Health, Money, Travel, and many more!

See what everyone's talking about and download our app today.

FEATURES:
• Over 15 Channels of must-read articles and photos - that's over 800+ original stories every day!
• Offline Mode: Pre-load stories & galleries to access when you're offline or without reception - great for commutes!
• Select a Location: Choose from US, UK or Rest of World to ensure you get the news most relevant to you.
• Express Yourself: Post your Comments on articles or Rate other user's comments that you like or dislike.
• Custom Settings: Select when data and images sync based on your preferred connection (Wi-Fi or 3G).
• Choose which Channels you want to sync and when.

If you have any trouble with the app or want to suggest new features and feedback, please email us at androidapp@mailonline.co.uk so we can help.
results.title: Daily Mail Online
results.summary: Daily Mail Online - News, Gossip, Sports & Photos from the No.1 newspaper site.
recentChanges: • Videos are now browsable through Gallery
• You can now hide channels from Settings --> Arrange Channels
We value your feedback. If you experience any bugs or have a suggestion on how to make the application better, please email us at: androidapp@mailonline.co.uk

results.descriptionHTML:
Practical Answers is the Technical Information Service of Practical Action. We provide free information on appropriate, small-scale technologies that improve the lives of people living in poverty.

This Practical Answers app has been developed to give our users the power of knowledge on their hand held devices when and where they need it. This app is almost a replica of our website (http://answers.practicalaction.org) but with some neat features like Filtering using the subject area(s) (Agriculture, Livestock, Climate Change and many more), the ability to select your choice of document language, Favoring a document so that you can view it later, Downloading a document, Offline Browsing and so on. The best thing is that the app and its contents are free to use and it works very well on low bandwidth connections as well.

results.descriptionHTML:
It's that simple: wealth, personal fulfillment, are available to all those who so wish; just enough to reveal a secret, the secret of success. And for that simply you must want, be willing to reveal it.

Thousands of personal finance books on shelves today promise to teach you to spend less, save more, invest better, retire earlier, get out of debt faster, and solve just about every financial conundrum in between.

"Think and Grow Rich" is a work designed to drag the win, understood not only as economic success, but above all, as an achievement of this inner satisfaction that enables personal balance and that means the basis of the most committed companies .. and most desirable.

The application includes a summary of excerpts from the book, to be present at all times, and study every day.

"When riches take the place of poverty, the change is usually brought about through well conceived and carefully executed plans,"

"Poverty needs no plan. It needs no one to aid it, because it is bold and ruthless. Riches are shy and timid. They have to be 'attracted.'"

Features

EXTRACTS LIST
You can see all extracts with its corresponding title, ordered as they appear in the book.

EXTRACTS DESCRIPTION
Each extract contains its short summary, a brief explanation of why it is important to apply the principle

SHARE EXTRACTS
There is a functionality for sharing extract, whom you feel is necessary, who see that you need, in your Facebook wall or wherever you want.

NOTIFICATIONS
In the second section you can manage the appearance of a daily notification with the title of the current extract. Once you allow notifications, from the day that enabled them in the following days you will see a different extract, every day. Tapping in the notification, you can access the app and view its description.

EXTRACTS SEARCH
In the latest version we include search functionality, both in the title of the extract and in its description. Thus, if you remember a concept that you want to reinforce but do not remember the location or number of the extract, you can find it easily.

SEEN AND LAST SEEN EXTRACTS
We also include the state of the extracts you have read and which extract was the last seen. Therefore, if you have not finished reading a extract, you can easily locate it.

Thank you very much for downloading Think and Grow Rich.

If you liked the app, it would be very useful for us that you qualify with 5 stars, leaving a comment with what more you liked, or what you would like us to improve.
For better communication, you can also send us an email with your suggestions, questions or anything you want to todoappsarg@gmail.com
results.title: Summary: Think and grow rich
results.summary: Top tips to get rich and achieve their goals in life
recentChanges: - Increased the extracts and extracts description font size
- Added seen and last seen functionality
Don't hesitate to send us an email to todoappsarg@gmail.com if you have a suggestion, or something that could improve the app :)

results.descriptionHTML:
First, let me begin with what this App is not. It is not associated with any charity. When I set out to take these photos it was as a photography study, not as an expose of the poverty and destitution in Bangkok. It's not intended as some form of poverty handout, a graphic depiction of the poor in order to provide feelings of sadness, or to emotionally blackmail people to take action. It's also not an abuse of the people in the photos for financial gain or recognition in the photography community.

So what is this? This is a portfolio of my photography work over a period of 6 months. But over those months I have learnt that the pictures sometimes alone are not enough. Each photo has its own story. Each person has a story to tell, good or bad, and by combining these stories with my photography work, the result is something much more powerful and meaningful to me, and hopefully to others.

Poverty is rife in Thailand. There are those who visit Bangkok and consider it to be an amazing and well developed city. But behind the major places to visit, there are so many areas full of people living next to canals, train tracks or abandoned land. These people are desperate. But they are also some of the most strong-willed, hardworking and happy people I have ever had the fortune to meet.

*** Please note this app is still under development. Information about each photo is being added in the next release ***
results.title: Poverty by Dave John Cole
results.summary: A photographic study of Poverty in Bangkok by Dave John Cole

results.descriptionHTML:
SDG Game & Quiz enables all people to easily learn about the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals - SDGs, invokes the importance of doing everything possible to achieve them and enables users to suggest solutions to achieve them.

The SDGs are the targets of the United Nations 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development announced on 25-27 September 2015 at the United Nations, New York.

The 17 Sustainable Development Goals are all featured in the comprehensive game, enabling users to obtain a full education on the SDGs while having fun playing the game and taking the quiz.

Play the Game to have fun & learn.
Play the Quiz to test yourself.
Share to create SDG Awareness.

Engage virtual gold coins to collect cool and super power avatars. Win SDG Hearts with correct Quiz answers to win extra lives.

Learn SDG Facts & Goals that appear after a game to succeed with SDG Quiz. Play SDG Quiz when you are ready.

SDG Game players can suggest solutions to SDG challenges and when they do so, will receive an account in SDG.WORLD, the global network for the SDGs where members can share ideas and co-create solutions for achieving the SDGs.

The SDGs are:

1. No poverty in all its forms everywhere
2. End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture
3. Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages
4. Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all
5. Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
6. Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all
7. Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy for all
8. Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all
9. Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation
10. Reduce inequality within and among countries
11. Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable
12. Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns
13. Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts*
14. Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources for sustainable development
15. Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss
16. Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
17. Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the global partnership for sustainable development

results.summary: SDG Game & Quiz enables people to easily learn about the SDGs while having fun.

results.descriptionHTML:
Play the best word search game on the Appstore for FREE now. FREE WORD SEARCH PUZZLES is the ultimate word find game that will keep you playing for hours. Not only you can have fun finding words, but learn new words from other languages as well! There is an unlimited amount of word search puzzles with lots of cool features that make this word search free app stand out from other word find apps.

The objective of search word puzzles is to find hidden words in the presented letter array. However, not all word search puzzles are the same. FREE WORD SEARCH PUZZLES brings a lot of cool features that are unique among other words search apps. If you are looking for word searches for kids, try this unique words search app and see how much fun your kids will have while learning.

Our word puzzle TOP features:

1. Unlimited number of word puzzles including word search for kids.
2. Three levels of word find difficulty which makes it suitable for everybody, young or old.
3. Wide range of categories.
4. Find words from many languages, including Hebrew, Finnish, Catalan, Latin and Welsh!
5. Local scoreboard and global online scoreboard and statistics that are updated in real time.
6. Test your skills and mettle at our weekly search word puzzles competition.

High quality graphics. Change your background and themes! We have a lot of fun and exciting themes to choose from: Oktoberfest, winter, coral reef, Christmas, outer space, jungle, the Maya, old school, parchment, swimming, ice hockey, soccer, the beach.

7. Choose between four types of highly readable fonts.
8. Highlight your answer in colors or monochrome.
9. Tap the foreign word in the word list and the app will show you the translation.

Have you ever felt bored and don’t know what to do? You might want to play some games that are not too intense. You just want to relax and chill. FREE WORD SEARCH PUZZLES is the perfect game when you are not in the mood for action packed or highly complicated games. You just need to use your eyes and concentrate on the screen. Everyone can enjoy this word find game because of its easy gameplay.
Furthermore, search word puzzles can help you learning new words even from languages you don’t know. This word find game is ideal for building your vocabulary and improving your spelling skills. Plus, you can practice to concentrate. This is why word search for kids is an ideal game for young children to help them to learn.

The word lists in the app’s word puzzles were created by hand, not generated by computer. Our word search team wants to make sure that every session is interesting and entertaining. We create clever algorithm to hide the words in every word puzzle in a new and interesting way to keep this word find game fun.

Our wide range of high quality graphics will make your game sessions more enjoyable. This word search free game provides a lot of customization options that are beyond other word puzzle games. You can choose your favorite theme, fonts, and how you want to highlight the answer. Some people like relaxing backgrounds. As word search for kids, we also provide themes and options that are attractive to younger players. We are proud to say that FREE WORD SEARCH PUZZLES is simply the best free app in this word search puzzles genre.

If you are a competitive person, you will have fun beating other word puzzle players for high score. Can you beat the top players and reign supreme? Collect the highest scores and finish the board as fast as possible, and see how you fare against other word search players!

Playing this word search free game can help humankind! We donate a portion of our revenues to people in emergency medical care every time you play this word search game. We support the availability of high quality emergency medical care and medicines for the world’s poorest people.

We would love to hear from you! Please contact us to give us feedback and suggestion.

results.descriptionHTML:
Affordable Housing by Credio is a research tool aimed at helping you and your family find Section 8 Housing, low income apartments, or other income-based housing options. The app provides eligibility and voucher information and Section 8 program overviews to help you find affordable housing in your area.

Powered by data from HUD (Department of Housing and Urban Development), the tool will help you evaluate housing options by rent, inspection score, income limits, eligibility, and landlord. Additionally, contact information for landlords, property management companies, and local PHAs (Public Housing Authorities) will help you begin the application process. Affordable Housing by Credio is the best app for helping you find subsidized, affordable low income housing.

This app is developed and optimized for Android, giving you endless housing knowledge wherever you go! Find your next quality affordable home for you and your family using Credio.

Credio - Affordable Housing has been designed for the US market. We do not have listings for housing outside of the United States.

To explore our desktop companion site and learn more about our features check out http://credio.com

All carefully hand-picked from more than 1000 famous people quotes, famous philosophers, writers, and other great minds whose brilliant words inspired many human beings. They are inspiring, motivating and they have the power quotes to provoke new thought, not having the most beautiful or the longest words, but the one that matches our feelings when we read it.

Black Trade Circle - African American Business, Social & Trading. Black Business Directory

Black Trade Circle - Black Owned Businesses for the African American Community Economic Development Project.

Black Trade Circle is one of the Black Trade Lines app family. The Black Trade Lines app's main focus is to encourage trade within the african american community to help alleviate poverty.

Our core mix of products and services ranging from stores to mobile applications are tailored to get the african american dollar circulating back again within the community; establishing a framework for economic growth and sustainability.

Start trading with your community. List your business in our Black Business directory. Black women, Black hair, Black entertainment, Black beauty products, Black food and recipes … you name it.

results.descriptionHTML:
내 손안에서 만나는 지구촌 빈곤문제 공익정보!
모바일 어플리케이션 를 다운받으세요~!

지구촌 빈곤 문제의 심각성과 해결책을 알려주는 한국어 공익 정보는 너무나 부족합니다. 많은 사람들의 마음에는 소중한 이타심이 있지만 지구촌 빈곤의 구체적 모습과 현실을 잘 알지 못하기 때문에 점점 무관심해지는 것은 아닐까요? 지구촌 빈곤의 다양한 모습과 해결방법을 소개하는 공유 지식(public knowledge)은 사회적 인식 개선을 위한 밑거름입니다.

The Global Poverty Public Awareness Project in Korea (GP3 Korea)가 제공하는 지구촌 빈곤정보 모바일 어플리케이션을 통해 누구든지 쉽게 지구촌 빈곤 문제 공익 정보를 만날 수 있습니다. 모바일 어플리케이션 Global Poverty Open Info는 지구촌 빈곤문제(Global Poverty Issues), 기부 (Donation), 페이스북, 유투브. 트위터 등 SNS 채널 연결 등을 제공합니다. www.povertyinfo.org에 쉽게 연결할 수 있습니다. 앞으로도 더 많은 지구촌 빈곤문제 컨텐츠가 추가될 예정입니다.

[GP3Korea 소개]
GP3Korea(www.povertyinfo.org)는 지구촌 빈곤문제의 현실, 원인, 해결책을 알리는 공익 정보를 나누고 공유하여 지구촌 빈곤문제에 대한 사회적 관심을 넓히기 위해 시작된 공익 정보 프로젝트입니다. The Global Poverty Public Awareness Project is a civic media group and a non-profit. We disseminate public knowledge on issues that affect global poverty. Smartphone users exceed 30 million in South Korea. We focus on social media channels to promote social awareness of global poverty.

[GP3Korea 온라인 채널들]
GP3 Korea 홈페이지 www.povertyinfo.org
GP3 Korea 네이버 블로그 www.blog.naver.com/gp3project
GP3 Korea Facebook www.facebook.com/povertyinformation
GP3 Korea Twitter www.twitter.com/#!/GP3PROJECT
GP3 Korea Youtube www.youtube.com/user/GP3PROJECT
GP3 Korea 싸이월드 블로그 www.cyworld.com/globalpoverty
Global Poverty Digital Library www.povertywiki.org

Made by GP3Korea
Developed by 최재우, 김지용, 김성택, 정민구, 황준상, 박태환, 한만종
Designed by 박유진, 이정애, 김란희
----
개발자 연락처 :
010-6527-1218

results.descriptionHTML:
There's a beggar in every device.
Your goal is to help him out of the poverty.

- Tap the screen to throw coins to the beggar and collect all the valuables thrown by generous passers-by.
- Found a company and expand your business by building new rooms and hiring workers from 14 different professions.
- Train your workers for more demanding assignments.
- Spend your money the way that suits you the best; buy new houses, pets, cars or clothes - or visit different places such as the moon.
- Customize your beggar's look.
- Decorate your own place as you like and invite other players to it.
- Level up and unlock new things.
- Participate in random events and secrets.
- Google Play leaderboards let you see how beggars in other devices are doing.
- Chat with random beggars from all around the world.

- Drive your car to gain some extra xp

- Skipping workers' work task now gives them xp
- You'll now keep your bus crew after the Ultimate Donation

comments: Overall great game that's kept me entertained for ages now. My only disappointment is that I have most achievements but one won't pop. I need to do 20 tasks, and my stats show 46 complete but still nothing :(

Its definitely a time killer... only recommendation would be to stop the updates when you're playing pong. They pop up and take up the majority of the screen and make you lose concentration. Especially if you have a ton of them. Other than that, this game is pretty fun.

Developers, my tablet had a booth where it went back in time three years. This is one of my favorite mobile games. My workers will take 3 years to go back to normal. Please help. I really don't want to reset my game. I would really appreciate it if you could help fix this problem. I will do anything to get it back.

The graphics are throwback to 8-bit and music as well. Tap the screen to beg for coins and buy stuff and work your way up. Not too much action or story but it's a nice little fun way to pass the time.

update: made ultimate donation and now replaying to unlock all achievements.  This is the only game I've come across that I can play without restriction even though I can't afford to pay. If I run out of VC's I can watch a video or just keep tapping and wait for one to be thrown. I love the scratch card and wheel because I've been able to get lucky and upgrade faster playing them. Love the challenges that break up the standard gameplay as well. Personally I enjoy the fact that the game doesn't have ANY correlation to popularity meaning no having to spam requests to earn coins etc. Wanted to give you a review and encourage people to try this app if tap/tycoon games are your thing and you really can't or don't want to eventually pay real money.
Best time waster ever. Love the pixel graphics and how steady you can move through the game without pay to play

results.descriptionHTML:
Tap into the most recent developments in research to better understand the relationship between infectious diseases and poverty with the Infectious Diseases of Poverty app. Infectious Diseases of Poverty is a peer-reviewed open access medical journal published by BioMed Central. The Journal continuously publishes topic areas and methods that address essential public health questions relating to infectious diseases of poverty. These include various aspects of the biology of pathogens and vectors, diagnosis and detection, treatment and case management, epidemiology and modeling, zoonotic hosts and animal reservoirs, control strategies and implementation, new technologies and application. Transdisciplinary or multisectoral effects on health systems, ecohealth, environmental management, and innovative technology are also considered.

This free app provides valuable features including:
- Save and share articles
- Advanced search
- Document details - including abstracts

results.descriptionHTML:
What does it mean to be a gangster for you? You have a chance to feel it and to force the city work for you.

Welcome to the crazy city of criminals! However, there still remain good citizens, but we do not like that? From the first day of life here, someone constantly make our way harder. Choose who you are: a wolf or a sheep? It's time to pick up any weapon, what your heart desires, and to get even with all the scum, punching his way to the top.
Dirty cops, drug dealers, mafia, street gangs - no one has power on you! Sooner or later there will be only one player on this crazy scene ...

Game features
- Big open world
- Perfect graphics
- Well-configured character controls

Advanced settings of gameplay optimization for any devices

Different car types: from sport cars to classics
Car dealer, you can buy any car you want
Buying cars is for noobs? Take them any way you want it
Take part in races, driving different cars
Special for shooting fans:
A wide variety of weapons from pistols to RPG
The police certainly not intrusive, but if you make them angry, they become real beasts. Test your strength in this unequal fight!
Lots of different missions, where it is necessary to measure the force with all kinds of villains
Well, if you absolutely crazy, the combat helicopter of the US Army and a tank at your service
Do you like an interesting story, and plot? Excellent!
Masterpiece storyline about a young gangster
Intricate plot
Lots of characters that will remain forever in your hearts
Everywhere there is humor supplementing constantly tense atmosphere

Today you will be imbued with a young man life, who is tired of poverty and abuses on the part of criminals. In one remarkable day he just picked up the gun and shot his longtime friend who betrayed him. But, as often happens, everything did not end there, because unlike the police - street gangs were much attentive and now you are forced to carry out their orders, in order not to fall behind bars. On whether it long enough and as soon as young man does decide again to use the force to change the course of events? Only you can find out.
results.title: Crime Wars S. Andreas
results.summary: You have a chance to feel it and to force the city work for you!
results.description: What does it mean to be a gangster for you? You have a chance to feel it and to force the city work for you.Welcome to the crazy city of criminals! However, there still remain good citizens, but we do not like that? From the first day of life here, someone constantly make our way harder. Choose who you are: a wolf or a sheep? It's time to pick up any weapon, what your heart desires, and to get even with all the scum, punching his way to the top.Dirty cops, drug dealers, mafia, street gangs - no one has power on you! Sooner or later there will be only one player on this crazy scene ...Game features- Big open world- Perfect graphics- Well-configured character controlsAdvanced settings of gameplay optimization for any devicesDifferent car types: from sport cars to classics Car dealer, you can buy any car you wantBuying cars is for noobs? Take them any way you want itTake part in races, driving different carsSpecial for shooting fans:A wide variety of weapons from pistols to RPGThe police certainly not intrusive, but if you make them angry, they become real beasts. Test your strength in this unequal fight!Lots of different missions, where it is necessary to measure the force with all kinds of villains Well, if you absolutely crazy, the combat helicopter of the US Army and a tank at your serviceDo you like an interesting story, and plot? Excellent!Masterpiece storyline about a young gangsterIntricate plotLots of characters that will remain forever in your heartsEverywhere there is humor supplementing constantly tense atmosphereToday you will be imbued with a young man life, who is tired of poverty and abuses on the part of criminals. In one remarkable day he just picked up the gun and shot his longtime friend who betrayed him. But, as often happens, everything did not end there, because unlike the police - street gangs were much attentive and now you are forced to carry out their orders, in order not to fall behind bars. On whether it long enough and as soon as young man does decide again to use the force to change the course of events? Only you can find out.

milestones.description: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round

By 2030, end all forms of malnutrition, including achieving, by 2025, the internationally agreed targets on stunting and wasting in children under 5 years of age, and address the nutritional needs of adolescent girls, pregnant and lactating women and older persons

By 2030, double the agricultural productivity and incomes of small-scale food producers, in particular women, indigenous peoples, family farmers, pastoralists and fishers, including through secure and equal access to land, other productive resources and inputs, knowledge, financial services, markets and opportunities for value addition and non-farm employment

By 2030, ensure sustainable food production systems and implement resilient agricultural practices that increase productivity and production, that help maintain ecosystems, that strengthen capacity for adaptation to climate change, extreme weather, drought, flooding and other disasters and that progressively improve land and soil quality

By 2020, maintain the genetic diversity of seeds, cultivated plants and farmed and domesticated animals and their related wild species, including through soundly managed and diversified seed and plant banks at the national, regional and international levels, and promote access to and fair and equitable sharing of benefits arising from the utilization of genetic resources and associated traditional knowledge, as internationally agreed

Increase investment, including through enhanced international cooperation, in rural infrastructure, agricultural research and extension services, technology development and plant and livestock gene banks in order to enhance agricultural productive capacity in developing countries, in particular least developed countries

Correct and prevent trade restrictions and distortions in world agricultural markets, including through the parallel elimination of all forms of agricultural export subsidies and all export measures with equivalent effect, in accordance with the mandate of the Doha Development Round

Adopt measures to ensure the proper functioning of food commodity markets and their derivatives and facilitate timely access to market information, including on food reserves, in order to help limit extreme food price volatility

results.descriptionHTML:
Have you ever thought of having a dangerous, always angry pet living in a vivid aqua, underwater world? A hungry shark pet so angry at trying to bite piece of you in fierce dashes that it cracks your screen! Now seems it’s just about the right time to have one! Don’t miss out! Download now and enjoy it right on your phone screen.

Our hungry shark, biting and cracking in angry dashes is a perfect solution for proving your unique style! Be cool, keep a shark in your pocket that is just looking for your tap ;) For extra realistic experience the shark also cracks the phone screen when attempting to break and bite for drawing some fresh users' meat ;)

New: full virtual shark pet experience! The shark pet now gets hungry or bored and needs you to feed it with fish and play small game with your finger as "decoy". This sharky buddy is going to get talking soon too, stay tuned.

With this update we also take the chance to wish you tons of fun and delightful family emotions during the forthcoming Christmas holidays and joyful New Year celebrations.

Being one of many cool market animated apps available, our cool interactive application can be run on all old and modern phones or tablets, or be seated right back behind your home screen launcher or lock screen background as a live wallpaper on devices running Android OS 2.1 and above. It provides an entertaining, almost instant underwater action and adventure anytime and anywhere you go. It also supports installation to SD card (App2SD) in case of insufficient device memory, so you can spare your precious space
for other cool apps and games.

Instructions to Install as Live Wallpaper when desired: Long Tap Home -> Menu -> Wallpapers -> Live Wallpapers -> Scroll down the list, find out the wallpaper and pick "Angry Shark Pet Cracks Screen" to setup.

Please, in case of any issues, first check the live Youtube video cast for an usage example, browse the applied screen shot photos or listen to the audio narration and music. Alternatively, instead of giving us a negative rating, please, give us a call or initiate a chat on Skype, chase us on Twitter, text a SMS or comment on our dedicated Facebook page and let us know about the problem you're facing so we can assist you best and address the problem in our app’s next updates.
results.title: Angry Shark Pet Cracks Screen
results.summary: If you liked the previous version then you will LOVE the new one!
recentChanges: - Now you can give a personalized name to your shark pet, enjoy! :)

results.descriptionHTML:
Dive into the world of wild wolves and live your life as one of them! The best wolf RPG on mobile is finally here. Explore the amazing environment, develop your character and upgrade your skills to become the Alpha of your pack! You can try your strength in one of two modes: CO-OP or PVP - everything in Online Real-Time Multiplayer. Play with people from all over the World!

Online Real-Time Multiplayer RPG
Stunning 3D graphics
Beautiful environment
Realistic animals
Character development and upgrades
Cooperative multiplayer hunting and PVP Battle Arena modes
Smooth performance

ONLINE MULTIPLAYER SIMULATOR

Compete with players from all around the World! The wilderness is never empty. Meet other wolves in real time and conquer the forest!

CHARACTER CUSTOMIZATION

Are you a mighty Gray Wolf? A Dhole Wolf? Or maybe a mysterious Black Wolf resembles you the most? Choose your favorite and create your unique character!

RPG SYSTEM

You are the king of your own destiny! There is no imposed path to follow in this simulator. Decide which attributes to develop and which skills to upgrade to become the Alpha of the pack!

AMAZING GRAPHICS

Enjoy the stroll around the map and admire the stunning environment! Starting from your den all the way to the mountains and streams, the high-end graphics make the game incredibly pleasant. Don’t the animals look realistic? Try and chase them all!

VARIOUS GAME MODES

Hunting mode lets you explore the map while searching for prey: from rats and rabbits, through does, foxes and racoons, all the way to bisons and bulls. Cooperate with other players to fight the strongest opponents! If you need a bigger thrill, join the Battle Arena mode - you will be teamed up with other wolves to compete with another pack. This means war!

comments: Absolutely love it, it's relaxing, stress free, it helps with my depression. Could add a few things. Could add northern hemisphere, forest, marsh and so on maps, a option to record, for alfa, have a male and female, not just one or the other, the mating, should have a person's real age in a bio or something, who knows if it's a pre-teen or teen your chatting with, and some people do get perverted when it comes to this sort of thing, adding friends would be great, you meet someone in a game and who knows when you can hunt or vs with them again. Thank you and keep up the good work.

It is limited and I wish to see better scaling between a tank and dps or healer at low levels. I enjoy the concept and will continue to play until more development from the map or maps to the size of maps and seeing if they will do cold climate game to hunt or even class bonus for sneaking up on enemies. Theres alot of ideas to be  worked on. Ill happily play as it grows. Thanks

It's great, but this has so much potential that I'm going to be critical. I'd really like the wolves to be able to jump, roll over, sleep, play and interact more with others- running is fun, but wolves do more than run and eat. The noises only have about 3 variations, more of a soundtrack would be nice. What could also make it better is having like a guild, or a clan, where there are pups, apprentices, warriors, elders, a deputy and a leader. The ability to talk privately or in groups would be awesome, as well as a bigger map with different environments to cater for the different pelts. I really hope the developers add these things because it would keep many coming back to play :)

ALL WOLF LOVERS DOWNLOAD NOW. This is AMAZING! I love it so much. Maybe if there could be a male and female alpha of the pack, which should be the ones who fight the most. And to let people know that they are alpha, they should have a paw sign floating above them. And maybe u can name ur pack, and claim a cave or under a tree for a base for resting when ur health is low. BUT ITS AMAZING! All ur games are amazing, keep up great work💖

It's a great game....with good graphics...and I already tried to get my dad to play it.....definitely a recommendable game...  But..  I Would appreciate it if you could add:      ▪being able to have a pup with another wolf     ▪a chat...so that its possible to establish a pack among the other players   ▪and if I may ask, that you be able to have it so people can friend you...and you can see when they are active..    ▪and please...please...make your game invulnerable to hackers....so that everyone has a fair chance when playing....  I know it's a bit much....but please try to add one or a few of these suggestions......   Thank you...    Signed,    Wolf villena

It's ok... lots of grind before you can wander away from the starting area... then just the same... lots of grind to have a chance against the bigger or more fierce animals... Very nice gfx and simple to control, though the screen turning could do with some changes to make it more fluid and easier to adjust.

results.descriptionHTML:
Join thousands of players and enjoy the best MMORPG experience on Android: Team up with your friends to take on quests and explore our vast fantasy world, achieve heroic feats and lead your guild to the top of the multiplayer leaderboard.

==== IMPORTANT NOTICE====
Order & Chaos Online delivers the best experience on powerful devices. You can also enjoy a good experience on a lot of other devices.
However, we suggest that you first verify your hardware capabilities.

The minimum recommended configuration to play Order & Chaos Online is
- 1 GHz CPU
- 500 MB RAM
- 1.7 GB of free space
===========================

THE MOST COMPLETE MMO EXPERIENCE AVAILABLE IN A MOBILE GAME
• Use the advanced character creation system to customize your heroic avatar, in true MMORPG fashion.
• 5 races available: Elves and Humans fight for Order, Orcs and Undead for Chaos, and the Mendels are neutral. You can have no less than 5 different characters in our game!
• Choose your gender, appearance, class and talents. With over 15,000 skills and 8,000 pieces of equipment to assist you through your quest, your game will not be over soon.

INTERACT WITH THE COMMUNITY
• Explore the world of Haradon solo, or unleash the true multiplayer game experience: Make friends or enemies, trade, duel, communicate and more. A wide range of interactions makes each player a living part of this fantasy universe.
• Join a party or guild to become stronger and coordinate with your teammates to overcome the most challenging part of MMO games: our Legendary dungeons.
• Take part in epic multiplayer fights and try to lead your guild to the very top of Haradon.

THE WORLD IS YOURS
• Travel through the most majestic settings of this deep fantasy world -- from dark forests to deserts, jungles, mountains and more -- on foot or by magical means.
• Talk and interact with hundreds of characters to find over 1,500 quests to perform.

ENTER THE PvP ARENA!
• The Battlefields are a new PvP mode where teamwork far outweighs individual strength.

MOUNT UP
• Ride into battle faster than ever on the brand-new mounts, including Bloody Ghost Horse, Silver Despair, Peaceful Kraken, and many more!

Join the best mobile MMORPG, and enter the legend now!

For fans of MMO games, Role-Playing games, Multiplayer games and Heroic Fantasy games.

_____________________________________________

Visit our official site at http://www.gameloft.com
Follow us on Twitter at http://glft.co/GameloftonTwitter or like us on Facebook at http://facebook.com/Gameloft to get more info about all our upcoming titles.
Check out our videos and game trailers on http://www.youtube.com/Gameloft
Discover our blog at http://glft.co/Gameloft_Official_Blog for the inside scoop on everything Gameloft.

_______________________________________________

This app allows you to purchase virtual items within the app and may contain third-party advertisements that may redirect you to a third-party site.

Privacy Policy : http://www.gameloft.com/privacy-notice/
Terms of Use : http://www.gameloft.com/conditions/
End User License Agreement : http://www.gameloft.com/eula/

comments: This is by far the best mmorpg on Google play right now. I have hardly any lag, if any on 4G. The graphics are stunning. Incredibly smooth gameplay. And it has a healer class (unlike O&C 2), which is completely amazing. There is no form of stamina (otherwise known as vigor in O&C 2) at all so you can play all day long. It feels like a PC game, honestly rivals WoW and LOTRO in my own opinion. Exactly what I was looking for! Thank you!

Do you not speak English or do you not like $?  If this were my product, i would fire everyone who thought this was a good idea.  Generic responses like "we revamped talent tree" and "fixed the monk" are exactly what we don't want to hear.  And stop ignoring us!  TO NEW PLAYERS..THIS RECENT UPDATE IS THE DEATH OF THIS GAME.  Fix the talent tree now.  Fire whoever created this patch and this game may survive.  And respond to me for f*cks sake.

Easily my all time favorite go to game, I tried the 2nd and would rather invest in this one,  the 1st. Just like WoW and it's free! While I've invested a tiny amount of cash on this game, my 3 lvl 60 characters are free to lvl to 70 (now 75?), find / equip gear and upgrade it! All free, from lotteries and other time based mechanics.   On the Talent screen, 2nd to last column, lvl 65, has half the pop up window skill description is cut off. Still cut off. ..uninstall reinstall...

Grate game...but it has a lot of lag now at new world boss everyone lags sooo bad..that u dont get any loot... ive done it 3 times and got loot 1 time BUT.... it just needs new scanner weapons because there's new higher bosses and. Gear..but scanners to low..and the Legendary craft's i cant find im. 600 crafting and.waiting on info on. New craft's located at..?

I LOVE quest based MMORPG games. I started playing them a long time ago. This satisfies all my cravings for that type of game AND allows me to play on my tablet. If you like that type of game, give this a shot. You won't be disappointed!

Fun to play. I enjoy myself but for some reason I can't log on to one of my 2 characters.  It keeps kicking me off but I can still log on to my other one. Same account. I tried contacting the company but I just keep getting a generic answer that does not help me.

results.descriptionHTML:
Tired of a usual island survival simulators? Dive into the wilderness exploring sea world & fight for your life at the bottom of the ocean!
Survive after Great Flood! Feel yourself like a lonely aqualunger, lost in the deep vast of the sea at the underwater base! Explore the sea bottom, quarry resources, “hunt” fishes and cephalopods, search for fresh water and don’t forget about your level of oxygen – if it drops to zero, you’d die soon! Unravel all secrets of the sea bottom, find treasures or hidden weapons and, maybe, the method to leave this place and get home! Be a real survivor with our Underwater Survival Simulator!
Live the life of aqualunger and keep your weapons alert!
Fight for your life with underwater predators – they never sleep and would chase yours until death, it's or yours. Find weapons to protect yourself – or craft new one from materials, found over the bottom. Build shelters to prevent attacks of sharks and do your best to survive at all costs with Underwater Survival Simulator!
Hunt for predators, build shelter & craft tools – feel like a lonely diver with this underwater survival simulator in 3D!
Watch for your character indicators - health, energy, fullness. If one of these drops – no chance to survive! Especially mind your oxygen level – if it drops to zero, you’d never dive again! Do all that you can – there is a lot of things you can do here, on the ocean bottom. Earn experience and raise up your skills! Craft weapons and special tools – it would help you to stay alive! Collect different materials – it can be very useful!
Stay alive at all costs! Spending time at the bottom of the ocean is not easy as on the survival island!
Control your character using the joystick, hunt sea creatures, craft tools and weapons or build shelters, which would help you to survive! But remember, the ocean is full of predators ready to attack you, so keep your weapon alert! Use all your exploration, battling and survival skills to stay alive at all cost with Underwater Survival Simulator!
Underwater Survival Simulator features:
  • Huge vast of picturesque ocean’s bottom to explore
  • Different indicators of character’s status – health, energy, fullness and oxygen
  • Find hidden treasures to ease the survival process
  • Craft weapons and tools – it can save your life someday
  • Unusual survival experience

Be ready for really unusual survival simulator in 3D!
Spend your time at the grim and empty ocean bottom, battle against hungry predators and do your best to stay alive at this harsh place with Underwater Survival Simulator!

Use all your exploration, battling and survival skills to stay alive at all cost with Underwater Survival Simulator!Underwater Survival Simulator features: Huge vast of picturesque ocean’s bottom to exploreDifferent indicators of character’s status – health, energy, fullness and oxygenFind hidden treasures to ease the survival processCraft weapons and tools – it can save your life somedayUnusual survival experienceBe ready for really unusual survival simulator in 3D! Spend your time at the grim and empty ocean bottom, battle against hungry predators and do your best to stay alive at this harsh place with Underwater Survival Simulator!
comments: Good concept, very interesting. The whole thing is really good, but it runs too slowly on a 4core, 1GB RAM tablet, where many 3D games run fine, even with bloom.  Please add graphics details options and try to optimize the game, make it faster.  Also, the pink stones or whatever they are look really silly and ruin the immersion effect.  Stone must look like stone, though may look somewhat more special so that I know that I can 'pick it up'.  Also, I did not find any other material than 'fiber', no stone or metal.  On the map my heading must be shown - the direction that I'm facing/going.  A compass is needed on the HUD, and better yet, make a translucent map on the HUD, small or full screen when needed.  Until then, I can't say any more, will be looking at this in the future. Thanks.

Fantasic game Love this game dont get why it hasn't got a higher rating id like to see some stuff added but the game is very nice one hint watch free adds for credits before you leave the base then you can craft a wepon to defend yourself sharks in water lol id like to see more fish and more things to do and maby be a little easier to level up and alot more options for building stuff other than that grate game love it

Love hate I don't know what everybody is talking about it doesn't take but one minute to download the graphics are great and what do you mean not like the real subnautica this game is it's on the game and not based off of subnautica unless you can find and actually show me some evidence I don't believe any of you

It's a great underwater survival game idea. Good graphics and all. Just minor bugs that need fixed. Such as moving around. Plus I understand the fact that it's a free game. But you really don't need to put in ads every two minutes.
Coin earning Doesn't pay out. Ive watched an ad twice now with not a single coin being given to me for it. Thats a huge rip off. I think the games cool. But that one thing just ruins it.

Don't download Add interrupted first 30 seconds of game play. Had just started playing and the screen was diverted to an add. I am not interested in a game that interrupts play to show an add. Uninstalled immediately.

results.descriptionHTML: Nobody makes sandwiches like The Hungry Hobo! It starts with bread baked from scratch in The Hobo Bakery. They add sliced-to-order, high quality meats and cheeses and your choice of fresh toppings for the best sandwiches in town. But The Hungry Hobo is more than sandwiches!

results.summary: Nobody makes sandwiches like The Hungry Hobo!

comments: Going downhill fast! This app with every update continues to get worse and worse. The lack of ability to change stores in checkout, the constant crashing, the terrible GPS locator, the ad to cart feature that rarely works from favorite orders. Thank goodness the store isn't ran by whomever supportss this app.

Horrible app I can never log in to this app to place my order. I have an account and it always says my password is wrong so I reset it and try to log in again and it says the same thing! Logging in with Facebook doesn't work either because it says the Internet connection is down!! This app hasn't worked for MONTHS!!! I can't be the only one who is having problems.

The app is fun tional. However your people at the restaurant can't seem to read and then place every item ordered in the bags. Every time we place an order something is missed. It's very frustrating having to drive back to a store while everyone else eats to get what is missed each time.
Awful app Crashed my whole phone and then froze my phone worse than its ever been before. Couldn't even shut down or restart for 20 mins.
Constantly crashing I can't even search for store locations any longer. This app crashes over and over. The updates have made it worse: not better.
Buggy Won't let me log in with my facebook or sign up for a different account since I already have one attached to my facebook. Keeps force closing.

results.descriptionHTML:
Ultimate Guitar Tabs & Chords is a mobile version of the world's largest catalog of guitar & ukulele chords, tabs and lyrics, available even offline. Learn how to play your favorite songs on acoustic, electric guitar or ukulele. Get over 1,000,000 tabs and free daily updates with recent hit songs! Learn how to play guitar from scratch or refresh your knowledge of the instrument with our interactive lessons (available as an in-app purchase).

App features:
• Popular songs from latest releases
• Guitar & ukulele chords, notes and scores for more than 400,000 songs
• Chord diagrams with fingering. Each chord features multiple variations
• Free daily updates
• Оffline access to favorite tabs
• Left-handed mode
• Quick search by type, difficulty, tuning and rating
• Autoscroll

Editors' collections:
Collections of hand selected songs edited and fine tuned to perfection from professional guitarists for guitarists. Songs from collections chosen specifically for particular moments such as getting the party started or camping out in nature so you always have the perfect playlist ready at hand. Or focus on guitar techniques with professionally picked songs. With new collections released every Friday, endless possibilities for moments are available for you.

Powerful upgrades (available as an in-app purchase):
• 200,000 additional tabs with playback and multiple instruments
• Accurate tuner
• Precision metronome
• Chord library with over 2 mln guitar chords
• Tab printing

comments: Ultimate Guitar is pretty cool. I say that because you can play rock music with it....but I think you could pull off some punk music too. No other genres can be played...it is not allowed by the One. I have studied guitar and all instruments with the Sages of Yanthysmere, which is in the mountain country, beyond the river boundary. They have taught me many things. Now I will teach you. The Sages would prefer it if THE BLUE CIRCLE for Tab Tracker, which appears in the bottom right of the screen, was elsewhere. So as not to cover up the valuable guitar tab, which young seekers have worked so hard to bring us. Place it (or it's features) in the menu bar at the top of the screen instead. The Sages will grant you an extension of blessings.

This app used to be my favorite app for keeping all of my sheet music when I wanted to play my guitar. Since the new update, it has turned to crap. They are constantly adding pro tabs to my favorites even though I cant access them. It also now has an autofit feature which cuts off alot of chords. They have made it way more difficult and frustrating to just sit down and play music.

Good app but WAY too much advertising. I paid the $3, and now I see ads for the $10 upgrade when I open the app, there's an upgrade notification I can't clear, so the app icon always has the number one on it, and now they've automatically added the "pro" version of each of my favorite tabs which requires me to buy the upgrade if I accidentally click on it. So now I have to go through and remove the pro versions that they've added. If I want the upgrade I know where to find it. Your annoying advertising makes me want to never purchase your upgrade. The auto scroll feature is cool.

No more attempts to up sell after already purchasing the extras!! I am really enjoying the app now.  Update: This has been fixed and I can't praise the app enough now. It isn't just useful, but part of my everyday learning.

I like this app on my phone but I recently moved my guitar stuff to a bigger area in the house with my computer. When I try to sign into computer version it wants me to pay for tab pro all over again. I purchased premium on here since I've used the app but I don't want to pay monthly or yearly on pc for something I paid for on here. I don't know if that is a sync issue but whatever it is, please fix it.
New update erased all of my favorites. Keeping these organized was the primary reason I had the app...  horrible fail on the part if the developers.

results.descriptionHTML:
Moatboat for Daydream is an experimental tool for creating small, living worlds. Using only your voice and hands, you'll make new worlds from scratch, and explore worlds for inspiration.

Enjoy building whatever comes to mind by saying sentences to create your own world. You can also try some existing worlds that have plants and animals, buying and selling, and effects that spread over time. In each world, you'll discover how to create and control over 200 objects.

Save recordings from your creations as animated .GIFs, and share them with us at moatboat.com.
results.title: Moatboat
results.summary: Whatever you say, happens.
recentChanges: Lions, and tigers, and bears!  Oh, my!  New content to play with.

comments: I'm having fun, but I can barely get it to understand what I say. It gets extremely frustrating when I have to say something 5+ times before it understands. I'm a native English speaker! That coupled with how hot it runs, and when it gets hot the lag is enormous. It's bad enough having to repeat things, but having to wait up to 10 seconds after saying a word only to find that it doesn't understand! Enough to frustrate you to want to quit. The concept is great, but having to just watch things happen cause all I can do is skip is not fun. I have other Daydream VR games that don't have the heat and lag problem, and they have much more things going on in them. Needs some major updating to make this 4 or 5 stars.  Edit: additionally, I just was on the ground and wanted to leave and I wasn't able to go up into the sky. Had to completely shut down the game to escape
I stopped using it after saying 'grow icecream'. Innovative idea but poor execution, awful animations and graphics.
Needs to have another method of control besides voice. It is extremely frustrating when you try to say hawks and it detects has or bots or.hops. Etc.
Really innovative and creative app. Reminds me of what it was like playing the old Sim games for the first time in the 90s  (Sim Earth, Sim Ant, Sim Life especially)
I can't say "bears" to get through the tutorial. I tested it with the other voice recognition on my phone and that works fine!

It definitely have good concept, and is fun... until either the program (or Google Voice) cannot recognize your accent. I have problems with "bears", for example. Perhaps someway for the program to pick a choice through pointer will be helpful.

results.descriptionHTML:
Our latest free update, The Ender Update, includes The End and its iconic ultimate boss battle, the Ender Dragon. And don't miss the first ever Mash-Up to come to this edition, complete with a Festive skin pack, texture pack, and world.

Explore randomly generated worlds and build amazing things from the simplest of homes to the grandest of castles. Play in creative mode with unlimited resources or mine deep into the world in survival mode, crafting weapons and armor to fend off the dangerous mobs.

Craft, create, and explore alone, or with friends on mobile devices or Windows 10.

comments: I am really soery to say this mohang but i only tried to get  on to settings but it froze! I dont know why, it was for about 5 minits(dont know how to spell it properly)i LOVE this game so so much and would like all of you people reading this to buy it, i really would like mojang crew to make sure it all works before it goes out to the people of minecraft, anyways, i would like you to read this through properly and test it all first most importanyly.

Its just a game were u place blocks right? NO!!! This is the game that lets u and ur friend to, enjoy all the time, it also is very addictive and plus the servers r AWESOME. Thx mojang u really did what was impossible, and keep up the updates were all here for ur team :)

Minecraft has become such a stupid game recently and I'm sorry but I had to pay to change my gamertag thats ridiculous absolutely ridiculous before I could just go on to settings and change it with no complication. Other than that minecraft is a great game I love it and I sit and would play it for hours.

This is a great game however when I try to play online it Just stops and goes black. Any suggestions.    I'm still giveing it five stars because it is overall a great game. Its just the multiplayer that I have problems. Please give me suggestions on how to fix this problem.

Please fix some bugs that causes the game to crash. (I'm a samsung user and i use wired android gamepad). When it crash, it doesnt save properly and It ruins the survival mode. Will give 5 star if fixed.

A really good game, I really enjoy it the graphics are great. Its definitely worth paying £4.99 and I would recommend to all. I love the new minecraft music, it really makes the game feel almost real. I hope that soon you will add more features like woodland mansions, lamas and armor stands. One thing that puts the game down is having to have an Xbox live account to have or join a realm. I would love it if you changed that feature. Me and my friends are always playing minecraft and we are very greatfull for all your hard work towards the game. Thank you for taking the time to read my review, Yours sincerely, Amy.

results.descriptionHTML:
Candy Crush Saga, from the makers of Candy Crush Soda Saga
& Farm Heroes Saga!

Join Tiffi and Mr. Toffee on their sweet adventure through the Candy Kingdom. Travel through magical lands, visiting wondrous places and meeting deliciously kooky characters! Switch and match your way through hundreds of fun levels in this delicious puzzle adventure. The sweetest game just keeps getting sweeter!

Take on this deliciously sweet Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the top score! 

Candy Crush Saga is completely free to play but some optional
in-game items will require payment.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms

Candy Crush Saga features:
● Tasty ways to play: Target Score, Timed Levels, Drop Down Mode and Order Mode
● Collect sugar drops to progress along the Sugar Track for super sweet surprises!
● Spin the Daily Booster Wheel for a delicious prize
● Pass level 50 to unlock Dreamworld and escape reality with Odus the Owl
● Unwrap delicious environments and meet the sweetest characters
● Tasty Candies, wrapped and striped Special Candies, Color Bombs and various other magical boosters to help with challenging levels
● Hundreds of the best levels in the Candy Kingdom with more added every week for your entertainment
● Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!
● It's easy to sync the game between devices and unlock full game features when connected to the Internet

Visit https://care.king.com/ if you need help!

Follow us to get news and updates;
facebook.com/CandyCrushSaga
Twitter @CandyCrushSaga
https://www.youtube.com/user/CandyCrushOfficial
http://candycrushsaga.com/

Have fun playing Candy Crush Saga!

My game start up I got 20 gold bar, me having 11=31gold bar without adding other specials. Only to notice again I have 5 gold bar left after I removed my card from my Google. Well, I don't understand what games you are playing. Could rectify this problem and give me what I paid for?

CCS is very fun 2play TY CC FOR changing sending/receiving format 🙌KUDOS! & Perfect! Thank you! Free wheel spin cud use upd8! ie: add gold bars a +! Almost had Big BONUS/wheel 🙁 Big BONUS wheel is fixed! Nearly had jackpot several timZ! It stops 2 hesitate near Jackpot ea time, Yet NEVER Win it!?  You have listenNd & Ty 4 most changes 😄💋 I'm now @ lvl 229 😆 Enjoy the free Xtras!

Way to many micro transactions. Every time you turn around they want you to buy gold for boosters or for a spin. If they would make it a 1 to 5 dollar monthly subscriptions I would subscribe.  Micro transactions, kills this game for me

17Feb2017 update still (and the one before) fail to successfully login to Facebook: 》 "Cannot connect to the Kingdom... Retry later"   -continues to fail even after clearing app cache (the Facebook button label is worded "Connect" not "Login" nor "Logout." Please add an option to "Reset" bc clearing cache apparently isn't enough)  [ installing the standalone FB app allows login to sync progress... HOWEVER, the FB app is too invasive & behaves like Potentially Unwanted Software -i can't allow the FB app to remain installed! ]

What happened to the power boost wheel. I was liking the extra help then all of a sudden it's gone.I don't really understand the owl thing or if it set you back in the game or help you to move forward. The game is so fun and the extra boosters are back .
I love this game! Just wish it wasn't so easy to accidentally use my ufo. My kid grabbed my phone when I was playing and deployed it 😣 The other in-game cheats you have to select twice.

results.descriptionHTML:
EXCITING 3D ACTION
3D graphics and simple controls make for free-flowing and fast-paced hack-and-slash action.

EPIC SPECIAL MOVES
Unleash each Bleach character's unique special moves to carve your way to victory. Special moves are fully voiced by the original Japanese anime voice actors.

THREE'S COMPANY
Combine your favorite characters into teams of three. You can even make combinations of characters you would never see in the original story. The possibilities are almost limitless!

RELIVE THE BLEACH STORY
Follow the Bleach story from the moment Rukia and Ichigo first meet. Develop your characters as you complete quests that recreate pivotal scenes from the story.

BATTLE OTHER PLAYERS
Compete in weekly leagues. Pit your best warriors against other players' teams and vie for the top spot.

DEVELOP YOUR CHARACTERS
Brave Souls features a highly flexible character improvement system that allows you to create exactly the warriors and the team you want. Enter battle and earn experience to level up characters and improve their base stats, Ascend them to increase their max level, train them on the Soul Tree to further improve specific stats, or link characters together to provide additional support. The choice is yours!

Official Site
https://www.bleach-bravesouls.com/en/

Twitter
Account: @bleachbrs_en
Hashtag: #BraveSouls

Facebook
https://www.facebook.com/BleachBS.en/

Recommended OS
Android 4.0 or later

The following permissions are necessary to play this game.
READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
GET_ACCOUNTS

The first two permissions are necessary for the game to be able to store game data in an external location. These permissions only apply to Android versions earlier than 6. For Android 6 or later, you can still play the game even if you decline these permissions.

The GET_ACCOUNTS permission is necessary to enable push notifications.

-----------------------------------------------------
© Tite Kubo/Shueisha, TV TOKYO, dentsu, Pierrot

comments: I can't discredit the actual game here. It is fun, great use of the bleach story, awesomely cut. The problem is more with loading the game, I downloaded the game quick, which I found surprising and then spent an hour and a half downloading further content... I could forgive this but!! I still have to be online to play the game... Not sure why. Please introduce offline playing. Also, every time I come away from the app, when I go back it has to load all over again. Fix these 2 and I'll give 5 stars.

This game has been by far the most I have ever had on a mobile phone. I have just gone past 200 days playtime and still enjoy it immensly. KLab have created a great community around this game and are constantly adding new content and are rewarding players enough resources to keep playing for free. It is a great game model and have recommended it to many friends since. Be they bleach fans or not, the combat looks great and is fun while staying challenging when doing raids and other end game content. Nightmare mode certainly is a challenge when it comes around. Well done KLab.

Not a super Bleach fan, but I do enjoy the anime (not those damn filler tho). Anyway, I like how they have the character pack (monthly) because if a person can't get it through normal summon, they can get it from there. It's a win win situation, and it's not p2w just because someone decided to purchase it. A f2p van archive the same as a p2w through hard work and luck. Keep up the great work.

Overall its a good game, however there's a few minor and one major issue with the game.   Controls for the most part are great. Expect when trying to use one of you special moves, and it registers ultimate.  Game play is good.  Nothing to complian about.  Summons is where the major issues are. Now i understand its random, but it gets old rather quick pulling the exact same characters over again. For the most part recently and before now that's all i get same pull. I have gotten lucky and gotten a gew decent summons. But its disappointing getting the same stuff. Though you gain large exp crystal. It sucks. I've been after 5 star unohana since i started. No luck. So summons desperately needs to be fixed

Best mobile game I've played. Constantly updating the game in terms of event, features and characters. Very generous when it comes to earning in game currency. It doesn't feel like it wants my wallet like other mobile games. More games need to follow KLabs as an example of how to make a great game!

Overall good game but there is somethig i'd like to point out: 1. Characters 1-4 stars cannot be evolved once maxxed they stay like this so it is meaningless to develop them 2.my 6 stars ukitake with maxxed soul tree currently level 90 is weaker than he was at 5 stars level 80 with maxxed skill tree. 3.special skills on 6 star characters cost too much for the benefits that you can get from them. Overall good game but it needs improvement

results.descriptionHTML:
Meet a happy jelly blob who dreams of soaring through the skies!

Help our friendly dessert reach new heights in this action packed game. Bounce from platform to platform, dodge the mean flies, and grab everything you can to get the highest score.

Great fun to play with friends and family! Who can jump the highest in Happy Jump?

Brought to you by Retro Dreamer & Noodlecake Studios.

comments: Makes me sooo happy Eee so my half brother and sister has this on their I pad and I played it and got addicted. Then about a month ago I was looking though Google play store and found this again and ugh it's just so adorable. Maybe this is a game meant for small children bit I'm 13 and still play this because you only live once 😊... oh the flies need to go please

Great overall... One bug to report: When I open the app, it closes immediately! :( Plz include more characters and a fortnight update so it won't close automatically forever!! Hmm... Maybe monthly update. And a save file so I don't lose progress. And maybe some achievements so this game isn't that aimless?

I had an older version on my previous phone, but forgot to reinstall on this one.  Flash forward almost a year, I was looking through my old phone and decided I wanted to play this again.  MAN has this improved!  It is do much fun and so addicting!  My only wish is that there was an offline mode so I could play on the go without spending data.

Won"t open Was really enjoying this game but lately it won't open. I tap on the icon, the screen goes black and then just goes back to my home page. I've tried turning my phone off and on and opening the game from the play store but nothing works. Very annoyed.

Ads I've had this app for years and the whole family loves it, but now they have racy ads at the bottom. For real?!  This is one of the most imminent games out there and I can't let my littles play it. Please change this.

Act of violence To be honest, this game completely ruined my life. The gameplay is complete crap. The phone tilting mechanics are so unoriginal and bias. The main plot to the game is vain and confusing. The game could use a much better story writer, and graphic designer. Overall, needs much improvement.

results.descriptionHTML:
★ Over 25 million users worldwide and counting
★ Named "Top Developer" by Google.
★ Featured in the book "Amazing Android Apps for Dummies"
★ Top communication/social app for years
★ Completely FREE. No hidden fee or ads.

Instantly speak to or text one or many friends at once with the touch of a button. No setup needed, just have them in your address book or as Facebook friends. Fast and simple - TiKL turns your phone into the ultimate Push To Talk (PTT) Walkie Talkie with instant messenger capability.

★ Quick one-on-one/group voice push-to-talk calls.
★ Lightning fast chat with delivery confirmation.
★ Uses data connection only. No voice minutes or SMS used for TiKL calls or chats.
★ Works across carriers and Android/iPhone/iPad/iPod Touch.
★ Connects on WiFi, 3G, 4G, EDGE and GPRS.
★ Create widgets by long pressing any blank space on your home screen.
★ What if their device is off? No worries. TiKL automatically delivers your messages the moment it is turned on.

We are on Facebook and Twitter:

http://www.tikl.mobi
http://www.facebook.com/TiKL.TouchToTalk
http://twitter.com/TiKLTouchToTalk

To ensure that you do not miss any incoming TiKL calls or chats, please launch the app at least once after installing/upgrading it.

If things don't work after updating, please uninstall and reinstall.
results.title: TiKL Touch Talk Walkie Talkie
results.summary: Featured by Google - Real Push-To-Talk with Chat/Text/Messenger

★ Shows which contacts have the app

★ Added option to use the volume-up button to PTT. Enable it in menu Settings.
★ Send and receive unlimited free picture, video and voice chat messages, delivered super fast!
★ Create home screen widgets for individual TiKL favorite or TiKL chat.

comments: So you have to keep the app open all the time or it don't work? What good is it if I am busy doing other stuff on my phone and someone tries to message me I won't even know because it doesn't come through unless the talk app it up with window, which how am I or the other party supposed to know when they are contacting me? Thought it would be like the most popular nextel two way. Any advice on settings so that I can fix this flaw?

I've had Tikl on several phones over the past 5 years or so. It's still fairly handy, as a 2 way, or as a voice messaging service. On the down side, nothing really new or innovative has been added and it seems like noone really is supporting it now. I'd like to see the option (or a easy way) to leave a video message. That would provide more satisfaction. One last note: reliability has also suffered, relating to voice messages, over the past year...

it's 2016 and its still the best After testing every messaging app including the new bbm,there is nothing better than Tikl.the speed is fast and the walkie talkie is instant unlike all the other talk send apps.with Tikl you get the best of both worlds.you got the Nextel network style calls which I miss and you get all the cool messaging functions that you get from every other messaging app but with a better simpler interface.I just wish the developer with stop worrying about Talkray and whatever other apps he is developing
Error after error Firstly my sim does not a number programed into it, then app suggests using facebook. That doesnt work either. Error in development. Two closed doors in my face, I uninstall.
Better than OK But not 5 star because author decided to annoy us with ads in lieu of having an ad free paid version. Bummer!
Facebook support? Dev this have been the best app ever I don't know why you don't fix the Facebook feature so we can enjoy international TiKL. Please dev.

results.descriptionHTML:
One of Google's "Best Apps of 2014 & 2015" with over 2 million downloads, the MailOnline (Daily Mail) app gives you everything you've come to expect and love from the world's largest English-language newspaper website, but with quick, easy and free access on your phone -- accessible even when you're offline.

Feed your daily addiction with stories & photos from all our top channels: US & World News, Celebrity & Showbiz, Sports, Femail, Science & Tech, Health, Money, Travel, and many more!

See what everyone's talking about and download our app today.

FEATURES:
• Over 15 Channels of must-read articles and photos - that's over 800+ original stories every day!
• Offline Mode: Pre-load stories & galleries to access when you're offline or without reception - great for commutes!
• Select a Location: Choose from US, UK or Rest of World to ensure you get the news most relevant to you.
• Express Yourself: Post your Comments on articles or Rate other user's comments that you like or dislike.
• Custom Settings: Select when data and images sync based on your preferred connection (Wi-Fi or 3G).
• Choose which Channels you want to sync and when.

If you have any trouble with the app or want to suggest new features and feedback, please email us at androidapp@mailonline.co.uk so we can help.
results.title: Daily Mail Online
results.summary: Daily Mail Online - News, Gossip, Sports & Photos from the No.1 newspaper site.
recentChanges: • Videos are now browsable through Gallery
• You can now hide channels from Settings --> Arrange Channels
We value your feedback. If you experience any bugs or have a suggestion on how to make the application better, please email us at: androidapp@mailonline.co.uk
