comments: What another idiotic update. If it ain't broke, don't fix it. Videos in the main body? Now you are beginning to look like all the other news apps. How many open the video news, probably less than the normal editorials. Print the results, prove me wrong. I will apologise if you are right.

I still like the app on my phone but since beginning of February I cannot read it on my tablet (which is an older version of Android than my phone) as it continuously stops. Started about the time that video feeds within the body of the stories began. Really disappointing and annoying.
Need to install a search facility to find  your own comments. Fed up of never being able to find them.
3rd time I have installed this damned app.  Does not download corresponding photographs. Very disappointed!!!!
Lefties. Daily Mail, your daily source to fake, garbage so called 'news'
This used to be my favourite news app but now crashes everytime I open it.

results.descriptionHTML:
FROM THE MAKERS OF CSR RACING! Drag-strip legends from the last 60 years come to life in CSR Classics.

RACE OVER 50 OF THE GREATEST CARS EVER MADE including the Shelby Mustang GT500, Ford GT40, Plymouth Superbird and other classics models from BMW, Chevrolet, Dodge, Ford, Mercedes, Plymouth, Pontiac, Shelby and more!

RESTORE YOUR RIDE and transform your cars from rusty unloved shells into gorgeous icons of driving!

CLASH OF THE TITANS! - Cobra vs. Mercedes 300 SL, Dodge Superbee vs. Chevrolet Camaro, Ford Mustang vs. Skyline GT-R!

EASY TO PLAY, HARD TO MASTER - Play a quick race in a spare minute, or commit to topping the online leaderboards.

MULTIPLAYER ‘RACE THE WORLD’ - Challenge millions of CSR Classics players to race up the leaderboards to win special cars and prizes not available anywhere else!

OWN THE CITY THAT NEVER SLEEPS

Take on the gangs that own the city and face off against the toughest drivers out there. Have you got what it takes to own the streets?




Requires 1GB of RAM and Android OS 4.0 and above.

Make sure you play with your device connected to the internet to gain access to the latest content and features, and to ensure that your profile is backed up.

PLEASE NOTE! CSR Classics is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money.

To prevent unauthorised purchases, select “Set or Change PIN” from the Google Play settings menu, create a PIN, then enable the “Use PIN for Purchases” option. You will then be required to enter your PIN before every transaction.

CSR Classics is published by NaturalMotion Games.

--------------------------------------
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/csrclassics
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/CSRClassics
Subscribe to our YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/naturalmotiongames

Terms of Use: http://www.naturalmotion.com/terms-of-use/
Privacy Policy: http://www.naturalmotion.com/privacy-policy/

comments: Pay to play A lesson in economics, or how to spend money on nothing. Every car should be able to be purchased with cash or coin, no exceptions. Especially when you make them necessary to complete given tasks. They should also be attainable on a reasonably given timeline. A heads up on what to expect next for purchase is recommended  as well. Thank you for your time and decently thought out gaming experience.

Makes you watch adds! The game lets you speed up wait time by watching a 30 second add. The problem is the adds don't play. So its a useless futile loop. Somtimes they play sometimes "video advert not available" it's time consuming and frustrating. Game play itself is very basic. The only redeeming feature is the detail and selection of cars.

Fun but NOT COOL This game is fun, don't get me wrong, but I just signed in on a new phone and it won't let me play unless I give it access to my Contacts, Location and Telephone. For what kind of invasive reason does a racing game need these permissions!?

Very good but I have 2 improvements I absolutely love this game but it takes waaaaaay too long to refill fuel. If only it took like 2 mins or something for one gas.  Also if every time you level up you get a gas refill like other games.  If other people agree just say so.  Also pleeeeeaaaaaaase respond

Alot of cars take so much gold, which is hard to earn, and gas takes forever to refill. Also the free gold scams you into getting a waste of space game for nothing.DO NOT use the free gold option. Tapjoy tricks you into installing an app or purchasing something, and when u email them for free gold missing they do not respond. All the cars shown in the pics before you get the app need a ton of gold btw.

Favorite Game on phone This is my favorite game on my phone mainly because I love classic cars and racing games but I wish the game had realistic car sounds and the sounds changed as you restored the car. Right now it took me until my dad and uncle mentioning it to me that the cars sound like the cars in the original Pole Position.

results.descriptionHTML:
Want to know what driving an 18 Wheeler feels like? Truck Simulator USA offers a real trucking experience that will let you explore amazing locations. This American Truck Simulator features many semi truck brands, with realistic engine sounds and detailed interiors! Drive across America, transport cool stuff such as vehicles, gasoline, gravel, food, and many more… Become a professional truck driver and enjoy the career and the online multiplayer mode!

Drive Across American, play Truck Simulator USA!

The best Truck Simulator 2017!

Features:
• Many American Truck brands
• USA, Canada and Mexico
• Different climate locations: desert, snow, mountain, city
• Improved Controls (tilt steering, buttons or virtual steering wheel)
• Manual Transmission with H-Shifter and Clutch
• Realistic Engine Sounds (V8, Cummins, etc..)
• Lots of trailers to transport
• Multiplayer Mode and Career Mode
• Visual and mechanical damage on vehicles
• New weather system (snow, rain, sun...)
• Request new trucks or features on our Social Pages!

comments: I always like to play Simulator games from Ovidiu Pop....But in this game there seems to be an issue or bug with GUI....when I change the graphics setting to "Medium" or "High" game will  be slow down and got stuck , and I am unable to play at all in high graphics mode. I have to select only "LOW" graphics mode.....Apart from this issue, everything else are fine....Just need to fix the graphics....

Need to fix the glitching in the cars it sucks when you are driving down the highway and a car runs in front of you or a glitches out of his Lane Canada aggravating love this game please fix one more thing can you please drop the the ticket prices down and a glitching on it too especially outdoor lights if I don't cross the line I should not have to pay 500
Delete the clutch option, i hate it. it does'nt make sense! Otherwise, It's PERFECT!! Almost like "18 Wheels of steel: American long haul" but mobile version!!!
Being able to make control adjustments during game play would be great instead of going back to the home screen kinda glitchy on my s5 but i deal with it its alright by me
They need to put chain's for the trucks speed limit signs up. Construction signs up.toll both s more lanes on the highway. They need to add over sized trails. And over wait trails..

Its a really good trucking game, its the best so far the graphics are pretty good everything is realistic like if you were the one driving the semi in real life. I would like some of missions would require you to stop by the scales

results.descriptionHTML:
Stay close to your favorite Mexican restaurant with the official Uncle Julio’s Amigo Especial Loyalty Program App.

With this FREE app, you can:

· Reserve Your Table – There’s no need to search for a number or call. With this app, simply fill out the quick and easy reservation form and boom, you’re set.

· Find a Restaurant – Whether at home or on the go, find the nearest Uncle Julio’s with the touch of a button.

· Track Loyalty Points – Put the calculator away. Our Amigo Especial app automatically tracks your loyalty points, giving you an up-to-date total as you climb through the loyalty tiers.

· Explore the Menu – In a rush or just really hungry? Check out the full menu right on the app.

Uncle Julio’s is bringing made-from-scratch Mexican straight to your table. Featuring fresh ingredients, and fresh recipes, enjoy everything from sizzling fajitas from our Mesquite grill, to handmade margaritas and Swirls. Not to mention our tableside guacamole, which is prepared exactly how you like it.

comments: Disappointed The food was a 10 like always. Best Mexican that I have been eating for 15 years starting back in VA. I now live in Houston and was so glad they were here now but last night was my      bday and it was the worse service ever!!!!! I hope this issue is addressed because someone who is not familiar with this restaurant  would probably  never come back! A table of ten we spent a nice amount of $. Thank God their food was superb.
Great They now have a rewards system
Best salsa on this side of the Rio Grand Warn juicy and hot
Best Best

results.descriptionHTML:
Angry Mad gorilla Wild Attack

Live life as real wild gorilla and survive in the wilderness as long as you can.
Hunt or be hunted be a part of ultimate battle between human and wildlife jungle animals, play as wild ape and take down human hunters in Angry Mad gorilla Wild Attack game.
You're an angry Monkey, play as African smartest species like chimpanzees.
Hunt out innocent animals and make them your prey. They can smell you, so don't make any noises when you're out to get them.!
Perfect 3D Environment with Really Amazing Graphics and Huge Environment with Lots of Different Animals!
Fast Attack everything you see to earn points and be at top. Go for hunting, look for your next innocent goal to kill furious beasts, execute the target to Survive in the Wild!
Danger is at every turn in the wild. Play smart and attack wisely. Gain experience and boost skills to hunt deathly or weaker animals.
Rampageous simian brings the most incredible, action packed survival simulator to life! Try the most advanced and realistic animal simulator.
Live life as a hunting anthropoid and try to dominate this wilderness!
Forest Wild Life Simulator 3D is filled with different type of animals, you can jump, pounce and scratch, a map is provided to scale the whole forest to find the target to catch.
You can play as real wild thing and try to become the most powerful deadly animal in the wildness. you can also use protector to protect yourself.
Be the strongest Monkey ever. You can also eat other animals after hunting them.
Now a days Life of wild animal in danger because of pollution & City Construction & Extreme Crime Terrorist activity.

Key features:-

- Jumping Button
- Score Points
- Big Terrain to Explore
- Nice fort With activity people
- Great sounds of real gorilla
- Pause Button
- High Quality Graphics in a forest setting

Enjoy Angry Mad gorilla Wild Attack enjoy this game!

results.descriptionHTML:
Papa Pear Saga, from the makers of Candy Crush Saga & Farm Heroes Saga!

It's a Papa Fiesta! Bounce your way through this unique puzzle game.

Take aim and unleash Papa Pear to bounce and boing around a wacky world of fruity pegs, hazelnuts and crazy chillies. Exciting adventures await you in the Fruity Forest, Pearsylvania and beyond. BOING!

Take on this epic Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!

Papa Pear Saga is completely free to play but some in-game items such as extra moves or lives will require payment.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms

-------------------------------

Papa Pear Saga features:

• Pearfect graphics that will have you bouncing for joy 
• Boosters and power ups to help with those challenging levels 
• Special items to unlock by completing levels 
• Easy and fun to play, challenging to master 
• Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!
• Easily sync the game between devices and unlock full game features when connected to the Internet

-------------------------------

Already a fan of Papa Pear Saga? Like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for the latest news: 
facebook.com/PapaPearSaga 
twitter.com/PapaPearSaga 

Last but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Papa Pear Saga!

Come play and see it for yourself!

Can't I just watch a video ad? I'm not gonna mug myself off spending my hard earned on that once I run out if the free gold, get a grip.
Excellent game. But some levels are unattainable. Esp level 605, 618, 619. Glad 580 was fixed. So very difficult. Level 621 and 630  are impossible levels. I think the techs are smoking socks
This has crashed on me for at least a month or two. If it doesn't come back, I will uninstall it.  I'm disgusted!

I wrote you what I think about you game but that can disappear when you don't agree with the way you play the cheats way no one gets those reviewes but if thats what you have to put up with plus the constant adds to play for free so be it I get your slop but don't play the game for me I'm quite capable of figuring it out for myself  no  dementure yet goofball  so let me play the game while I can you lovely caring souls
Played fine then today the graphics have gone on the game. Uninstalled and reinstalled but didn't fix the problem. Not my device as all other games are fine

Whow did I beat papa pear I can't believe there's no more, the makers must not be as smart as kings others makers , now open up the next part of this game shame on you people to act like this , it's a board game it goes on and on and on

results.descriptionHTML:
Over 50 MILLION players riding in the frontier! Download Trials Frontier now and experience the ultimate skill-based racing game on your smartphone and tablet!
Explore a massive world of adventure on your motorcycle. Battle players from around the world and dominate global leaderboards on every track!
Ride your bike on unfairly addictive tracks while you perform slick wheelies, crazy jumps, and flips mid-air!

Race, explore, upgrade, and compete. Accept no substitutes!
Built from the ground up for touch-based controls, Trials Frontier combines the amazing, physics-based gameplay of Trials with the wild, wicked western frontier.

“Looking like the real deal.” – POCKET CAFE

With Trials Frontier, the award-winning developer RedLynx brings its best-selling and critically-acclaimed Trials series to mobile for the first time.

You want features? We got mad features:
- PHYSICS-BASED gameplay that feels just right.
- An addictive PvP SYSTEM with ranked seasons and insane rewards!
- 250+ challenging MISSIONS on more than 200 unique hardcore tracks!
- Upgrade and customize 15+ WICKED BIKES, each with their own unique tuning paths.
- Exciting WEEKLY TOURNAMENTS to showcase your best time for worldwide fame!
- Perfected GHOST RACING. Race any ghost on the leaderboards of any track!
- A huge world with more than 50 hours of story driven gameplay in 10 gorgeous ENVIRONMENT.

This game can be downloaded over the air, no Wi-Fi needed to play!
Disclaimer : PLEASE NOTE! Trials Frontier is completely free to play, however some game items can be purchased for real money. You can disable the ability to make in-app purchase in your device settings at any time.


-
Join the Trials Community!
FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/trialsfrontier.game
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/trialsfrontier
INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/trials.frontier

Join the Ubisoft community!
FACEBOOK: http://facebook.com/UbisoftMobileGames
TWITTER: http://twitter.com/ubisoftmobile
YOUTUBE: http://youtube.com/user/Ubisoft
results.title: Trials Frontier
results.summary: RedLynx's Trials series comes to mobile!
recentChanges: Introducing the KTM Rally Challenge – the ultimate test of skill!

Ride the all new legendary KTM 450 Rally through 4 weekly legs of 10 tracks each and bring glory to your new team, the Desert Wings! Race hard on every track to score your best time & dominate the weekly leaderboards! Win grand rewards based on your performance including blueprints to the KTM 450 Rally and 8 radical new tracks!
results.description: Over 50 MILLION players riding in the frontier! Download Trials Frontier now and experience the ultimate skill-based racing game on your smartphone and tablet! Explore a massive world of adventure on your motorcycle. Battle players from around the world and dominate global leaderboards on every track!Ride your bike on unfairly addictive tracks while you perform slick wheelies, crazy jumps, and flips mid-air! Race, explore, upgrade, and compete. Accept no substitutes! Built from the ground up for touch-based controls, Trials Frontier combines the amazing, physics-based gameplay of Trials with the wild, wicked western frontier.“Looking like the real deal.” – POCKET CAFEWith Trials Frontier, the award-winning developer RedLynx brings its best-selling and critically-acclaimed Trials series to mobile for the first time. You want features? We got mad features: - PHYSICS-BASED gameplay that feels just right. - An addictive PvP SYSTEM with ranked seasons and insane rewards!- 250+ challenging MISSIONS on more than 200 unique hardcore tracks!- Upgrade and customize 15+ WICKED BIKES, each with their own unique tuning paths.- Exciting WEEKLY TOURNAMENTS to showcase your best time for worldwide fame! - Perfected GHOST RACING. Race any ghost on the leaderboards of any track!- A huge world with more than 50 hours of story driven gameplay in 10 gorgeous ENVIRONMENT. This game can be downloaded over the air, no Wi-Fi needed to play!Disclaimer : PLEASE NOTE! Trials Frontier is completely free to play, however some game items can be purchased for real money. You can disable the ability to make in-app purchase in your device settings at any time.-Join the Trials Community!FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/trialsfrontier.gameTWITTER: https://twitter.com/trialsfrontierINSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/trials.frontierJoin the Ubisoft community!FACEBOOK: http://facebook.com/UbisoftMobileGamesTWITTER: http://twitter.com/ubisoftmobileYOUTUBE: http://youtube.com/user/Ubisoft
comments: I love this game so much, but... I've been playing this for months, and I've made a lot of Progress. I've put tons of time into Trials, thankfully haven't spent any real money, and progressed all the way to the point where you unlock your first Tier 3 tracks. Only, this new update came out, and I enjoyed it for a day or two, when suddenly I open the game and I'M BACK AT THE START! Nothing I do let's me turn my progress back to the point where it was. This is truly a great game, but I refuse to replay the whole think because of a glitch.

The game itself is brilliant but everything that surrounds the game is infuriating. Constant connection issues, have to force close and log in each time, lose challenges because of lost connection, not to mention I clearly cross the line ahead of the other racer and somehow still lose the race. This game makes me want to throw my phone at the wall. I would delete it but the game itself is too damn good. This game was forged in hell by Satan Himself.

Freezes up when I go to accept the "Byte Sized Memory" quest. And the fuel thing is kinda a pain. Also so is the reward gain vs cost of upgrades to the bikes. But I'm still having 'some' fun with it. Edit: keeps not logging me in either. I am on WiFi and connection shouldn't be a problem. Starting to hate it. EDIT 2: Apparently uninstalling and reinstalling the game fixed my broken quest problem.

Loses appeal fast. Many glitches now. Can't spin the prize spinner anymore so no way to get those new tracks. Still a tedious grind through some missions and others require even more grinding to level up your bike. Not a patch on the proper versions of trials which I love incidentally.

2 questions 1. I'm playing the game on two devices, logged in under the same name. Both devices have different game data now(like gems, money, tracks open etc) can this be fixed?   2. The new challenge isn't communicating with my track scores. I'll beat my record by 2 sec but I don't move up on the ranking. Can this be fixed?

Bottom line, it doesn't matter if it's any good, everything gets washed away by bad customer service and shadyness. I've downloaded two games and completed a survey and received nothing. I emailed them and sent them screenshots and they're like well actually you've already received your gems. Yeah. No I did not. I'd like to see some screenshots on what exactly I spent over 50 imaginary gems on. They're basically a bunch of liars who will give you the runaround and act like you're crazy because they are right and you are wrong. They're all talk and no action.

milestones.description: By 2030, reduce the global maternal mortality ratio to less than 70 per 100,000 live births

By 2030, end preventable deaths of newborns and children under 5 years of age, with all countries aiming to reduce neonatal mortality to at least as low as 12 per 1,000 live births and under-5 mortality to at least as low as 25 per 1,000 live births
By 2030, end the epidemics of AIDS, tuberculosis, malaria and neglected tropical diseases and combat hepatitis, water-borne diseases and other communicable diseases
By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being
Strengthen the prevention and treatment of substance abuse, including narcotic drug abuse and harmful use of alcohol
By 2020, halve the number of global deaths and injuries from road traffic accidents

By 2030, ensure universal access to sexual and reproductive health-care services, including for family planning, information and education, and the integration of reproductive health into national strategies and programmes

Achieve universal health coverage, including financial risk protection, access to quality essential health-care services and access to safe, effective, quality and affordable essential medicines and vaccines for all
By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination
Strengthen the implementation of the World Health Organization Framework Convention on Tobacco Control in all countries, as appropriate

Support the research and development of vaccines and medicines for the communicable and non-communicable diseases that primarily affect developing countries, provide access to affordable essential medicines and vaccines, in accordance with the Doha Declaration on the TRIPS Agreement and Public Health, which affirms the right of developing countries to use to the full the provisions in the Agreement on Trade-Related Aspects of Intellectual Property Rights regarding flexibilities to protect public health, and, in particular, provide access to medicines for all

Substantially increase health financing and the recruitment, development, training and retention of the health workforce in developing countries, especially in least developed countries and small island developing States
Strengthen the capacity of all countries, in particular developing countries, for early warning, risk reduction and management of national and global health risks

results.descriptionHTML:
S Health provides core features to keep up your body fit and healthy. It will record and analyze your daily activities and habits to help maintain successful diet and lead healthy lifestyle.

Whether you walk or run, hike or bike, play indoor or outdoor sports, you can add and track the various physical exercises and activities in a single step using the various built-in trackers. You can also record your step count activity using Pedometer.

S Health helps to create a balanced lifestyle pattern by recording a variety of information like your food, caffeine and water intake details.

Provide your daily snacks, food, water and caffeine intake and track your diet and weight on the go while staying comfortable using the sleep & stress tracker.

Manage health and environmental records such as heart rate, blood pressure, blood glucose levels, stress, weight & SpO₂ using built-in sensors and third party devices.

Trackers enable user to easily and quickly check meaningful data based on user preferences. The intuitive charts, helpful tips and physical exercise programs guide you to achieve your fitness and diet goals. You can also personalize your Dashboard by adding or removing Goals.

Manage your fitness activities, track your weight and monitor your diet using Samsung Galaxy and Gear devices.

The App supports all Samsung smartphones starting from Galaxy S3 onwards and includes Non-Samsung Android smartphones as well.

Exercise programs such as Baby steps to 5K, Run 5K and so on are available to take your running to the next level and you will be guided via voice prompts during workout. You can also listen to music while doing your physical exercises.

Compete with your friends and check your ranking. You can compete with your friends in the address box once your Samsung account is registered. On "together" section, you can select your own competitor and compare your steps with people of different age group across the globe.

Check daily health news of your preference with customized news feed. Keep your body strong and healthy with tips offered by health professionals.

Discover the best health and fitness apps that can connect with S Health. Many health apps including 'Technogym' and 'Coach by Cigna' can be linked with S Health. You can track and manage your diet, health and exercise data from each App in one place.

Tablets and some mobile devices may not be supported. Some functions may not be available based on regions/service providers/devices. S Health requires Android OS 4.4 or above.

S Health supports over 70 languages, including English, French, and Chinese. An English language version is available for the rest of the world.

Please note that S Health is intended for fitness and wellness purposes only and is not intended for use in the diagnosis of disease or other conditions, or in the cure, mitigation, treatment, or prevention of disease.

S Health protects your private health data securely. All Samsung Galaxy models released after August 2016, Knox enabled S Health service will be available. Please be noted that Knox enabled S Health service will not be available from rooted mobile.
results.title: S Health
results.summary: Lifestyle companion to track your fitness, weight, diet, food & sleep.
recentChanges: - Various bug fixes and improvements applied.
- You can measure your stress level along with your heart rate and oxygen saturation.

comments: Really enjoy the app, and use it daily to track calories, steps, and different types of exercises. I do wish the weekly summary still included the net gain/lose number for calories, and am patiently waiting for a scanner to be added for bar codes. It would make tracking food so much easier.  Any chance those things are coming back and/or being added soon?

I love this app!  I like to see how many steps I can reach in a day. Plus It keeps track of my walking and the calories I burn it's so cool to see all the information and it's all in one place. The only thing I can't seem to change is the daily goal steps. I want to move it up...Idk if I'm over looking it or if it's not an opinion that would be helpful to add if it's not.  Other than that I love S Health!

Hi Support, I love the pedometer but it stopped counting my steps after I dropped my phone. I have a Samsung Alpha Galaxy. The phone only fell 3 feet, was in a case, and otherwise was fine. Is there any way to recalibrate the pedometer to start getting an accurate step count again? I already tried restarting the phone and updating the app to the latest version, but that didn't work. It's still not counting steps properly.

I love this app, I have it along with the gear fit 2 and it's amazing! It's user friendly and easy to track your progress with. I would love to see one option become available though. I work nightshift and get all my steps in between 7pm and 7am and it gets frustrating when my day is split in half! Or combined with my "next day"! I'd love to be able to change when the new day starts, when my steps reset!

This had been my favourite fitness tracking app since I use gear s2 and samsung note 4. However, now that I am using gear s2 and xiaomi redmi note 4, the app does not seem to be able to capture the gps data from gear s2 and plot my running track into the map. It was working perfectly in my samsung note 4 but now I could not figure out how to make this work in xiaomi redmi note 4. Other data such as running distance, steps taken, etc are from gear s2 are captured correctly by the app.

Great App when you have a Gear Fit 2. However I would love to see the following improvements in the future. 1. There should be easy sync to Google fit app as a lot of app still do not have syncing with S Health option  2. Challenges with friends should not be limited to only steps. There should be more options. 3. While I add exercises that have reps involved manually, it only asks for time duration to be added and not number of reps or sets. That option should be added.  Thanks Team for this great app. Keep improving to beat all other fitness apps.

results.descriptionHTML:
Get on the right tracker—ours! Whether you’re looking to lose weight, maintain it, or improve your health, The Habits of Health Dashboard by Take Shape For Life helps do it all. Track nutrition, exercise, weight, measurements, even sleep quality and quantity, and much more!

Keep your health and wellness in your own hands and at your fingertips.

Habits of Health Dashboard by Take Shape For Life tracks:
• Healthy Eating—meals, water, and nutrition
• Healthy Weight—weight and measurements (with or without Fitbit®)
• Healthy Sleep—sleep (with or without Fitbit®)
• Healthy Motion—exercise (with or without Fitbit®)
• Healthy Mind—wellbeing and mindfulness
• Progress, with graphs for comparison

The Tracker can be used entirely on its own or with any Fitbit® device.

The best feature is the Coach Console. Clients can connect directly with their Health Coaches in order to get the most supportive experience possible, as Health Coaches can view progress and challenges in real time.

No matter where you are on the road to Optimal Health—whether you’re taking your first step or continuing your journey—Habits of Health Dashboard makes health your habit!
results.title: HOH Dashboard
results.summary: Habits of Health Tracker by Take Shape For Life
recentChanges: Fixes for app crashes and other bug fixes.

comments: Pretty Good! Overall, I've found this version to be pretty easy to use. Definitely easier than a previous version I used. I love the fact that it helps you track "wellness" and not just weight. 3 point to consider in updates: 1. Adding notes is helpful because I can put data I'm entering in context if needed. Right now, I do this in a separate place 2.  Pedometer would be great addition (currently use samsung's native app). 3. Wish the "water tracking" had visual/sound effects. Could increase effectiveness. Thnx!

Th e app is easy to use. It crashes a lot on me though. Would be nice if it also integrated with not just fitbit but Jawbone UP24 as well. The other thing I'd like to see is the ability to create a meal from ingredients so you don't have to keep re-entering it over and over if it's something you eat often.

Not sure what is going on with this app! Keeps telling me my login request fails even though I am entering the correct info. I've clicked forgot my password and then change it and it will work a couple of times but then can't login.  Just started doing this a couple of days ago. VERY FRUSTRATING!!!

Hard to use Logging your food is hard a lot of the time is says can't find something.  I connected my fitbit and it won't transfer the data unless I disconnect and reconnect. Very annoying. I've used multiple food diaries before and they are much easier to use than this one. I also hate how it rounds your measurements,  not the best for keeping the most accurate results.

It's a decent food tracker, especially since all the medifast meals are already programed into it. However it crashes a lot! More than have the time when I try to open app to add a meal it crashes and I have to go back in. But my biggest beef with the app is it's basically worthless as a weight/measurements tracker. It doesn't let you to enter in decimals at all so you're stuck trying to decide to which whole pound (or whole inch for the measurements) to round. It's utterly ridiculous.

Needs work I have the Amazon Fire Phone. I have been using the app for two days. I would have thought it would have refreshed itself and stayed fresh the next day. I was inputting today's food information but it added it to the previous day's total. I tried to edit, but it's still giving me difficulties and not syncing correctly. It doesn't sync well with the Dashboard webpage either. The dates are all smooshed together on the graphs. Landscape view doesn't work. I will see if they have the app for the iPad.

results.descriptionHTML:
This app is your guide to fitness, good health, weight loss, diet-plan, nutrition, and remedies for diseases such as hypertension, anxiety, allergy, insomnia and many more.

Good health is quintessential for happy living and with this app you can access the info anywhere you go. The app has several sections on health that address different queries you may have.

Sections include Health Boosters, Health Benefits, Home Remedies, Health Tips and Nutrition News.

Health Boosters helps you discover remedies for a particular disorder. You can search for any disease and find various food items, oils and herbs that aid in relieving the disease symptoms and help in curing it.

Health Benefits section helps you in finding benefits of various herbs, cereals, essential oils, other foods and exercises.

Home Remedies section gives you access to simple and effective remedies that help to fight health conditions.

Health Tips section provides quick tips about good health and well-being.

And keep yourself updated with the latest in the field of health with our section on Nutrition News.
results.title: Health, Nutrition & Diet Guide
results.summary: Foods, tips, diet plans & remedies for weight loss, stress, diabetes, heart etc.

comments: Excellent,best,and  useful app Its a very good app for the health benefits keep going guys I real appreciate a good job u have done greatest of all. A century ahead of other But you should put some pictures of the diseases when directing its remedy. Pictures of disease in question .

I was looking forward for some health and diet tips for pcos (polycystic ovarian syndrome ) but could not found it.. so it would be really appreciable if regarding pcos also there is some genuine diet information. Rest all was impressive :)
I can't believe the solid information on here and they haven't tried to sell me anything. Ads are not annoying like most free apps. Keep up the good work & thank you Organic Facts
Very informative I like how you can search for anything and they have a wide variety of selection. Tho the only issue is I cannot find any sources..but the info seems about right!
Great info on nutrition! I loved the app! It provides great info regarding essential things that we are unaware of. One such thing is home remedies and nutritional facts! Superb work!!

Excellent health app Thank you so much for all the wonderful, useful information on the benefits, wealth of knowledge on so many things for our health. And it's hard to believe it's free. Knowledge is power!

results.descriptionHTML:
Based on the individual’s body constitution, one should follow the food regimen and nutrition that is best suited for their health and well-being.

Each constitution’s food intake plan is categorized in 3 groups based on the energetic nature and the effect of the foods on the body as follows:

* Good for You: Foods that are most beneficial for your health. Consuming them balances your organ system.*
* Better to Avoid: Food that you should eat in moderation and rarely, and should not be a large portion of any meal.*
* Bad for You: Foods that are harmful to your well- being, and contribute to your illness.

See your Verity Eight Constitution Medicine provider to determine your body constitution,
results.title: Verity ECM
results.summary: Locate foods and understand their effect on you based on your constitution.
recentChanges: - See foods in a particular food group.
- Filter out foods you should avoid or foods bad for you.
- Food list no longer looses your list position if you are returning from a particular food detail view.

results.descriptionHTML:
Staying active is Just Easier Together.

We believe that we can help people to be healthier and improve their well being by having an active lifestyle. In order to achieve that, our aim is to make sports accessible for all. The JET app connects like-minded people and enable them to find and create customised sport events according to their availabilities, level and location.

Every working adult knows how it can be difficult sometimes to fit in a sociale life with an healthy and active lifestyle at the same time. Since time schedules and sport interests can be changing quickly nowadays, there is no need to engage any contract to join JET and it provides people additional/various sport options.

JET adapts to the sport matching according to your desire.

Take part or organise sport events in few clicks.
Connect with like-minded people and find challenging, motivating and training buddies
Have fun while/and improving your lifestyle

JET is also a platform which allows professional fitness to expand their network by posting sport events that they lead.

Not need of any subscription plan, our JET community is FREE to join.

This app is for you if you:

have a goal to have an active lifestyle
are too busy to subscribe in any fitness gym or sport clubs
don’t share the same sport interest and availabilities with your friends
are looking for missing players to start your sport games
like sharing good moment with others
would like to socialise with like-minded people
want to be flexible to change your physical activity anytime
want to break your routine and discover new sports
are a professional instructor

results.summary: JET help people to be healthier and improve their well being

results.descriptionHTML:
Dictionary of Essential Oils Guide is a free comprehensive guide for learning about essential oils and using them in your life.
Learn how aromatherapy can benefit health and well-being—naturally! Get current, scientific guidance on the therapeutic use of essential oils at your fingertips. Essential Oils Guide is easy to use, and requires no prior knowledge of essential oils.

Wikipedia of Essential Oils reference Guide includes information on pure essential oil blends and supplements, as well as information and uses for essential oils such as Lavender, Lemon, Mint, Basil, Bergamot, Black Pepper, Cardamom, Cedarwood, Cilantro, Cinnamon, Clary Sage, Coriander, Eucalyptus, Frankincense, Geranium, Ginger, and much more. The oils presented in this app utilize generic names and scientific names.

Encyclopedia of Essential Oils Guide includes a comprehensive library with hundreds of personal usage guidelines including tips for cooking, children, emotional support, and of course helping to support the body's natural functions as we live our lives in pursuit of wellness, energy,health and happiness for our families. Essential Oils Guide main features include:

- Search essential oils by name or by properties and use.
- Picture.
- Essential Oils generic and scientific name.
- Essential Oils properties and uses.
- Cautions with each essential oil.
- Aromatic description.
- It blends well with...
- Recipe with essential oils

This app appears to be very simple when you first enter but the simplicity of this app makes it easy to use and easy to share the information with others.

Find Ailments and the Essential Oils that May Help with that Specific Ailment
Find Information About Individual Essential Oils Their Uses, and How to Use Them
Find Roll-On Recipe Blends that May Help with Specific Ailments
results.title: Essential Oils Guide Free
results.summary: Essential oils reference guide Free and Offline

comments: Good app to help me find the oil to use on various health problems, but can you tell me what is the difference on the oil colors?   Would be good if you can add some app usage info as i saw someone posted same question but cannot review the answer here.  Also,  if the oil guide with hyperlink to the corresponding oil page will be more convenient instead of me flipping through the app.

Missing Argan & Tea Tree oils which were the first 2 I checked. Then I jumped out of my skin when a game video ad popped up with sound, followed a moment later by another ad. Otherwise the information you provide is very thorough and informative. Please fix the inappropriate ad sequencing and update your oils to gain 5 stars!

Too many ads This could be a useful app if it weren't for the obnoxious ads that pop up over the entire screen. In my first 5 minutes of use, I had 4 come up. They block the entire screen (some with a countdown of when you're allowed to close them) and make the entire app not worth my time.

Helpful Good info but really doesn't explain meaning of different color( not sure if there is a meaning) and why AT is next to each oil. And explanation would be great!! Then maybe I could do 5 stars!

Easy to use, quick access to info This app is great for finding an oil and what it's used for quickly, opposed to thumbing through a reference book. But, there are the ads, but it's FREE...so, can't complain!
One of the most helpful apps This has to be one of the best free apps I've used. Detailed information, not too many adds and so easy to use. 100% recommend

Our mission:

results.descriptionHTML:
*** Application is for sale. If interested to purchase this app get in touch. (full ownership of the app) ***

Essential Oils & More is a free comprehensive guide for learning about essential oils, using them in your everyday life, and sharing essential oils with your friends via messaging or on your favorite social networks.
It covers:

* 234 health conditions
* 62 essential oils
* 19 oil blends
* general guidelines for use
* no ads !

The app features a guide section that details over 230 health conditions for which essential oils are commonly used to help support the body’s natural ability to heal itself. Additionally, you can find information on over 40 single oils and 19 commercially-available oil blends that will help you better understand and use essential oils.

Using this app will help you discover how aromatherapy can benefit your everyday life, improve your health and well-being naturally.

The app also includes essential oil application instructions and protocols.

In order to maintain brand neutrality for FDA Compliance, the oils and blends names presented utilize generic descriptive names rather than doTERRA brand.

This app is ideal for doTERRA Wellness Advocates when meeting with clients, even if there is no internet connection!

Are you a enthusiastic user of essential oils and want to become part of doTERRA team? Are you interested in shearing them and start your own business? Feel free to contact us for more information, we can help you!

DISCLAIMER: The information is a compilation of suggestions made by those that have used essential oils and has not been reviewed by medical experts. It is anecdotal information and should be treated as such. For serious medical concerns consult your doctor. Essential oils work to help bring the body into balance - thus helping the body's natural defenses restore homeostasis. Essential oils are not used to "treat" medical problems.

results.summary: Quick reference for 62 essential oils and 234 health conditions.App for sale !

comments: Handy to have on your phone Works well, easy to use, very informative & answers questions I have on what oils to use for what condition. Oil list has good & useful info & further information links.        One person complained it linked to doTERRA. A person connected to doTERRA created it & the essential oils & oil blends listed are doTERRA.  The info can be used by anyone just know not all essential oils are consumable & not all brands are equal & labeled safe for consumption.  The app is great I think & I use it a lot.

Very Helpful Information! Great information presented in a very systematic way. Have recommended it to many friends and they use it all the time. As with all products moderate use is always a good thing. Shouldn't have side effects. If not comfortable, then don't consume internally! There are plenty of aromatic and topical benefits!

Not accurate Many of the oils listed for certain ailments were not accurate. Also, I believe DoTerra is a great company with that said, you can't call out other "name" companies for not being pure when you have no evidence of that fact or DoTerra for that matter. You really should leave that part out to be completely fair.

Not bad... compared to other apps! I have downloaded multiple oils lately.... This is the only one still installed! I don't even use doTERRA but it is very useful for other brands also. Yl apps are useless compared to this one.😉 and I'm a young living user!!  Good job makers of this app

Misleading The term 'therapeutic grade' has no meaning when it comes to essential oils and is merely a marketing term. Also this ap recommends internal use of oils which is irresponsible, dangerous, and getting close to practicing medicine without a license.  These MLM folks are underestimating the incredible power of high quality essential oils. There are growing numbers of reports of people experiencing serious medical problems from internal use of oils.

Good guide but I love having a quick reference but have to caution that this is a Young Living minion. The lie about certified oils is spewed in this. Note it's a copyrighted term by them. No validity at all to that.  It's a helpful guide but very biased.

results.descriptionHTML:
Available for free, Healthline’s MS Buddy allows you to connect with others who have multiple sclerosis. Whether you’re newly diagnosed or have been living with MS for years, MS Buddy is your tool for discovering support and getting advice from MS peers.

HOW IT WORKS

MS Buddy is free to download, and connecting with others through the app is simple.

* We’ll ask you a few questions about yourself: your age, gender, location, type of MS, treatment, medication, and how long you’ve had the condition.
* Each day, MS Buddy will match you with another user who has a similar profile to your own.
* You’ll have the option of reaching out to anyone on your match list, or responding to anyone who messages you.
* Anyone with whom you choose to not interact will disappear from your match list after ten days.

It’s that easy.

If you’ve recently been diagnosed with multiple sclerosis, you may be experiencing isolation and loneliness. But you’re not alone: An estimated 2.3 million people have MS.

Discover valuable peer support, advice, and friendship today through Healthline’s MS Buddy.

ABOUT HEALTHLINE

As the fastest growing consumer health information site, Healthline’s mission is to be your most trusted ally in your pursuit of health and well-being.

You can depend on us to provide expert content along with genuine caring. Both of which will support, guide, and inspire you toward the best possible health outcomes for you and your family.
results.title: MS Buddy: Meet others with MS
results.summary: MS Buddy allows individuals with multiple sclerosis to connect with one another.

comments: I can see a message when I get it, but when I go to open it and reply, it is gone.  It's as it what I can see doesn't exist...
disappointed! I was happy i found thois app, but i was very disappointed as to why those who contacted me were gone and i couldn't even open their messages though i can see i have new messages.
Google user This app is ok but I was hoping for it to be more interactive. To be able to find others with M S on my own would be nice.
No point Anyone that's on here has already gone, no one talks.
Intereresting

Really disappointed. Downloaded the app, really excited to be able to talking with others going through the same thing as me, and to be able to support and be supported.   Then found out I had to use Facebook.  I refuse to do that given the risk to privacy FB has become.  Really disappointed that you're forced use it in order to enjoy an app that would be great otherwise.

results.descriptionHTML:
Learn how aromatherapy can benefit health and well-being—naturally! Get current, scientific guidance on the therapeutic use of essential oils at your fingertips. Streamline your access to information with a unique, color-coded recommendation system that quickly points you to the right oils and blends for over 200 health conditions.

You can take your app anywhere for ready reference or in-depth study. Use the search function to find quick details about a particular ailment, essential oil or blend, or application method. Or read through the applications section to discover old and new approaches for oil use. Take time to browse our new living section for cooking, craft, and care ideas. Then link directly to our online store to shop the best products and prices for your aromatherapy lifestyle. You’ll want this app at home, on the road, or in meetings with clients.

The Modern Essentials App derives from the authoritative work on aromatherapy for over 20 years: "Modern Essentials: A Contemporary Guide to the Therapeutic Use of Essential Oils". See this book or documentation of the research studies behind the app’s recommendations, plus much more on why and how to use essential oils.

Get your oils game on with the ME App!

comments: Not enough information, waste of money When you search for an ailment, a list of EOs come up. However, it should tell you how many drops of each to make a blend for roller bottle and diffuser. Needs improvements. I am actually sorry I paid for this because a quick Google search is much more helpful.

Great way to carry my book with me. Saw comment by someone saying it didn't talk about how much to use. Not sure what you're reading as an example for Lemon says Place 1-2 drops under the tongue, or drink with a beverage. Not sure what else is being looked for.
Original Gangster!  This app gives a guy like me the ability to quickly refrence all the basics and keeps me in the know.  I have used it so many times already.
Great online access Love the fact I can find things more quickly here than in the book. Do wish it did some better searching of text.
The best oil app Absolutely love this app. Has so much in it for those who want to know the best oil f I r a given situation
Keeps closeing. Gggrr Problem with the names of blends not the same as in the product guide..but great

results.descriptionHTML:
Live life to the full with this easy to use Five Ways to Wellbeing app. It offers a practical way to help you feel good and function well in the world.

Reflect on your wellbeing, set activities to help you improve your wellbeing and track your progress – all from the comfort of your phone; whenever it suits you!

Based on substantial research, use the Five Ways to Connect, Take Notice, Be Active, Keep Learning and Give your way to improved wellbeing.

The Five Ways to Wellbeing can help you with many different aspects of your life. There’s no daily dose or required level of work. Just use the app at your own pace to suit your life – you can even write and set your own personal activities. It’s wellbeing your way.




Applications features

- Set yourself activities to complete throughout the week
- Keep track of how many activities you’ve completed and earn trophies as you go!
- Reflect on how well you connect, be active, take notice, keep learning and give and track how well you think you’re doing
- Set reminders to reflect so each week you can keep learning
- Learn about wellbeing and how the Five Ways can help you
- Find out how other people have used the Five Ways in the personal stories section
- Get a quote a day to help you keep working on your wellbeing




What is wellbeing?
Wellbeing is about how we feel, think and behave. Nobody feels blissfully happy and thinks positive thoughts all the time. However, if you are in a pretty good state of mind, it is generally much easier to enjoy life and cope with its challenges.

The Five Ways to Wellbeing app offers a practical way to help you feel good about yourself and function well in the world. As you use the app, build up a picture of what makes up your wellbeing.



Who’s behind the app?
The app was developed by Somerset County Council’s Public Health team in partnership with the new economics foundation.

comments: Great reminders to do the simple things that make us feel happier Based on the new economics foundation five ways to wellbeing research, this is a really great app to improve your wellbeing and all round happiness
Won't work. Daily reminder doesn't let me submit a time and the proceed button below it does nothing either.
Looks good It needs an exit button - there is no way to leave the application and pressing back ends up in a loop.
Freezes on setting quote of the day time. Samsung S3.
Great motivator It is great for making me carry out the activities I want to do. It is like a silent encouraging friend.
Brilliant yet simple to use. Love this app!

results.descriptionHTML:
Healthy food is a part of a healthy lifestyle. A diet with essential nutrients, vitamins and calories help maintain a healthy body. Cooking and eating healthy recipes is a must for fitness and well being. Fitberry provides you the best collection of tried and tested healthy recipes. They help keep your body healthy and fit and in turn makes your spirits high.

We've added an exclusive collection of healthy recipes for weight loss. We've also improved our healthy meal plan option. It will help you eat healthy meals every day. Now you can also create diet plans for women and men with our meal planner.

Dietary conditions and food preferences vary from person to person. Even members of a family have varied requirements. Fitberry covers all your dietary needs. It helps you cook tasty and healthy recipes on a daily basis. Consider an average family; the son may be following a high protein diet for body building. But, the daughter might cook low calorie recipes for weight loss and trimming. The family might also have vegetarians, vegans or avid meat lovers. How to meet these dietary needs? To eat healthy we prefer homely food than restaurant food.

Healthy recipes in Fit Berry helps you to find exciting food based on each of your taste and fitness plan. Fitberry takes care of various food allergic conditions, dietary requirements and common health conditions. Fight food allergies with gluten free, egg less food, nut free and dairy free food collection. We provide healthy recipes for paleo diet, high protein food for muscle building, and diet recipes to lose weight fast. Healthy drinks and salads are also available for people following detox diets.

The most important part is to serve healthy food for kids and babies. Nutrition and food for kids is vital. Fit berry healthy recipes has a collection of food for their balanced growth. A balanced diet for pregnancy, diabetic patients, and heart patients are available. Our heart healthy recipes help fight heart conditions. Fend of diseases like cancer, kidney malfunction and liver problems with daily food habits.

Workouts and exercises give better results with workout diets. Daily workout diets include healthy morning drinks, fibre rich lunch & high protein dinner. Diets low in calories and carbs help to reduce weight and to maintain health and glow. Salad recipes are key here.

Fitberry's vegan diet ensure clear skin and better digestion with alkaline food. Fitberry's meal plans help to make healthy eating a habit. Quick and easy recipes help you can cook with minimal cooking time and less ingredients. Cook a healthy breakfast within minutes using Fit berry. You can add ingredients to your shopping list for next day’s breakfast. Buy grocery using the shopping list, cook and eat a healthy dinner.

Healthy diet is essential for a healthy living. So stay fit, stay happy with FitBerry .

comments: Needs improvement for top rating Article screen freezes every time.  No articles to view or read, just says freezes saying to swipe right each time I try to read an article.  Very annoying.  I want to love you, but right now I just can't.

Loved it, new bugs less so Been using FitBerry for over a year, enjoy it, find helpful to get new ideas for healthy recipes. Recently when open up a recipe it goes to an  ad, a military type of game, & have to watch it for a few seconds before you can press X and get it to close but when it closes it doesn't go back to recipe, goes to hm pg, then I go through it all over again,  so can't get it to open recipe. Way more ads in 3-5 mins of viewing too.
Not organized enough (good groups? Meal type by lunch, dinner, etc.), Catalog of recipes is small compared to other apps out our just using the web.

I Just Love this App!! Its Awesome!! It has All you need to get healthy! Something for me, Vegetarian options and For Immune system foods, which I absolutely Need!!  Since I have IBD, this is So needed!! More Apps like these!! Its Less confusing!!

A 5-Star App If you need a food and drink recipe app that enables you to save recipes and read them offline,FitBerry is the app you need.From the organized categories to the easy step-by-step instructions,it really is Five-Star

Wonderful The recepies have the perfect amount of ingredients that are fresh, and affordable. The amount of organisation in this app is extrodianary. (I'm only doing this to get rid of the pop up on the app.) =]

results.descriptionHTML:
- FREE Health Assistant
- Trustworthy, accurate & medically reviewed
- Check your symptoms
- Find out what might be wrong
- Get health advice now
- Find trusted local health services

Chat to your very own virtual health assistant to get personalised, accurate health advice in an instant. Free, trustworthy & actionable health information that is TOTALLY UNIQUE TO YOU has never been so easy!

INSTANT, ACCURATE & RELIABLE

Your.MD is a health symptom checker and virtual assistant that gives you actionable medical guidance whenever you need it. Monitored and reviewed by real doctors from the UK, Your.MD offers accurate and and trustworthy guidance to any health problem, right at your fingertips.

FREE, EASY & PERSONAL

Your.MD is the world’s leading virtual health assistant, and is free for everyone! Plus, it’s completely ad free. It’s also totally unique and tailored to YOU. By simply speaking or typing your health questions or your symptoms, your virtual health assistant will provide you with specific follow-up questions to make sure you get the best, self-diagnosis and most relevant, personalised health information. If needed, you will also be provided with direct suitable recommendations on care and how you can get better, plus which trusted health service providers or products are available in your local area.

MORE ACCURATE THAN SEARCH ENGINES

In comparison to using search engines to find answers to your health questions - which can be scary, untrustworthy and medically inaccurate - Your.MD is simple and here to help as it understands thousands of different conditions, illnesses, treatments, symptoms and medications. It’s now easy to get yourself high quality advice tips and information – all of which is clinically assured from the UK’s National Health Service (NHS) and reviewed by qualified doctors.

HEALTH GOALS

Health Goals is a quick and easy way to stay focused on your health priorities. Simply select your chosen health goals to receive regular articles that will support you day-to-day through useful and actionable information.

ONE STOP HEALTH™

Ever wondered where to look for best health services? Your.MD has created the first catalogue of carefully selected, trusted health services and products for easy self-discovery. Now the best free and premium services available near you can be found in one place via Your.MD’s OneStop Health™.

HEALTH TRACKER

Sync your Health Tracker with S Health to see how your mood and how far you walk affects your health. Your.MD can act as a capable virtual assistant to help you realise your own fitness and health goals.

ACCESS ON MESSENGERS

You can also have personalised care consultations with useful tips and advice direct from your virtual health assistant via your favourite messenger service. Clinically assured by the NHS and reviewed by qualified doctors, you can check out Your.MD on Facebook Messenger, Kik, Skype, Slack and Telegram.


EXAMPLES

Try a few of the following examples yourself to make the most of the app, chat functionality and symptom checker.
Find out what might be wrong with you by using the symptom checker. Try asking: “I have a headache and a sore throat”, “I am feeling weak”, or “I feel feverish”.
Get informative tips and helpful answers to your general health questions. Try asking “How to clean a wound” or “Can I travel with a cast”.


DISCLAIMER

This application provides useful information but is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. If you think you may have a medical emergency, immediately call your doctor or the emergency services. Before acting on any of the information in the Your.MD app or symptom checker, consult with your doctor to make sure that it is right for you.
results.title: Your.MD: Health Care Assistant
results.summary: Free, trustworthy health advice, symptom checker & health services, 24hrs
recentChanges: DELETE MESSAGES: You can now better manage your conversation with Your.MD by deleting previous messages.
CONSULTATION HISTORY: Quickly view your previous consultations straight from the Health Tracker, giving you an overview of your symptoms and how long they lasted for.
MULTIPLE PROFILES - You can now use Your.MD for your loved ones, allowing you to get personalised health information for the whole family.

Clinically assured by the NHS and reviewed by qualified doctors, you can check out Your.MD on Facebook Messenger, Kik, Skype, Slack and Telegram.EXAMPLESTry a few of the following examples yourself to make the most of the app, chat functionality and symptom checker.Find out what might be wrong with you by using the symptom checker. Try asking: “I have a headache and a sore throat”, “I am feeling weak”, or “I feel feverish”.Get informative tips and helpful answers to your general health questions. Try asking “How to clean a wound” or “Can I travel with a cast”.DISCLAIMERThis application provides useful information but is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. If you think you may have a medical emergency, immediately call your doctor or the emergency services. Before acting on any of the information in the Your.MD app or symptom checker, consult with your doctor to make sure that it is right for you.

Helpful with basic things, and a good start. I think this app can become better in the future
Great app
I have downloaded this app for gems but I haven't got
THIS APP IS SO INTERESTING I LOVE IT.

results.descriptionHTML:
Calorie Count's app is a free dieting tool that allows Android users to search and log nutritional data for over 250,000 foods, popular exercises and healthy recipes, as well as track their weight loss, all while on the go. The Calorie Count app serves as an extension to CalorieCount.com, an award-winning free online dieting service with almost 6 million members.

The concept behind Calorie Count is to help people lose weight by providing a comprehensive calorie counter and nutritional analysis. CalorieCount.com is well-known for its supportive and vibrant community and numerous social features, including forums, groups, journals, and Facebook Connect integration.

Key features of the Calorie Count app include:
- An easy-to-use graphical dashboard that allows you to navigate through the app while being able to quickly visualize your dieting progress.
- One of the most comprehensive nutritional analyses of food consumption against daily targets among calorie counting Android apps.
- The ability to quickly search and log more than 250,000 food items.
- Tools to view current and past food, activity and weight logs.
- Logging-by-voice (speak: one bagel, two ...)
- Barcode Scanner to make logging foods simple.
- Compare your intake and daily burn expenditure using our net calorie gauge
- Access to Calorie Count's daily blog (www.caloriecount.com/blog) to help you stay motivated and informed.
- The ability to record daily weight and view charts to measure your body's progress against weight loss goals.
- Your CalorieCount Member account will be automatically updated whether you log information through a computer or the Android app.
- Support for English and Metric units.

Calorie Count has been featured in:
- Marie Claire
- All You Magazine
- MSNBC
- People Magazine
- In Touch Weekly

Learn more at: http://www.caloriecount.com/mobile
results.title: Calorie Counter
results.summary: Leading calorie counting app with an editorially curated food database.

comments: Used to be good, not anymore Ive used and preferred this app a while ago and loved it. But now it looks much different, and focus seems to be shifted from the purpose (to help you track calorie intake, etc) and shifted to social media. This makes everything take forever to load and the most useful section of the app (food/exercise logger) became super buggy where it should be the strongest.  I don't care about a food camp, I just want to track my calories and exercise. Uninstalling.

Supportive Used for a week so far, and the only glitch I have seen, is that I someti.es have to hit analysis twice to get it to properly refresh. Speaking of which, the analysis log is my favorite tool. It let's me see the full breakdown of +- calories, nutrition and vitamins. The very best part is the grading scale. It gives each food a grade and also gives you an overall grade for how you did that day. I am competitive, so it forces me to strive for the A rank. It helps keep me motivated and focused.

Great app I love how I can keep up with my nutrition. Two things I think should be added are a long term chart where you can see your nutrition by the week or the month. I go through each day and mark everything on a piece of paper in order to find any trends for nutrients I get too much of or not enough. I also noticed there is no sugars on the analysis chart. I think this should be added. I found another app that tracks your sugar so do not use this one much. I love how I can track my water too. Other app doesn't.

Perfect Unobtrusive ads. Turn off the social interaction piece. Nothing fancy. Download the scanner and scan what you eat.  Huge database with most store brands included. OK so it is missing some features, who cares?  It doesn't ask for your credit card or even your address. Best free app I ever used as far as intruding on my privacy goes.

Excellent database I am a diabetic looking for an app to help me track my carb intake. I've found the food database to be excellent. This app's activity log is very good but could be improved to include a pedometer or allow the user to enter steps for each day or distances. Since I'm a 67 yr old diabetic with heart issues, all I need is the steps feature. I would also like to see the app track sleep time. Otherwise, this is an excellent app to consider.

Love it Everything I want and need but wish I could add goals from the app, must go to the website to do that.  An option for custom goals would make this so much better than just having choose from the ones listed.  Cant save a custom activity to favorites. The points redeeming is nonsence because they are outdated or make you pay for shipping.  Love the virtual rewards though!  Will not let me completely start over either.  Love everything else!  Love camp!  Oh the developers do not respond to anything though.

results.descriptionHTML:
About Natural Stress Relief Hypnosis to Eliminate Personal and working Stress

This powerful stress relief hypnosis is created by Elizabeth Harford, licensed UCM minister since 1993 and certified hypnotherapist by the "The National Guild Of Hypnotists" in 2001.

Stress can be caused by so many factors in life. And there are so many levels of stress, ranging from very mild to excruciatingly severe. Stress negatively effects everything from your blood pressure and heart rate, to your eating habits, ability to concentrate, irritability with family and loved ones, etc.

And all that can lead to low self-esteem. That in turn can lead to depression or anger affecting your career and your relationships.

So what do you do about it? Avoid stress? How?

You need to overcome stress. You need stress management.

Everyday life causes stress! Things like waiting in line, traffic jams, work stress, being in debt, and even poor health all cause stress. The list of things that bring it on is endless.

Learning about managing stress and coping with it is the key. Some people go to the extremes of needing drugs to relieve stress, and many choose psychotherapy. The cost and side effects of either of those can create more stress than they relieve! It seems like a never ending battle.

Good news is, there's hypnosis to help reduce stress and manage stress.

Hypnosis trains the mind to relax more easily and handle things in stride, and it's all as easy as flipping a switch to turn on a light. It really is that simple and easy, because that's all hypnosis does!

It simply flips a few subconscious switches that are already there, just not turned on yet! And all you have to do is lay back and allow yourself to be taken there, to a place where you are stress-free and feel great.

You're just an hour away from feeling and seeing the future with the stress-free you in it!

The Natural Stress Relief Hypnosis App will train you to handle stress in a different way. The relaxing way.

It will help you learn the skill of deep relaxation, which is so important for stress reduction and overall health and well being. You can actually feel the stress leaving your body, as if it were coming right out of your pores.

Hypnosis simply works, and this app make it work for you! They are very relaxing, and yet uplifting at the same time.

This hypnosis audio used to be sold in a CD for $30 but you can now get it for free.

Download Natural Stress Relief Hypnosis App today. You can manage stress. Don't let it manage your life.

****************************************
What Is Hypnosis In General
****************************************

Hypnosis is a state of heightened suggestibility, allowing the subconscious mind to accept suggestions easily, while in hypnosis. Habits that one has had for a long time can be eliminated altogether, or they can be changed to healthier and more beneficial choices.

Hypnosis has highly positive results. In fact, scientists say that we use less than 10% of our potential - that being our conscious mind-- the other 90% being our subconscious mind. Hypnosis taps into the subconscious mind, unlocking it. Getting rid of the habits and problems and replacing them with new, positive lifestyle changes.

Hypnosis can benefit everybody in every walk of life and proven. It helps to make everyone the best they can be at whatever they are trying to change or challenge in life.

Try the Natural Stress Relief Hypnosis App today!

results.summary: Manage and remove stress with The Natural Stress Relief Hypnosis App today.

comments: Im a cynic I suffer from anxiety, which is why I tend to experience high stress levels all the time. However I do not believe in hypnosis or meditation  It might work for some but I can never concentrate. But this is amazing. You actually lose consciousness and your mind drifts When I finished I felt like I woke up from a nap

This app is amazing I was very skeptical. Not after the first night. I use it every night and can feel gentle reminders throughout the day when stressful situations arise and, it calms me. You have nothing to lose by trying this! Do yourself this favor! Love it!

Brilliant for stress relief including panic attacks Have a lot of similar apps but this is my favourite as love the inclusion of natural sounds and it works so well with or without headphones.. Happy uplifting voice helps to as some hypnosis overdoes the heavy voice effect.. Enjoy.. 😁

Turned my life around! I've been suffering terrible stress this last few months, bouncing off the walls and physically shaking at times!  I've used this twice, I now have butterflies of happiness and my limbs feel light again! This is nothing short of miraculous!  Thank you!

BEST APP EVER!!!! So glad I downloaded. Recommending to everyone I know. I use it every night since I found it n sometimes during the day. I'm very anxious n stressed n this is the best thing ever. Can't stress enough how awesome this is! Try at least once n you won't regret it or ever want y go without it again, I know I don't!

OK so if this can work on me it can work on anyone. I have always believed hipnosis wasn't real. Still not sure if it is.but I can say one thing. This totally worked on me. My dress level has gone down a lot and I'm sleeping a lot more. Easy 5 stars

results.descriptionHTML:
LIVE HEALTHY!

Take control of your health!
You can improve or prevent your chronic condition using our proven system. Let us show you how to have a New Life! Obesity, Diabetes, High Blood Pressure, High Cholesterol, Coronary Artery Disease and other conditions…

ABOUT US
We help people Live A New Life, NOW! We get results by teaching and showing you how to Improve and/or Prevent these conditions. So many people are hurting, but the solution is so simple, yet AMAZING!

We have designed special programs that has been very effective with health conditions such as: diabetes, hypertension, high blood pressure, obesity/weight problems, depression, common pain, coronary heart disease and other conditions. You can start now, don’t delay, a new life is available to you.

Services we offer include:

*Corporate Wellness Programs
*Community Events
*Seminars and Presentations
*Healthy Cooking Classes and Demos
*Weight Loss Programs
*Healthy Mothers Programs


SERVICES:

Weight Loss Program

Just 5 easy steps to Weight Loss. Place yourself on a course to lose unwanted pounds. If you have tried yoyo dieting and have given up, this program is just for you! No meal purchases, no calorie counting, all the things that annoy you about weight loss programs are not in ours. You will love it, and won’t understand what took you so long to start.

Seminars and Presentations

Our enthusiasm for health and wellness shows in the seminars and presentations that we conduct. Here are a few topics; The Big Four, Diabetes, High Blood Pressure and Coronary Artery Disease, The Unnecessary Health Care Crisis. How To Have A Better Workplace. Weight Loss the Right Way.

Community Events

We have designed a program that is ideal for community and church health outreach efforts. This program is entitled, 35 Days To Good Health. We engage the community for 35 days in a four part program; 1) physician and professional involvement where you will have a mini health check at the beginning of the program and end of the program so that you can keep track of your health progress. 2) lifestyle education where we present our special, unique 35 actions that will help to improve your health, 3) healthy cooking classes that are fun and interactive, and, 4. fitness and exercise sessions with an excellent trainer.
We get results!

Corporate Wellness Programs
We conduct Corporate Wellness programs on location at convenient times. Our programs can be given after hours or during lunch time. We engage the employees and staff in sessions that deal with lifestyle, food and exercise. Each session is practical and motivational. There are live cooking demonstrations and fitness exercises. This program brings improvement in employee productivity, health and well-being and makes for a better work environment. We have three day seminars, 2 week programs and 8 week programs. Call us and we will help you to determine which program is best for you.

Cooking Classes
Our classes provide training for basic skills needed to prepare simple, healthy meals. We make the class fun and interactive using common kitchen appliances and instruments. We will share our most popular recipes with you. You will learn how to prepare affordable, fiber-rich, low calorie, satisfying meals. Our weight loss formulas will give you amazing ways to peel off the pounds. No meal purchases, no calorie counting, all the things that annoy you about weight loss programs are not in ours. We use plant-based sources including whole grain, fruits, nuts, beans and veggies. All the ingredients we use in our meals can be purchased at your local grocery store. While in class, we produce yummy samples for you to taste test. No fuss, no must! You will love it!
