Teach your Kid English, with this Eng text book app. English class Three Textbook is probably the very first and the best app of its kind in the app store for free. Any kind of Community around the Globe, ranges from the KG / nursery to Class 3 can get benefit from this. This application is based on Punjab Textbook for class 3 published by the Department of Education, Govt. Of Punjab, Pakistan. A complete text book is hosted in this Application for teaching purpose.

New Features:

Kids can interact with the pages using our drawing tool in the app.
They can draw any thing by choosing different colors.
These drawings can be saved right away and they can be viewed in the gallery and in the app itself.

Open Educational Forum (OEF) is dedicated to promotion of affordable education both at schools and college/university levels in Pakistan. OEF strives to provide educational support resources in the form of lecture notes, lecture videos, solution manuals and other learning material FREE of Cost & presented in mobile device apps format to supplementary institutional formal education.

With this English class three app, babies are encouraged to learn about Amazing Alphabets, Vowels, Digraphs, Two & Three Letter Sounds, Nouns, Adjectives, Verbs, Pronouns, Plurals, Verbs, Prepositions, Sentences, Questions, and assessment activities through interactions with engaging interactive pictures and graphical effect. Baby can tap or tilt the screen to set a learning world! Designed for babies 12 months & up.

Why will toddlers and parents love this app?

* Kids will learn about Amazing Alphabet, Digraphs, Manners, Adjectives, Gender Equality, Vocabulary Building, Nature etc. very easily.
* These are unlike videos which one can just watch and not touch. It's an interactive storybook.
* New content is added regularly so that you never run out of new options to treat your babies with.
* kid will also learn basic things of usage using this app special content.

English class 3 Topics included:

- Amazing Alphabet
- Vowels
- Digraphs
- Two & Three Letter Sounds
- Nouns
- Adjectives
- Verbs
- Pronouns
- Plurals
- Prepositions
- Sentences
- Questions
- Helping Others
- Respect for Elders
- Self, People & Places
- How to Stay Safe
- Festivals
- Gender Equality
- Doing Your Own Work
- Nature
- Crisis Awareness
- Keeping the Environment Clean
- Manners
- Famous Personalities
- Assessment Activity

English class 3 app Features:

* Lovable Characters for Kids.
* Rich UI Layout.
* Comfortable Read Mode.
* Important Exam Topics.
* Child assessment techniques.
* Works Offline.
* Mobile Optimized Images.
* No need of INTERNET & 3rd party software.
* Chapter wise complete Topics.
* It’s Totally Free.
* Small in size.
* No need of third party software.
* Very simple User Interface.
* Cover all Topics.
* One click gets All related Book.
* Easy navigation.
* Mobile Optimized Content.

The app is very easy to use and interactive app for toddlers. Users' feedback will be highly appreciated in improving this and related apps. For more information regarding other resources visit our Facebook page:
http://facebook.com/openeducationalforum & FOLLOW US: http://twitter.com/openeduforum
If you Want any more topic information, please tell us and give us valuable Rating and Suggestion. So we can consider it for Future Updates.

results.descriptionHTML:
The Intel® She Will Connect program was developed to reduce the Internet gender gap around the world, starting in Sub-Saharan Africa where the gap is the largest. Intel® She Will Connect Awareness is the perfect app for women to learn how to use mobile devices, PCs, and the Internet safely. This app aims to promote gender equality through awareness, basic education, and sharing inspirational stories of women who have benefited greatly by connecting to the Internet.

This app includes easy-to-understand learning instructions, clean modern visuals, educational games, and useful tips. Get inspired by women’s stories and learn how to use technology to access the Internet, set up email accounts, and practice Internet safety.

Key highlights of Intel® She Will Connect Awareness app for women include:
• Step-by-step approach with interactive activities and simulations on how to use a computer and mobile phone
• An introduction on how to use the Internet to research health and wellness information, education, and starting a business
• Inspirational stories from women on how technology is enhancing their lives
• Valuable tips on Internet safety and social media usage like Facebook
• Designed for women in Sub-Saharan Africa who are new to digital devices and the Internet
• Close the Internet gender gap, get inspired, learn how getting connected can change your life!

milestones.description: By 2030, achieve universal and equitable access to safe and affordable drinking water for all
By 2030, achieve access to adequate and equitable sanitation and hygiene for all and end open defecation, paying special attention to the needs of women and girls and those in vulnerable situations

By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

By 2030, substantially increase water-use efficiency across all sectors and ensure sustainable withdrawals and supply of freshwater to address water scarcity and substantially reduce the number of people suffering from water scarcity
By 2030, implement integrated water resources management at all levels, including through transboundary cooperation as appropriate
By 2020, protect and restore water-related ecosystems, including mountains, forests, wetlands, rivers, aquifers and lakes

By 2030, expand international cooperation and capacity-building support to developing countries in water- and sanitation-related activities and programmes, including water harvesting, desalination, water efficiency, wastewater treatment, recycling and reuse technologies
Support and strengthen the participation of local communities in improving water and sanitation management

Clean water and good sanitation are some of the most significant environmental, social, and economic issues of the modern age. These issues are so significant that a Global Goal was dedicated to them: Global Goal 6. The app Clean Water and Sanitation helps teach a broad demographic about these critical issues. Within the app, the user is able to learn more about Global Goal 6 or play an educational and entertaining game.

Note: This game was made by a middle school student and will not collect any data from the user (such as location, purchase information, accounts, etc.)

results.descriptionHTML:
IDRF (International Development and Relief Foundation) is a Canadian, registered charitable organization, formed in 1984, that is dedicated to empowering the disadvantaged people of the world through emergency relief and participatory development programs, provided without discrimination, and based on the Islamic principles of human dignity, self reliance and social justice.

Emergency Relief and Rehabilitation

When there is any major natural or man-made disaster you can help IDRF support the survivors with urgently needed and life saving items.

Afterwards, join rehabilitation efforts such as re-building destroyed homes, schools, etc.

Development

In a world where poverty overwhelms communities in many countries, with illiteracy, malnutrition, lack of clean water, diseases and preventable deaths running rampant, IDRF provides Development assistance, primarily in the form of Literacy, Health, Water, Sanitation, and Livelihood Development.

Support IDRF with your generosity and caring and, as "People Helping People" reach out and help poor people improve their own and their children's lives.

Above all, help keep their human dignity intact.

Islamic Giving

IDRF accepts Zakat Sadaqah, Fitrah, Fidya and Qurbani contributions and disburses them judiciously, in accordance with religious obligations and Canadian legal requirements.

Donation receipts, tax creditable in Canada, are issued for all donations over $10 Cdn.

SELF RELAINCE SOCIAL JUSTICE HUMAN DIGNITY

results.descriptionHTML:
Nutrition is the focal point of health and well-being. Nutrition is directly linked to human resource development, productivity and ultimately to the national growth.

Malnutrition is a complex phenomenon. It is both the cause and effect of poverty and ill health, and follows a cyclical, inter-generational pattern. It is inextricably linked with illiteracy, especially female illiteracy, lack of safe drinking water and proper sanitation, ignorance, lack of awareness and ill health. It creates its own cycle within the large cycle of poverty.

Lack of adequate information on nutritional needs, has been identified as a major factor for the prevailing nutritional situation in the country. Child malnutrition is both the result of economic conditions and poor nutritional awareness.

Nutrition education and extension has been recognized as one of the long-term sustainable interventions essential to tackle the problem of malnutrition and to generate awareness and to promote the nutrition status of the country. FNB's major task is to address this major challenge.

The Food & Nutrition Board (FNB), set up in 1964, is an attached office of the Ministry of Women & Child Development and has a countrywide set up.

The following videos are included in this mobile app:

1. Adequate Complementary Feeding While Continuing Breastfeeding
2. Anaemia: Blood and Iron Deficiency
3. The Importance of a Balanced Diet
4. Correct Norms of Infant and Young Child Feeding
5. Importance of Infant and Young Child Nutrition
6. Nutrition of the Child
7. Vitamin A
8. Navjaat ki Suraksha
9. Diet During Pregnancy
10. Healthcare during Pregnancy

http://healthphone.org

results.descriptionHTML:
Wij geloven dat iedereen de kracht heeft om het leven van zichzelf en anderen te verbeteren. Maar zonder een goede basis – zonder schoon drinkwater, zonder sanitaire voorzieningen en zonder te kunnen lezen en schrijven – is dit een bijna onmogelijke uitdaging.
En dat is waar wij om de hoek komen kijken. Samen met dorpen bouwen we aan de voorzieningen die nodig zijn voor mensen om hun volledig potentieel te bereiken en benutten.

Maar we bouwen niet “zomaar” toiletten, pijpleidingen en lokalen. We bouwen vertrouwen op zodat dorpsbewoners zich volledig durven te committeren, aan ons en aan elkaar. We bouwen de lokale kennis op zodat de dorpen weten hoe hun voorzieningen werken. We bouwen aan de capaciteiten van alle inwoners zodat de dorpen zelf hun voorzieningen kunnen onderhouden. En we ondersteunen dorpen om zich zo te organiseren dat zij hun voorzieningen volkomen onafhankelijk en zelfstandig kunnen beheren.

Ons ultieme doel? Dat de dorpen ons niet meer nodig hebben. Dat de dorpsbewoners kunnen voorzien in hun eigen basisbehoeften, zodat ook zij hun volle kracht kunnen benutten om het leven van zichzelf en dat van anderen te verbeteren.

LiveBuild is een kleine zeven jaar geleden opgericht door drie twintigers. Eerlijk communiceren naar mensen in Nederland over de complexiteit van het uitvoeren van projecten in Afrika, ongeacht het succes en falen van projecten, was daarvoor een belangrijke drijfveer.

Wij bereiken onze doelen door zowel in Nederland als in Kameroen heel nauw samen te werken met enthousiaste, gedreven mensen. In Nederland proberen we via allerlei events en acties met (veelal jonge) mensen op een ludieke manier zoveel mogelijk geld op te halen. Van een race over de Afsluitdijk tot een piratenschip op een festival, en van instore-concertjes in Utrechtse winkels tot een feest in de Tivoli.

In de LiveBuild App vindt je de laatste nieuwtjes en mogelijkheden tot inschrijving voor opkomende events.

results.summary: The LiveBuild App contains all the information on events and projects, subscribe now!

results.descriptionHTML:
Ozarka Water Company was established in 1907. Known today as Eureka Water, we are Oklahoma’s largest bottled water company. We are the only water bottler in Oklahoma with an Oklahoma State certified laboratory. Our water is certified by the National Sanitation Foundation, the highest rating any bottler can achieve in terms of quality control. The four major products bottled at Eureka Water include: Ozarka Drinking Water, Ozarka Fluoridated Water, Eureka Spring Water and Shamrock Distilled Water. A fifth product, Mountain Valley Spring Water, is also offered.

Use our app to:

- Contact Us
- View our inventory
- Purchase products
- Start Services
- See our specials
- Design Your Own Label
- Log-in
- Social Media "One-Stop"
- Receive Updates via Push Notification

results.descriptionHTML:
Join your favorite artists and the global music community to support disaster relief and protect the environment with the Music for Relief donation app.

From as little as $5 a month added to your monthly cellphone bill, together our community can be the change.

How the app works:
In a few taps you can add a small donation to your monthly cellphone bill, either $5 or $10. You can manage this through the app to keep in touch and see the difference your gift makes. The app works in partnership with AT&T Mobility, Verizon, T-Mobile, Sprint PCS and US Cellular.

Linkin Park founded Music for Relief because they believed in the power of the music community to make a difference.

So far Music for Relief has raised an incredible $9 million for survivors of multiple natural disasters and planted over 1.3 million trees.

WHY USE MUSIC FOR RELIEF?

MUSIC CAN CHANGE THE WORLD

Music for Relief responds to natural disasters as they occur to help survivors recover and rebuild. The organization also recognizes the environmental consequences of climate change, which is accelerating and strengthening certain types of natural disasters. Therefore Music for Relief is also mitigating damage caused by natural disasters by reducing greenhouse gases and educating the public about climate change.

With the app it’s now easier to help Music for Relief help people and the planet.

THE POWER OF CROWD IS REVOLUTIONARY

Imagine if everyone at the last big concert you attended gave just $5 via the app…

50,000 fans could easily raise $250,000 in one night – for the cost of less than a beer each.

That’s enough money to provide clean water for 7,142 families following Hurricane Matthew

That’s enough money to build 2,000 sanitation facilities for the survivors of Nepal’s 2015 Earthquake

And that’s enough money to plant a quarter of a million trees!

SMALL ACTIONS MAKE A BIG DIFFERENCE

A little app and a $5 donation doesn’t sound like much, but when a community acts together, it adds up to a world-changing difference.

If you’ve ever wanted to do more to help others, it’s now easier than it’s ever been.

Download now.

results.summary: Join the music community to help after natural disasters & protect the planet.

results.descriptionHTML:
Welcome to the United Nations Foundation App - a place where we connect you with the United Nations. Here, you can discover and join conversations on the global issues that you are most passionate about!

Learn about the Sustainable Development Goals and find out how YOU can help end extreme poverty, fight inequality and injustice, and tackle climate change.

Join a chat room based on:
Poverty
Hunger
Good Health
Quality Education
Gender Equality
Clean Water and Sanitation
Affordable and Clean Energy
Economic Growth
Innovation
Inequality
Sustainability
Responsible Consumption
Climate
Life Under Water
Life On Land
Peace
Making These Goals Happen

We want to connect as many people as possible to these goals, and help everyone, everywhere get resources on how to get involved. Talk to others about how you can help, and share stories about your experiences with these issues. Plus, read news, blog posts, and announcements about these topics - right in each chat room and all for free.

Download now, start messaging, and invite your friends and family into our app to talk about the Sustainable Development Goals and how YOU can create change!

results.descriptionHTML:
Nutrition is the focal point of health and well-being. Nutrition is directly linked to human resource development, productivity and ultimately to the national growth.

Malnutrition is a complex phenomenon. It is both the cause and effect of poverty and ill health, and follows a cyclical, inter-generational pattern. It is inextricably linked with illiteracy, especially female illiteracy, lack of safe drinking water and proper sanitation, ignorance, lack of awareness and ill health. It creates its own cycle within the large cycle of poverty.

Lack of adequate information on nutritional needs, has been identified as a major factor for the prevailing nutritional situation in the country. Child malnutrition is both the result of economic conditions and poor nutritional awareness.

Nutrition education and extension has been recognized as one of the long-term sustainable interventions essential to tackle the problem of malnutrition and to generate awareness and to promote the nutrition status of the country. FNB's major task is to address this major challenge.

The Food & Nutrition Board (FNB), set up in 1964, is an attached office of the Ministry of Women & Child Development and has a countrywide set up.

The following videos are included in this mobile app:

1. Adequate Complementary Feeding While Continuing Breastfeeding
2. Anaemia: Blood and Iron Deficiency
3. The Importance of a Balanced Diet
4. Correct Norms of Infant and Young Child Feeding
5. Importance of Infant and Young Child Nutrition
6. Iodine: The Importance of Iodised Salt
7. Nutrition of the Child
8. Vitamin A
9. Navjaat ki Suraksha
10. Diet During Pregnancy
11. Healthcare during Pregnancy

http://healthphone.org

results.descriptionHTML:
"Mejora Bilbao" es una plataforma de participación ciudadana móvil en tiempo real. El Ayuntamiento de Bilbao ofrece una plataforma gratuita, sencilla e intuitiva, que capacita a las personas para reportar incidencias, sugerencias y mejoras en asuntos como redes de agua, saneamiento, alumbrado, limpieza y gestión de residuos, anillo verde, parques y jardines, mobiliario urbano, vialidad, bicicletas y espacio público.

Así, los usuario/as podrán informar y ayudar a mejorar Bilbao a través de su smartphone si ven, por ejemplo, farolas rotas, baldosas sueltas, vandalismo. Una imagen vale más que mil palabras y "Mejora Bilbao" lo hace posible, facilitando el envío de fotos de aquellas quejas o sugerencias importantes para los ciudadanos

“Bilbo Hobetuz” herritarren partaidetzarako plataforma da. Bilboko Udalak plataforma doakoa, erraza eta intuitiboa eskaintzen du, herritarrek hainbat arlotako (ur-sarea, saneamendu-sarea, argiak, garbiketa eta hondakinen gestioa, eraztun berdea, parkeak eta lorategiak, hiri-altzariak, bideak, bizikletak eta espazio publikoa) gorabeherak, iradokizunak eta hobekuntzak eskuko telefonoa erabilita eta denbora errelean bidal ditzaten.

Horrela, erabiltzaileek Bilbori buruzko informazioa eman eta hobetzen lagunduko dute smartphonea erabilita, esaterako, farolaren bat apurtuta ikusten dutenean, baldosak solte daudela ikustean, bandalismoa dagoenean...Irudiak hitzak baino garrantzitsuagoak dira sarritan eta “Bilbo Hobetuz”-ri esker herritarrentzat garrantzitsuak diren kexen eta iradokizunen argazkia bidal dezakezu.
results.title: Mejora Bilbao - Bilbo Hobetuz
results.summary: A picture is worth a thousand words, Help us Improve Bilbao.

The Water for Life Club is a subsidiary of the Aqua Initiative, a registered charity that helps the underprivileged around the world get clean water and sanitation.

results.descriptionHTML:
With The Water Project's newest app - Impact Snapshot - your good deeds follow you wherever you go!

Instantly see the impact of your donations to The Water Project and the communities you’re helping provide access to clean, safe water.

Our app captures all your gifts, linked to specific projects, and allows you to easily see your total giving impact - and show friends and family. Photos, maps, stories and more are all easily accessible, bringing your giving experience to life.

Stay up-to-date with the communities your water projects are helping. Watch as they go from construction to water flowing. Then, for years to come, you can continue to celebrate as we re-visit them all to make sure the good keeps pouring out.

------------- How it Works ------------

First time users…

Haven’t made your first gift yet? Not to worry! Download and check out how you can get involved today and start your giving impact history. Read about recently completed projects, browse projects in need of funding, and learn how becoming a member helps sustain long-lasting water projects for communities.

If you’ve supported a water project with us before…

Once you’ve made a donation and logged in, explore and access your water projects quickly and easily. Just tap an icon to toggle between your own water project history, your personalized project map, your membership status and other current water projects in need of funding.

When you’re ready to help again…

Every gift unlocks a story, a person, a future. Every gift has impact. When you are ready to deepen yours, simply open the app and tap Give Water. Here, you’ll find specific community water projects that need your support. Tap “Explore Project” to meet a community waiting for your help, see their current water situation and the proposed water project solution you’ll make possible.

---

Join our community of supporters and watch your impact unfold in your hand.

---

The Water Project is a non-profit organization providing clean, safe water and sanitation systems to communities in developing countries. Our commitment to in-country leadership and ongoing monitoring programs enable reliable community-based solutions to the water crisis. We make it personal. Every donor, linked to a specific water project, experiences the powerful impact of clean water.
results.title: Impact Snapshot
results.summary: See the impact of your giving in the communities you’re providing clean water!

One of Google's "Best Apps of 2014 & 2015" with over 2 million downloads, the MailOnline (Daily Mail) app gives you everything you've come to expect and love from the world's largest English-language newspaper website, but with quick, easy and free access on your phone -- accessible even when you're offline.

Feed your daily addiction with stories & photos from all our top channels: US & World News, Celebrity & Showbiz, Sports, Femail, Science & Tech, Health, Money, Travel, and many more!

See what everyone's talking about and download our app today.

FEATURES:
• Over 15 Channels of must-read articles and photos - that's over 800+ original stories every day!
• Offline Mode: Pre-load stories & galleries to access when you're offline or without reception - great for commutes!
• Select a Location: Choose from US, UK or Rest of World to ensure you get the news most relevant to you.
• Express Yourself: Post your Comments on articles or Rate other user's comments that you like or dislike.
• Custom Settings: Select when data and images sync based on your preferred connection (Wi-Fi or 3G).
• Choose which Channels you want to sync and when.

If you have any trouble with the app or want to suggest new features and feedback, please email us at androidapp@mailonline.co.uk so we can help.

I still like the app on my phone but since beginning of February I cannot read it on my tablet (which is an older version of Android than my phone) as it continuously stops. Started about the time that video feeds within the body of the stories began. Really disappointing and annoying.

3rd time I have installed this damned app.  Does not download corresponding photographs. Very disappointed!!!!
Lefties. Daily Mail, your daily source to fake, garbage so called 'news'
This used to be my favourite news app but now crashes everytime I open it.

results.descriptionHTML:
Renewable energy is energy that is generated from sunlight, rain, tides, geothermal heat and
wind. These sources are naturally and constantly replenished, which is why they are deemed as
renewable. The usage of renewable energy sources is very important when considering the
sustainability of the existing energy usage of the world. While there is currently an abundance of
non-renewable energy sources, such as nuclear fuels, these energy sources are depleting. In
addition to being a non-renewable supply, the non-renewable energy sources release emissions
into the air, which has an adverse effect on the environment.

While there are many different types of renewable energy sources, wind power and water power
are two of the most popular, only surmounted by solar power. The use of wind power and water
power is popular because they are actively found throughout the world and readily available for
use.

Table Of Contents:

Renewable Energy: Wind Power and Water Power
A Few Words about Solar Energy
Hydropower as Renewable Energy
Why Renewable Energy And Eco-Friendly Tactics Matter
What are Solar Water Heaters?
The Growth of Renewable Energy Sources
Water Power: A Great Energy Source
Why We Must Develop Renewable Energy
Using Wind Power as Renewable Energy
Renewable Energy Sources: Wind Power

results.title: Renewable Energy
results.summary: Renewable energy for the future survival of the planet Earth.
results.description: Renewable energy is energy that is generated from sunlight, rain, tides, geothermal heat andwind. These sources are naturally and constantly replenished, which is why they are deemed asrenewable. The usage of renewable energy sources is very important when considering thesustainability of the existing energy usage of the world. While there is currently an abundance ofnon-renewable energy sources, such as nuclear fuels, these energy sources are depleting. Inaddition to being a non-renewable supply, the non-renewable energy sources release emissionsinto the air, which has an adverse effect on the environment.While there are many different types of renewable energy sources, wind power and water powerare two of the most popular, only surmounted by solar power. The use of wind power and waterpower is popular because they are actively found throughout the world and readily available foruse.Table Of Contents:Renewable Energy: Wind Power and Water PowerA Few Words about Solar EnergyHydropower as Renewable EnergyWhy Renewable Energy And Eco-Friendly Tactics MatterWhat are Solar Water Heaters?The Growth of Renewable Energy SourcesWater Power: A Great Energy SourceWhy We Must Develop Renewable EnergyUsing Wind Power as Renewable EnergyRenewable Energy Sources: Wind PowerWhat is Renewable Energy?Want to Make Your Own Energy? results.descriptionHTML: The Growing Degree Days application measures the maturity of your crop by viewing current and past growing degree days data for your farm’s location.  Growing degree days (GDD) are a measure of heat accumulation used in ag to predict the date that crops will reach maturity.

comments: Doesn't work Tried to  set date and zip and it won't change from the default.  Good concept bad implementation.
Doesn't Work Good concept but only designed to work in the USA. Zip doesn't work for UK addresses
Farmer East Ilinolis
Junk If I change to proper zip code it tells me system error on WiFi or 4g every time

Not happy AK Well truthfully I didn't use this app because my area isn't covered by it. I wish Alaska was part of Canada, I'm tired of everything from apps to programs acting like we're not part of the US. So yeah, make it open to ALL of the United States then I'll be much happier to give a better rating.
Dangles but doesn't deliver Needs long term (eg 30 yr) annual averages and Canadian data

results.descriptionHTML:
Radio FM
Radio FM (Radio for Mobile) is an app to play Internet Radio stations. Radio FM allows you to listen and enjoy variety of genres like classical, rock, pop, instrumental, hip-hop, gospel, songs, music, talks, news, comedy, shows, concerts and other variety of programs made available by various Internet Radio Broadcasters across the world.

FEATURES
Radio FM is the only app in the Play store that's offering the true Radio Experience with best tuned featured for FREE
♥ Add to Favorites (Favourite List)
♥ Access to recent list
♥ SLEEP TIMER (Auto OFF)
• Listen your favorite radio while you go to bed - without worrying about exhausting your Mobile data
• Set the Sleep timer in the Radio FM app and the app will do the rest for you. It will auto off the Radio at the time you set
♥ ALARM CLOCK (Auto ON)
• Set an Alarm for your favorite Radio and let Radio FM do the job for you
• It will wake you up at that time and tunein your Radio, so that you never miss the next News bulletin or the Talk show you love
♥ Add Shortcut on your Mobile home screen for fast tunein to your Radio Station
♥ Simple User Interface
♥ Easy to user ever for first time Radio FM app users
♥ Google recommended New Material Design features
♥ Quick swap/ Navigation between Favourite List, Countries List, Recent lists
♥ Modern design to display the stations listing
♥ Radio Stations listing enhanced with Radio Broadcaster's logos as provided
♥ Full Radio player to display title information about currently tuned in station in full screen
♥ Fast Notification control to stop/start radio stream from home screen
♥ Countries list visible with flag of the country
♥ Fast access to Radio from
• Countries list (Select country and touch the Radio Station)
• Favourite List (Just select the Radio Station)
• Recent List (Just open the recent list and choose the radio station)
• Shortcut on your Mobile Home screen
• Search the radio and select to tunein
• Option to automatically tunein whenever you open the app
♥ Suggest a Station feature to tunein to your local or any other radio station from any city, state or country
♥ Easy Feedback within the app so our team can add more features

RADIO BROADCASTERS
Radio broadcasters keep adding their Radio Stations to Radio FM platform through www.RadioGenre.com So Tunein new radio channels every time you use our app.
• We already have more than 30,000 Radio Stations worldwide
- Be it Kral pop, Super FM 90.8 from Turkey
- Radio Sei, 98.1 FM, 104.5 FM, Tele Stereo 92.7 FM, Centro Suono Sport 101.5 FM, 105 network, RDS from Italy
- Virtual DJ, WIXX, ElectricFM, 1.FM Country One, DEFJAY, MOVIN, WOGK, KJLH, WPOZ, KEXP, KCRW from USA
- Europe 1 104.7 FM, NRJ, Skyrock 96.0 FM, Fun Radio, RMC, RTL2 from France
- BBC, Capital XTRA from UK
• Still you don't find what you are searching, use Suggest Feature. Our team will try to add every new broadcasters for you, so you don't miss your favorite.

OUR APP USERS
Radio FM is a trusted Radio App by 25 million listeners worldwide. We have a promise with our users to provide best playback quality and thrive to make it better everyday.

FAQ LIST
How to use Radio FM?
Screenshots and videos available at http://radiofm.in/faq-list/

STAY TUNED
Like on Facebook: http://fb.com/radiofmapp
Follow on Twitter: http://twitter.com/radiofmapp
Follow on Google+: https://google.com/+Radio-fmIn
Watch on Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/Radio-fmIn

We are tuned to listen you on support@RadioFM.in
Keep Listening
Radio FM

comments: Still radio cut off connection often stutter on wifi, no error appear. Mostly problem with playing 1010 WINS, FOX radio, and any other I play also often unavailable. Didnt work on Lollipop same after update to Marshmallow. My internet is goid with low ping etc. Maybe you should implement some buffer etc. In addition too many ads that take time to close.
It's alright! The stations that I listen to already will play but skip like a scrached cd. Just don't have my country station witch is Bee 93.7. Other then that it's pretty clear.

Good premise, nice looking, flawed. Not a great range of stations. Poor tagging, search. Drops out for a minute at a time. I like the lack of bs, but it needs to be greater in scope and more robust. In other words it should do exactly what it does without unnecessary social crap etc, but should do it much better.
It works better on my smartphone it's an S7 over TuneIn Radio but it is hard to find a radio stations especially talk radio! For example I search for Rush Limbaugh and came up with nothing
This app was awful.  I couldn't find any of my stations, it didn't even have the ones I was looking for. Don't waste your time on this.
Im too lazy so I don't write reviews bt this app shocked me! It loads instantly and the interface is easy to navigate plus it has Every station I need. Excellent

*** We are Coloring App with over 1,700,000 users! ***

It's the place where you get all the beautiful illustrations,including mandala,zen and animals, along with unlimited choices of colors! A mind journey which makes you anxiety free and stress relieving!

Explore the secret garden created in beautifully detailed illustrations and drawings and bring them to life using those colorful palettes with your imagination.

Have fun in this relaxing painting experience, refill the energy and let anxiety fade away through coloring games.

★ Simply tap to pick color and paint, all you need is your imagination!
★ Lots of beautiful illustrations and drawings to color, and more are coming in updates twice a week!
★ Personalized color palettes, pick your favorite!
★ Easy to save your work and share them with all your friends, whenever and however you like it!
★ Be able to save different version of your artwork for the same sketch and revisit later!
★ Pinch to zoom in/out, easy coloring games!
★ Meet your 1,700,000+ fellow artists worldwide in SHOWROOM and exchange hearts.

It's the only one color therapy game you will ever want!

Don’t miss this wonderful coloring games, DOWNLOAD NOW!

comments: It's fun and I enjoy wasting my time doing the colouring of the different drawings that are featured. I finally gave in and bought a mega deal package for 85% less than the yearly full rate therefore after the exchange calculations it came to $12.00 instead of $40,00 for the subscription. Still would like to see more options offered for lines and elements selections. I like the new colour palettes but would still like more colour combinations and themes offered for those with paid subscriptions!💖💚💜

Enjoying coloring and using colors I like creating the look I want. Having getting used to how everthing works now doing better with the app and really enjoying it. Helps to relax and think about nothing except what colors to use! I'm disappointed in the way hearts are given I go thru the pictures of others and if I feel it deserves a heart I give them one.  I have seen some pictures that are not that good and they have over 100 hearts.  Maybe everybody doesn't rate the pictures, but that's what makes it fun!  I paid for a month to see what it would unlock and I'm pleased to say I haven't had any problems with my subscription yet.

Love this app, but I purchased the mega bundle for 9.99 and I only had it about 3 days. They have no record of my purchase so I sent them proof and it still hasn't been resolved. They just took my money!

I really like it just Wish there were more selections in the free part before I decide to buy... Kind Of a waist of money in my opinion It's be nice if in the add you clearly state you have to pay for more complex and not just free basics because on your add it's says "FREE" lame....

Great overall. But some of the images seem to be thrown together and are rather sloppy. Lines that don't meet where they should. Non existent where they should be. Sometimes an extra line added just because. However, overall, wonderful app, and I will continue to use. Especially when new images are added frequently.

i absolutely love this app. i have a crazy collection of adult coloring books, and am an artist as well, so knowing that now i can do it on my phone is a lot of fun. i have major depressive disorder and anxiety, so this app helps me through my bad moments, along with my creative waves. GET THIS APP

results.descriptionHTML:
Finally you can carry YouTube Fitness Star Cassey Ho in your pocket...FOR FREE! Take her videos with you to the gym, cook fun and healthy Blogilates recipes in the kitchen, talk to other POPsters in the addicting forum, and follow the monthly workout calendar with ease! Plus only in the app will you be able to unlock this month's Secret Video.

WHAT YOU'LL FIND IN THE APP

VIDEO SORTER

-Search all of Cassey's POP Pilates, POP HIITs, POP -Challenge, and Cheap Clean Eats vids in one place!
-Can sort by series (ie. Victoria Secret series) or by body part (ie. abs, butt, thighs, etc.)

THE PICTURE FORUM

-This is like an organized Instagram forum! Take a pic and share something with the community!
-Topics include: Meet & Greet, Where Should I Start?, Getting Fit, Diets, Recipe Swap, Motivation, Music, and -Talk About Anything.
-Hot Topics section will showcase the trending posts in the community with the most likes.

RECIPES

-The best of Cassey's recipes all in one place!
-You'll find quick, easy, and healthy concoctions for breakfast, lunch, dinner, snacks, and of course dessert!

MONTHLY WORKOUT CALENDAR

-Planned workouts everyday as they should be paired.
-Cassey will re-design the flow of exercise routines each month for optimal results.
-You'll be able to check off each exercise video you complete (like you do on the printable calendar) to stay on track.
-When you subscribe to the calendar for $0.99 for 30 days, you will also automatically unlock the Secret -Workout Video of the month which can be downloaded to your phone. You can take this video anywhere with or without internet/4G/LTE connection.

BEGINNER'S WORKOUT CALENDAR

- Planned workouts and rest days every day for 4 weeks to get you lean and slim even if you are new to Pilates
- Once you complete the Beginner's Calendar you will find that you are much stronger and can graduate on to the Monthly Calendars

SECRET VIDEO

-Each month Cassey will release 1 Secret Workout Video for you to download and keep on your phone.
-The video comes free with the $0.99 subscription to the monthly calendar.

SHOP

-Be the first to see what's new in the Blogilates Shop!
-Never miss a sale!

NOTE: After you download, please rate and review the app! It will help me develop more cool features for you guys! Thank you so much. Also, you can unsubscribe from the Workout Calendar at anytime. It is $0.99 for 30 days starting from the day you purchase.

comments: Ugh Update: it won't let me log in anymore. 😐                                                                                                                                                            I love this app its like Facebook but full of positive people! Everyone is nice and no one is judging because are all striving towards a goal and we all help one another to achieve it. This is a great place to ask questions about Pilates.  Yoga, what kind of food to eat, etc everyone is so helpful and its really well designed app. Love the pink!

It's not really free I feel like it's odd that when you subscribe on her website you get the calendar for free, but you have to pay for it in the app? I would love to have the calendar on my phone, but I don't trust in app purchases, since relatively often they don't show up correctly. It's also odd that you can't search for specific videos, or maybe I can't find the way to do that? This app is not at all useful for my purposes.

This app really needs some work This app has so much potential! After using for a long time these are my main feedback points. Make the back button on samsung compatible. When I press the back button it takes me to the homepage despite what I was doing. Its infuriating. The calendar should be customisable. I want to tick off what days I worked out on the app while I complete PIIT28 but it is a fixed calendar. You should be able to exit the timer and re-enter without it starting over/turning off. An app dedicated to PIIT28 might be better.

Since i started my weightloss journey, ive always loved casey ho. She is such an inspiration. From 65kgs. down to 56kgs., even if I wasnt able to follow piit28. It was a 3 months workout following her routines which were uploaded in youtube. Many thanks to her!!!

Too Many In-App Purchases I like the timer, but I find it misleading how the app is presented as "free" in Blogilates videos. There are too many in-app purchases to be able to actually use the app well. To pay for the alarm itself when doing a HIIT workout, the videos, the calendar, etc...is too much. I don't find it easy to navigate either.

Problems with timer I love the app, my timer is deformed and cut off, it doesn't visually count down. I really wish this can be fixed since I already purchased the timer. Great concept, not so great performance. Blogilates fixed my problem, it was because my font was on XL, once I set it to normal, everything was just peachy.

results.descriptionHTML:
What makes Anki OVERDRIVE the world's most intelligent battle racing system? Tech so advanced, it feels like the future.

Each Supercar is a self-aware robot, driven by powerful artificial intelligence (A.I.) and equipped with deadly strategy. Whatever track you build, they'll learn it. Wherever you drive, they'll hunt you down. The better you play, the better they become. Whether you battle A.I. opponents or friends, your tactical options are unlimited. And with continuous software updates, the gameplay always stays fresh. Customize weapons. Swap out cars. Build new tracks. It’s easy to pick up, and nearly impossible to put down.

The future of play has arrived.

Android 6 (Marshmallow) is compatible with Anki OVERDRIVE. However, due to changes in Bluetooth permissions with Android 6, the app may not be able to detect the Anki cars properly.
To resolve this issue, go to Settings in the OS--> Location and turn on location services. Your Anki OVERDRIVE cars will now be detected properly in the app.

comments: Well new update came back in and I have to thank you so much for the practice training modes, I suggested it not even a year ago and look now we have it :) And huge bonus for the shop it's very awesome to see I can finally spend my coins but only when there is something worth buying. Added control to the cars from previous update where cars would not even stay on track. Also have yet to try new update with jump so as soon as I do will update so 5 stars overall!
Anki overdrive is great! But if you do not have the latest phones and tablets you will have trouble at times syncing them together.
Got it for my birthday and I love it! Thanks for the coin shop Anki. Kinda stinks because I have 2 defective cars.
I think this app is a fun and hard app the reason it was hard is that I thought you could only go straight but then I found out you could turn the car.
This thing is just awesome because it has those futuristic looking features 😃
Awesome game, fun for all

AEE events convene and connect high-profile industry leaders with policy-makers to share knowledge and discuss actionable strategies to achieve a secure, clean, and affordable energy system. Use this app to network with others, plan your schedule and stay on top of the latest event-related news.

results.descriptionHTML:
Daily Kitten offers you your own cat; it's just for you. It can do anything as long you take care of it. Caress it, feed it, teach it to stay clean, play with it, put it to sleep ... you can accompany it in its dreams, dress it up the way you like and make it purr when you stroke it. To make a long story short, it's your new companion and you help it grow and have a lot of fun.

FEATURES:
- Play over 10 mini-games while playing with your animal pet. You can earn gold and emerald to buy him stuff.
- You can interact with your cat by taping on the screen, he will came to you to receive some petting... so cute !
- Take care of an adorable pet !
- The game is cut in 10 days. Each day your kitten grows up and can use new toys and stuffs !
- You can take pictures of your adorable cat to share it with your friends !
- Give food to your own kitten, play ball of wool, play with a lasersight, help him to scratch his nails in cat tree, like a true kitten !
- This kitten is really realistic, you can watch him live in your house, he will move around and play with everything
- Show at your friends how your kitten is beautiful !
- Make fun with your little animal and take care of it ! You can deguise him with a lot of stuff !
- There is different mission during the game. would you be able to finish everything?

Take care of your cat simulator !

Daily Kitten is available in french, english, spanish, german, chinese, japanese, turkish and russian.

results.description: Daily Kitten offers you your own cat; it's just for you. It can do anything as long you take care of it. Caress it, feed it, teach it to stay clean, play with it, put it to sleep ... you can accompany it in its dreams, dress it up the way you like and make it purr when you stroke it. To make a long story short, it's your new companion and you help it grow and have a lot of fun.FEATURES: - Play over 10 mini-games while playing with your animal pet. You can earn gold and emerald to buy him stuff.- You can interact with your cat by taping on the screen, he will came to you to receive some petting... so cute !- Take care of an adorable pet !- The game is cut in 10 days. Each day your kitten grows up and can use new toys and stuffs !-  You can take pictures of your adorable cat to share it with your friends !- Give food to your own kitten, play ball of wool, play with a lasersight, help him to scratch his nails in cat tree, like a true kitten !- This kitten is really realistic, you can watch him live in your house, he will move around and play with everything- Show at your friends how your kitten is beautiful !- Make fun with your little animal and take care of it ! You can deguise him with a lot of stuff !- There is different mission during the game. would you be able to finish everything?Take care of your cat simulator !Daily Kitten is available in french, english, spanish, german, chinese, japanese, turkish and russian.
comments: Overall, it's a sweet game, but there are lots of glitches. First of all, the price points are messed up one buying gold and gems. The 3.99 price point comes up as $50 and the other prices show up as far more as well. $50 for 200 Jim  and 1400 gold pieces is ridiculous so I can't imagine that's correct. For some reason the second cat goes straight to sleep everytime time I open the app and I can't stop him. He's been stinky and hungry for like 5 days now. If the prices were corrected I would buy, and if the second cat issue were fixed I would definitely rate higher.
I love everything  in this game it is amazing I'll Evan give him a shout out on all social media in have 1 request may we please be able to have 3 kittens
I like it this game it's amazing I like the graphics l don't know what to say but the game is amazing and l like it more than talking Tom and Angela the game is perfect 👍👍👍
I love most of the kittens just not the ginormous one other wise it is really well
The Spinwheel defies gravity the house is ugly and needs more interactions and less money.
I liked the cat and that stuff but there's way to many adds.

results.descriptionHTML:
Scrubby Dubby Saga, from the makers of Candy Crush Saga & Farm Heroes Saga! 

Soapland is full of a mysterious foam but nobody knows why. Enter this adventure puzzle, slide soaps and unveil the secrets as you remove the foam on your way. Will you be a soap star and save the day?

Take on this fantastic Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score! 

Scrubby Dubby Saga is completely free to play but some in-game items such as extra moves or lives will require payment.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms

Scrubby Dubby Saga features: 
● A new match 3 with a twist! Slide lines of soap in challenging puzzles!
● Join Dixie Duck on her amazing adventure
● Match the soaps to clear the foam!
● Free your friends in a brand new mode!
● Create boosters and tap them to release their power
● Play with friends to see who can get the highest score
● Easily sync the game between devices and unlock full game features when connected to the Internet
● Easy to play and challenging to master!

Already a fan of Scrubby Dubby Saga? Like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for all the latest news:
https://www.facebook.com/ScrubbyDubbySaga
https://twitter.com/Scrubby_Dubby

Last but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Scrubby Dubby Saga!
results.title: Scrubby Dubby Saga
results.summary: Slide and match your way through this fun puzzle adventure!
recentChanges: Dixie and friends are back with a new adventure, ‘Origami Village’! Let’s hope the breeze doesn’t pick up and blow all her new friends away!
With these 20 NEW LEVELS, there’s now 560 levels of foamtastic fun for you to enjoy.
Don’t forget to update your app!

comments: A nice addictive game to play

New "homepage" is terrible I'm not sure why the home screen was changed. How do you navigate levels? Also, I don't care how I compare to others. I just want to play the game. Different game play on this match 3 because items are on a slider.

It's a fun game but when you reach locked levels you have to wait 3 days to continue or bug friends. I refuse to connect the game to Facebook to play. I play to pass time and none of my friends play these games. At least give us a quest option to unlock levels faster than waiting 3 days and I will rate the game higher.

uhhhh....so what did you guys do to the map on this game?? How are we supposed to play any previous levels? That was a horrible idea.... I hope you guys put out an update fixing the game back to where we can at least play previous beaten levels...u cant be serious King..
Where did all the previous levels played go to??? Can't go back and play any of the levels already played since the new update. :( Please bring them back. Would also like a way to earn coins :)
I hate new homepage. I like to  could choose lvl. I hate update so much I'm thinking about delete it since I'm not loosing any bonuses anyway

results.descriptionHTML:
Stylish battery widget with advanced functionality. Material theme design perfectly matches Android 4.x.

For full info about the app please visit http://www.batterywidgetreborn.com/index.html.

Application features
==============
This app provides following functionality:

Battery widget
- circle battery level indicator indicator perfectly fits pure Android design
- resizable on Android 4.x+
- support for both main and external dock battery (Asus Transformer only)

Basic battery info
- Battery Info
- Shortcuts to Power-Summary/Background Sync/Wifi/BT Settings

Status bar notification of battery status
- multiple icon styles
- prediction (estimation) how long battery lasts
- customisable texts in notification area (estimated time left, voltage, temperature, battery health)

Power saving functionality
- automatic power saving mode during the night (simple but powerful battery saver functionality)

Charging and discharging chart

Extended notifications support for Jelly Bean phones
- optional charging and discharging chart
- power related toggles:
- Wifi
- Bluetooth
- Background Sync
- Airplane mode
- customizable notification priority

Additional tools
- Torch
- Settings shortcuts
- DashClock Extension

Specific HW vendor support
- supports Motorola 1% increment
- supports Asus Transformer secondary (dock) battery

Material themed interface on phones with Android 4.0+

Installation and operation notes
=======================
- Task Killer or Task Manager may affect this app. Please don’t use them if app does not work as expected
- App is highly optimised and DOES NOT drain you battery
- Known issues are at http://www.batterywidgetreborn.com/known-bugs.html you can prioritise bug fixes and enhancements there by voting
- Frequently asked questions are at http://www.batterywidgetreborn.com/faq.html, look there before sending support request
- Due to the limitation of the Android platform, home screen widgets will NOT be available if application is moved to SD card.
- Some devices indicate battery level every 10% due to their kernel design (known ones are: most Motorola devices including Droid and Atrix series, Samsung Moment series). Try to use Motorola 1% hack feature if your phone is among these devices
- In Android 4.0, the system may shrink and dim level indicator icons in status bar.

Voluntere for translations at http://translations.hubalek.net/app/bwr

Which version to download?
====================
If you like Material Design install either Free or Pro version
- Free flavor contains ads
- Pro flavor is ads free.

Install Classic version if you like Holo Theme
- Classic has two options how to reward developer for his effort: either single payment for Pro functionality or Ad Supported version
results.title: Battery Widget Reborn 2017
results.summary: Material themed battery monitor, saver and widget
recentChanges: - UI polishing and a small bugs fixing

comments: Irreplaceable Indispensable Essential (insert adjective) 👍 Absolutely love this widget and it's notification info.  I only wish it's notifications skin themed according to the apps style chooser. That white is crucial on a Blacked out OS... If that could happen this would truly be a 360° perfectly well rounded application.  👌 currently only way I've found to blackout notification is run classic with chart on, set it to high priority.  But that's a bit heavy just for dark notifications,  but is what it is.  Please make notification themeable!

Informative and Essential A must for every Android device owner, this app provides comprehensive information about the battery; it completes the Android OS. The screen saver display is perfect: big and fat and glowing. Knowing the charging rate helped me diagnose a battery problem. Moreover, the developer is known to be hard working and sincere.

Thanks  to  developers coz quite long time im find the apps can help my note 2 samsung and i just see the review from here and i immediately purchased... to others really  recommended  for  those hv battery  problems.. so happy  n thanks  again ftom malaysia

Perfection You get what you pay for and this thing blows all the other apps out of the water.  Provides beautiful and actually useful battery widgets, and there is no ads unlike the free apps.  It's worth more than what in paid.

Deceptively simple and easy to use This app looks like it could be complicated as there are many features. Despite the number of features, the author has developed an app that is simultaneously easy to use and extremely useful. I don't like a cluttered home screen so this app really helps. I highly recommend.

Best battery app out there Minus perhaps inaccuracies at lower battery levels (which tbh can't be really solved due to varying use), this is the best battery app and it keeps track of your battery history. Important when comparing phone battery life over the years

results.descriptionHTML:
AIM and SHOOT! Download now for FREE one of the best shooting games!
Start the killing: FIGHT the global war on crime and become the ULTIMATE SHOOTER.

Get yourself a gun and start shooting.

Sniper 3D Assassin in 7 words: great gameplay, awesome visuals and entertaining missions. And best of all? It's a free game to pass the time!

- Ultra REALISTIC 3D graphics and cool animations
- HUNDREDS of thrilling MISSIONS
- Tons of letal GUNS and mortal WEAPONS
- ADDICTING gameplay (FPS)
- EASY and INTUITIVE controls
- FREE game: play it both on your phone and tablet

DOWNLOAD the app for FREE now and don't miss amazing NEW CONTENT on periodic UPDATES. If you like fighting games, you will love the cool Sniper 3D game!


Not decided yet if you're UP to the CHALLENGE?

Forget those dumb, repetitive shooting games. Here, your duty will include racing against time, exploding helicopters in american cities, and quite a few bloody headshots in slow motion. But can you solve the puzzle, save the victims and kill only the right target hidden in the crowd?

Read what millions of extremely happy players have say about Sniper 3D. Check out our reviews!

Sniper 3D Assassin is brought to you by Fun Games For Free.

The best first person shooter action game! Be the best professional sniper in every environment!

● Hundreds of mission:
"Alpha, Bravo, Charlie, do you copy?" The president needs your help. Find the target, aim, and shoot for an headshot on all the bad guys: Terrorists from isis, suicide bombers, dumb gangsters, thugs or corrupted cops...They don't stand a chance.
Save the state secrets from the rogue agents and spies. Do you have the skills? Help your country in the massive nuclear competition. Be accurate and save the hostages and victims of the enemy. Help the resistance of the dictatorship.
But be careful at every shot: every bullet must blow the target's head. And don't forget soldier: this is dangerous and you are alone!
Fulfill your contract and you are rich. Fail, and you die.

● Unblock badass weapons and upgrade them with evolutions in the arsenal:
Buy the best Sniper rifles, assault rifles, shotguns ou Pistols that exist with the gem you earn in the game! Upgrade the ammo, the grip, the calibre to get bullets that inflict more damage, better range, scope, stability, ou zoom. Will you choose the hunting rifle , the awesome assault mp5 or a gun Glock or colt in the armory?

● Play it anywhere
Sniper 3D does not require you to be always online in order to have fun. You can enjoy it in the subway, while flying on a (real) plane, in the car on the road, during services in a temple (or maybe even on toilet!). From time to time, it may be needed to download additional (free) content from internet.

● Limited data usage
Our game will not consume tons of data from your mobile plan that you'd want to use instead to surf the web, watch youtube videos and listen to free music

● Compatibility and support
We're continuously working (hard) so that all Android phones and tablets run the game smoothly. Please report any issue you may experience to fun+sniper3d@fungames-forfree.com

● Disclaimer
Sniper 3D Assassin is a free game but it contains mature content and optional in-app purchases for real money. You may want to keep away it from your kids and younger boys

comments: Very good shooter game. Like the 1st person aspect of the game. Hope there will be more levels available because I'm just about through the 1st 14!! As for getting more diamonds quicker, suck it up buttercups...that's the point. You pay ONCE (I haven't, btw) and you get bonuses every day that you don't get playing for free. You also so that have to watch all the vids.

Game is really fun to play but you can't fully   enjoy the variety of weapons without paying for them . The game would  be SO much better if you made them more accessible. Graphics are okay but  the way the guys fall or even the way the bad guys with parachutes fall can loom kind of cheesy. All in all the game is awesome for being free!!

This game is NOT FREE, I would have paid £30 and have had full access rather being drawn in to buy upgrades every time you play. And the straw that has broken the camels back is today after it was updated it keeps crashing. Dont play it find someting else.

Good graphics and an easy, fun way to kill some time.  After about the third city, if you only use earned coins to buy sniper rifles you can make it through all the levels without having to spend any actual money.  Definitely a little racist though.  A disproportionate amount of the targets are Black/Latin/Indian.

just lost  bout 2-3 weeks worth of progress, was ok at home, but got to work and my progress was set back about 3 weeks. I tried restore purchases and there was " nothing to restore".i uninstalled and reinstalled and now i'm back to the start. I put a lot of effort into this and now its all gone. I had just got a gun good enough  for gold level on world ops too, what a bummer. Also i watched all the free gem movies but didn't get a gem everytime as promised, more like 1 in 3 watches I got a gem.
I'm real frickin tired of all the bull about free to play. Jus be honest for fek sake. Money hungry oxygen thieving scum make it hard to get the best out of these games. Xxx

comments: Love it but missing some features This app needs some features here's a list of what's missing. Resize tiles, change tile image (I love some of the images you have for some tiles) add or delete pages. I could go on but then I'd be nit picking. Get those in, cause those are freaking basic launcher items, and you'll get 5 stars and a purchase.

Not quite Win10 Mobile on Android, but best of what I have seen so far.  OK, so a Windows 8.1 phone is my persona daily driver, and I am trialling Windows 10 Mobile via the preview process, so I think I am pretty qualified to say that this is not the best experience of the Windows Mobile tile interface for die hard Windows Phone fans who are forced to use Android because of the lack of developer support on Windows Phone.   However, it is the best I have seen so far.  It needs to allow for all the features of the Windows 10 tile experience, including the transparency options, folders, tile resizing, etc.. You also need the ability to  customise the start screen layout in the same way as Windows 10 mobile.  You may be able to use widgets to emulate the live tiles.  If only Microsoft would port the Win10 experience to Android - maybe I should be careful what I wish for, after all they are porting everything else :)

Doesn't do the Win10 name justice. This is a badly mashed together skinned front end which assumes you have the developers favourite apps rather than building a list from what is in your device.  Has no list mode and the icons are even badly misplaced the moment you touch them. Give it a miss.  You won't be missing anything worthwhile.

Would be nice if I could move or add tiles around. The background wouldn't reset. The ads include audio. That's the last thing I want in a quiet situation to hit the home key and a loud ad starts playing. There was a full app list instead of a slider because when the search hardly works, sometimes let's me pick a letter then the keyboard disappears. The ads should be in tiles not a huge pop up. The level of customizability is almost zero. Looks nice, but that's about it.

Background issue I change my background like 50 times a day we'll did the first 4 days then said screw it please fix I'd like to keep my background as it was but it always goes to default when I'm not looking sneaker bugger. Other then that and the adds its awesome. 5 stars if both changed 4 for  no more bugs and deletes games I've downloaded don't get this b.s. app

Worse app It is not a god app u will think that ur phone will look like windows 10 but it won't look as I have used windows 10 and it is not like that it is very slow. If I could give it 0 ratings I would have certainly gave it 0 but still u can download it because I don't want u not to download it just because of me.

results.descriptionHTML:
This is the latest version of the official app to manage the amazing LightwaveRF Smart Home Platform with your Android smartphone or tablet.*

This new release includes changes to connect to the updated LightwaveRF systems, which allow more devices and more rooms with lots of additional improvements coming in the near future!

The LightwaveRF Smart Home Platform allows you to monitor and control lighting, power and heating whether you are in the home, or out and about, using a smart-phone, tablet or PC. The product range consists of attractive and affordable dimmer switches, power sockets and thermostatic radiator valves, plus a large range of other innovative products, some of which are simple plug ‘n’ play and others that can be easily retrofitted by any competent DIYer. All devices communicate wirelessly eliminating the need for any additional wiring.

The LightwaveRF Smart Home Platform is:

• Affordable
• Simple to Fit
• Easy to use

The LightwaveRF Smart Home Platform can:

• Save you money through reduced energy usage!
• Help keep your home and family more safe and secure
• Make your life more comfortable – no arriving home to a cold, dark house
• Save you time by automating many of the daily processes in your home

The LightwaveRF Smart Home app allows you to:

• Setup your WiFiLink and products in minutes.
• Monitor, control and schedule lighting, power and heating requirements by individual room
• Define and name Rooms that reflect the layout of your own home
• Allocate and name devices within each room
• Set Moods by room for lighting and power – for example, fully on for cleaning, some lights dimmed and the TV off for reading, and nice and cosy dimmed lights when watching TV
• Build complex events to turn on or off multiple devices across many rooms with one button
• Schedule single devices or events to activate at certain times by day, week and month
• Automatically link schedules to sunrise and sunset times
• Add random delays to events to create that genuine “look like you’re at home when you’re not at home”
• Schedule heating programmes by individual room
• Add our energy monitor to see your electricity usage real-time, and totals so far today and yesterday

And you can do all of these things even if you were on the other side of the world!

* Note that this app requires a LightwaveRF Link and the appropriate LightwaveRF devices being fitted.
results.title: LightwaveRF Home Automation
results.summary: Smartphone Your Home
recentChanges: This resolves an issue with the app crashing when exiting due to a service continuing to run.
results.description: This is the latest version of the official app to manage the amazing LightwaveRF Smart Home Platform with your Android smartphone or tablet.*This new release includes changes to connect to the updated LightwaveRF systems, which allow more devices and more rooms with lots of additional improvements coming in the near future!The LightwaveRF Smart Home Platform allows you to monitor and control lighting, power and heating whether you are in the home, or out and about, using a smart-phone, tablet or PC. The product range consists of attractive and affordable dimmer switches, power sockets and thermostatic radiator valves, plus a large range of other innovative products, some of which are simple plug ‘n’ play and others that can be easily retrofitted by any competent DIYer. All devices communicate wirelessly eliminating the need for any additional wiring.The LightwaveRF Smart Home Platform is:•	Affordable•	Simple to Fit•	Easy to useThe LightwaveRF Smart Home Platform can:•	Save you money through reduced energy usage!•	Help keep your home and family more safe and secure •	Make your life more comfortable – no arriving home to a cold, dark house•	Save you time by automating many of the daily processes in your homeThe LightwaveRF Smart Home app allows you to:•	Setup your WiFiLink and products in minutes.•	Monitor, control and schedule lighting, power and heating requirements by individual room •	Define and name Rooms that reflect the layout of your own home•	Allocate and name devices within each room•	Set Moods by room for lighting and power – for example, fully on for cleaning, some lights dimmed and the TV off for reading, and nice and cosy dimmed lights when watching TV•	Build complex events to turn on or off multiple devices across many rooms with one button•	Schedule single devices or events to activate at certain times by day, week and month•	Automatically link schedules to sunrise and sunset times •	Add random delays to events to create that genuine “look like you’re at home when you’re not at home”•	Schedule heating programmes by individual room•	Add our energy monitor to see your electricity usage real-time, and totals so far today and yesterdayAnd you can do all of these things even if you were on the other side of the world!* Note that this app requires a LightwaveRF Link and the appropriate LightwaveRF devices being fitted.
comments: How to monitor???? Direct wifi control stoped working ageen! As stated in app description:             The LightwaveRF Smart Home Platform allows you to "monitor" and control lighting, power and heating whether you are in the home, or out and about, using a smart-phone, tablet or PC.                                                So how to monitor my power and lighting devices????? I can control but definitely  can't monitor! !!  That is absolutely incorrect information in description! !!!

Great Brilliant system have had it since launch. App come a long way. Once all set up, all lights come on and off automatically. Cannot understand the negative reviews. If I need manual control I just use supplied remotes, but now it integrates with Alexa seamlessly. Perfect.

Finally... ...it actually seems to work. No idea how, it never use to. Well done :-). I've just read the low star reviews and some of the problems I can clearly see are just silly user errors. But I must admit that it took way way too long to get this stuff all working for me.  I'm surprised that things seem to be very slow moving.

Energy monitor fix and pwd rst option are good but timed events failed, post update.  Had to copy from server and save back to WifiLink to fix.  I have to wonder why dev time is being spent on this poor app rather than switch to the new app with IOS users.   Looks like it has favourable comments and a higher reputation.  Still  can't add Events with multiple actions and get command error messages when running some new events. Awaiting the major update to see if it fixes the design and functional issues.

Its just okay...but... I like the lightwaverf system but the app needs some serious work. Why can't I trigger events or turn items on/off without clicking into so many subsections. Why not add the ability to create widgets to trigger an event or turn on/off a device?

Doesn't work! We have had this for a year. We can control the heating via an I pad but our android phones are not working at all. We  edit and save  schedules but the heating just comes on at whatever the i pad was set for previously. Really fed up with it and get no help at all from the company when we try to contact them. Will be trying a different heating control system.

results.descriptionHTML:
** Kasa for Mobile is currently only compatible with TP-LINK HS100/110 Smart Plug, HS105 Smart Plug Mini, HS200 Smart Switch, LB100/110/120/130 Smart Bulb, and RE350K Range Extender **

Kasa for Mobile lets you add, configure, monitor, and control your connected TP-LINK Smart Home devices from anywhere in the world. You can schedule your appliances to turn on or off according to your schedule, or set them to Away Mode to deter would-be burglars. And that’s just the beginning. Purchase a TP-LINK Smart Home device and download the app to get started today.
results.title: Kasa for Mobile
results.summary: Kasa for Mobile is your portal to your TP-LINK Smart Home.
recentChanges: - Hot fix to address startup crash that some Samsung S7 users are experiencing
results.description: ** Kasa for Mobile is currently only compatible with TP-LINK HS100/110 Smart Plug, HS105 Smart Plug Mini, HS200 Smart Switch, LB100/110/120/130 Smart Bulb, and RE350K Range Extender **Kasa for Mobile lets you add, configure, monitor, and control your connected TP-LINK Smart Home devices from anywhere in the world. You can schedule your appliances to turn on or off according to your schedule, or set them to Away Mode to deter would-be burglars. And that’s just the beginning. Purchase a TP-LINK Smart Home device and download the app to get started today.
comments: App is very easy to use. Got a couple products from Kasa along with an echo dot. Was very smooth process pairing it with the echo. (1st time using smart home tech) They explain it easily. But the only thing I wished Kasa had that would destroy Phillips Hue is if with Alexa, you can also control the THEMES. Hopefully in a future update. Then 5 stars for sure. But app overall is very user friendly.

The app has a walk through for installing a switch when you first connect it. That was helpful. Connecting it to my Amazon Echo was easy. If the app had the ability to set a schedule based on your local sunrise and sunset that auto adjusted throughout the year id give the app a 5 star. Adding more support IFTTT would make the app great. It was difficult to find the scheduling, hint you have to click on the device to set a schedule for it. Which seems intuitive now.

I've been using Kasa for four months with a TP-link smart switch wired to a pair of outdoor outlets that power roof heating cables. Setup was really easy and there have been no problems. I use Alexa for voice control of the switch, but have not been able to make her function as a timer or even report if the cables are on or off. Kasa does provide on/off  information, though, and we were able to control the cables from afar while vacationing in the south over the holidays. I just added a TP-link outlet in my office that controls a small lamp. Alexa supports groups, and so the lamp can function as an indicator of the status of the roof cables.

Please add the ability to select a an RGB value for color changing bulbs as an alternative to the selection grid to allow a user to select specific colors. In addition, please add the option to select one color for a group instead of setting each bulb manually for a scene. Also, please consider adding Tasker integration. I would fill my entire house with TP-Link bulbs and plugs if Kasa had Tasker integration. Your user base would increase exponentially with this.. just saying!!

Don't like that TP Link has been around a lot longer than many competitors, yet they still haven't worked with Google to make it Home compatible. Even more shocking, no IFTT support. Just Alexa and kasa to control your oversized TP Link wifi wall plug. They are cheaper still than any other brand wall plug. You get what you pay for I guess...

Works fantastic with amazon echo.  Devices have really quick response (quicker than our philips Hue lights).  The only issue i have with the plugs, is that they are really large.  They have to be plugged into the top outlet, and the bottom of the plug somewhat blocks the bottom outlet, making some other plugs unusable.  The app is super easy to use and connects to alexa without going through a ton of hoops.

results.descriptionHTML:
Welcome to the United Nations Foundation App - a place where we connect you with the United Nations. Here, you can discover and join conversations on the global issues that you are most passionate about!

Learn about the Sustainable Development Goals and find out how YOU can help end extreme poverty, fight inequality and injustice, and tackle climate change.

Join a chat room based on:
Poverty
Hunger
Good Health
Quality Education
Gender Equality
Clean Water and Sanitation
Affordable and Clean Energy
Economic Growth
Innovation
Inequality
Sustainability
Responsible Consumption
Climate
Life Under Water
Life On Land
Peace
Making These Goals Happen

We want to connect as many people as possible to these goals, and help everyone, everywhere get resources on how to get involved. Talk to others about how you can help, and share stories about your experiences with these issues. Plus, read news, blog posts, and announcements about these topics - right in each chat room and all for free.

Download now, start messaging, and invite your friends and family into our app to talk about the Sustainable Development Goals and how YOU can create change!
