milestones.description: Sustain per capita economic growth in accordance with national circumstances and, in particular, at least 7 per cent gross domestic product growth per annum in the least developed countries
Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

Improve progressively, through 2030, global resource efficiency in consumption and production and endeavour to decouple economic growth from environmental degradation, in accordance with the 10-year framework of programmes on sustainable consumption and production, with developed countries taking the lead
By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value
By 2020, substantially reduce the proportion of youth not in employment, education or training

Take immediate and effective measures to eradicate forced labour, end modern slavery and human trafficking and secure the prohibition and elimination of the worst forms of child labour, including recruitment and use of child soldiers, and by 2025 end child labour in all its forms
Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment
By 2030, devise and implement policies to promote sustainable tourism that creates jobs and promotes local culture and products
Strengthen the capacity of domestic financial institutions to encourage and expand access to banking, insurance and financial services for all

Increase Aid for Trade support for developing countries, in particular least developed countries, including through the Enhanced Integrated Framework for Trade-Related Technical Assistance to Least Developed Countries
By 2020, develop and operationalize a global strategy for youth employment and implement the Global Jobs Pact of the International Labour Organization

results.descriptionHTML:
One of Google's "Best Apps of 2014 & 2015" with over 2 million downloads, the MailOnline (Daily Mail) app gives you everything you've come to expect and love from the world's largest English-language newspaper website, but with quick, easy and free access on your phone -- accessible even when you're offline.

Feed your daily addiction with stories & photos from all our top channels: US & World News, Celebrity & Showbiz, Sports, Femail, Science & Tech, Health, Money, Travel, and many more!

See what everyone's talking about and download our app today.

FEATURES:
• Over 15 Channels of must-read articles and photos - that's over 800+ original stories every day!
• Offline Mode: Pre-load stories & galleries to access when you're offline or without reception - great for commutes!
• Select a Location: Choose from US, UK or Rest of World to ensure you get the news most relevant to you.
• Express Yourself: Post your Comments on articles or Rate other user's comments that you like or dislike.
• Custom Settings: Select when data and images sync based on your preferred connection (Wi-Fi or 3G).
• Choose which Channels you want to sync and when.

If you have any trouble with the app or want to suggest new features and feedback, please email us at androidapp@mailonline.co.uk so we can help.
results.title: Daily Mail Online
results.summary: Daily Mail Online - News, Gossip, Sports & Photos from the No.1 newspaper site.
recentChanges: • Videos are now browsable through Gallery
• You can now hide channels from Settings --> Arrange Channels
We value your feedback. If you experience any bugs or have a suggestion on how to make the application better, please email us at: androidapp@mailonline.co.uk

comments: What another idiotic update. If it ain't broke, don't fix it. Videos in the main body? Now you are beginning to look like all the other news apps. How many open the video news, probably less than the normal editorials. Print the results, prove me wrong. I will apologise if you are right.

I still like the app on my phone but since beginning of February I cannot read it on my tablet (which is an older version of Android than my phone) as it continuously stops. Started about the time that video feeds within the body of the stories began. Really disappointing and annoying.
Need to install a search facility to find  your own comments. Fed up of never being able to find them.
3rd time I have installed this damned app.  Does not download corresponding photographs. Very disappointed!!!!
Lefties. Daily Mail, your daily source to fake, garbage so called 'news'
This used to be my favourite news app but now crashes everytime I open it.

results.descriptionHTML:
Happy Helping social and welfare organization ( NGO ) based in Karachi , Pakistan (Registration number DSW 4205-K ) which helps deprived women by providing them jobs in the fashion industry and thereby , marketing and exhibiting the great textile culture of Pakistan in U.A.E. and abroad.Happy Helping logo

The great craftsmanship of Pakistan is often exploited by the middlemen or designer shops and the people are forced to work for long hours for very little money. My motive is to prevent our women labour from exploitation and provide them with good income so they do not struggle for a basic lifestyle.

Moreover, our goal is to also promote the lavish and outstanding art and culture of pure handwork from Pakistan and show their talent by conducting exhibitions in UAE and around the world. We want to market the handwork on the contemporary fashion so that people could be left in awe and be marveled of how the destitute women living in difficult surroundings and circumstances could create marvelous handwork.

Happy Helping Welfare Organization is a HOPE to make a difference in an individual’s life. It is a light in which women can benefit to prosper in their dark future as we strongly believe that the female participation in the labour field is important for the economic growth of the country.

Providing jobs to vulnerable women and proving them with ‘Fair Pay’ would change their lifestyle as they would be independent, self-employed and would have self-confidence.

results.summary: Happy Helping social and welfare organization (NGO) based in Karachi,Pakistan.

results.descriptionHTML:
SDG Game & Quiz enables all people to easily learn about the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals - SDGs, invokes the importance of doing everything possible to achieve them and enables users to suggest solutions to achieve them.

The SDGs are the targets of the United Nations 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development announced on 25-27 September 2015 at the United Nations, New York.

The 17 Sustainable Development Goals are all featured in the comprehensive game, enabling users to obtain a full education on the SDGs while having fun playing the game and taking the quiz.

Play the Game to have fun & learn.
Play the Quiz to test yourself.
Share to create SDG Awareness.

Engage virtual gold coins to collect cool and super power avatars. Win SDG Hearts with correct Quiz answers to win extra lives.

Learn SDG Facts & Goals that appear after a game to succeed with SDG Quiz. Play SDG Quiz when you are ready.

SDG Game players can suggest solutions to SDG challenges and when they do so, will receive an account in SDG.WORLD, the global network for the SDGs where members can share ideas and co-create solutions for achieving the SDGs.

The SDGs are:

1. No poverty in all its forms everywhere
2. End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture
3. Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages
4. Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all
5. Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
6. Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all
7. Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy for all
8. Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all
9. Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation
10. Reduce inequality within and among countries
11. Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable
12. Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns
13. Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts*
14. Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources for sustainable development
15. Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss
16. Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
17. Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the global partnership for sustainable development
results.title: SDG Game & Quiz
results.summary: SDG Game & Quiz enables people to easily learn about the SDGs while having fun.
recentChanges: Now with over 90 Avatars and cool new backgrounds.

comments: Challanging and fun. Takes some skill to master. Very educational with multiple layers of information I did not know.
Economically wise As an economics student and an advocate,this app really suits me well.😉

results.descriptionHTML:
In the near future, the secrets of the universe will be unlocked in the chicken egg. You have decided to get in on the gold rush and sell as many eggs as you can.

Hatch chickens, build hen houses, hire drivers, and commission research to build the most advanced egg farm in the world.

An incremental (clicker) game at its core, Egg, Inc. uses many elements from simulation games that give it a unique feel and play style. Instead of menus, you are presented with crisp and colorful 3D graphics and a delightful simulation of a swarm of chickens. In addition to choosing your investments wisely you must also balance your resources to ensure a smooth running and efficient egg farm.

There is something for everyone here:
Casual players love Egg Inc's laid back feel and beautiful appearance. Take your time to build a wonderful egg farm and explore all the content.

More experienced incremental (clicker) players will love the emergent gameplay and depth afforded by the different play styles needed throughout the game. To reach the ultimate goal of having a ginormous egg farm with an astronomical value, you will need to balance strategies throughout many prestiges to make best use of your time.

Features
- Simple, Casual gameplay with opportunities to challenge yourself
- Chicken swarm!
- Dozens of research items
- Dozens of missions
- Many different hen houses and shipping vehicles
- A "Nested" Prestige system has the game always feeling new
- Wonderful 3d graphics with pixel perfect UI and shadows
- Google Play Games Achievements, Leaderboards & Quests!
results.title: Egg, Inc.
results.summary: Build an enormous egg farm!
recentChanges: - Dramatically increased trophy rewards for earlier eggs

comments: Have spent lots of time on this game, it's fun to play but having done most of the trophies already I'm unable to claim the much much higher rewards, I feel that people who haven't started them will overtake me with ease. The increased trophy rewards should be applied to everyone who already has them too!

Great game, but the most recent update did not apply the improved rewards retroactively. I'm now considering starting over, just to claim Soul/Golden Eggs I rightly earned after the trophies were first added. Please compensate those of us who played your game before the latest update!

Very addictive. This game will pass time very quick. After upgrading your eggs a few times you start to modify your strategy, but helps more and each time you. Good graphics. Looking forward to bigger things coming with future upgrades.

Fun game to play but with your most recent adjustment to trophy rewards it seems that I was cheated on large amounts of soul eggs that is not compensated for trophies already eanred. Please fix and I will gladly give 5 stars

Unending, yet addictive, drone shooter 2017. The gameplay quickly becomes: shoot drones as your primary source of income, and spend time to wait for chickens to accumulate. Egg value over time basically means nothing, as you get more from 10 seconds of gameplay than you do the 4 hours your away time covers.  But here's the worst bit. The numbers to upgrade to the next eggs are obscene, and the Devs keep releasing new ones, rescaling the value you need to make in order to upgrade. Overnight you could go from being 1 away to being 400 decillion away. What's more, the players who have spent weeks and weeks grinding for trophies worth significant rewards have had to enjoy the Devs updating those rewards to 200x their original value - and not retroactively reimbursing the original players with the new rewards.  Tbh I think it's time for me to leave this game. I can't be beaten by it if it's not the same game I started playing all those months ago. Thanks for nothing, Devs.
It's a great game with a fun story. The balance is perfect. The devs are actively involved. The best idle/clicker game there is!

results.descriptionHTML:
Exercise Your Brain! This is the unlimited, ad-free, version of the hit brain training app. Mind Games is a great collection of games based in part on principles derived from cognitive tasks to help you practice different mental skills. This app includes all of Mindware’s brain exercising games. All games include your score history and graphs of your progress. The main app shows a summary of your best games and today’s scores on all games. Using some principles of standardized testing, your scores are also converted to a comparison scale so that you can see where you need work and excel. The Training Center selects games for you to play in order to maximize your progress and enjoyment.

Mind Games incorporates Mindfulness exercises. Previous research has shown that Mindfulness may provide improvements in focus, working memory, and mental flexibility for some. Research indicates that there may also be emotional benefits of Mindfulness. The app provides instruction on how to use Mindfulness during game play and in your life. Other activities are recommended that previous research suggests may help cognition for some (such as aerobic exercise). You may also learn new memory strategies. No scientific research has yet been conducted to determine if the app’s particular implementation of Mindfulness and brain training games has cognitive benefits. At a minimum you can have fun challenging your mind with our games, learning a new meditation practice, learning about strategies that may enhance your retention of information, and gaining knowledge in the knowledge-based activities.

Mind Games is also now available on iPhone/iPad and Windows.

Languages available: English, Portuguese, Spanish, French, German, Arabic, Russian, Japanese.
results.title: Mind Games Pro
results.summary: The unlimited version of Mindware's great collection of brain training games.
recentChanges: 2.5.1 Scoring data updated for new games.
2.5.0 A great new game called Anticipation Level 2 was added.
2.4.9 New language support was added: Turkish and Italian. Several issues were fixed.
2.4.8 New Face and Object Memory Level 1 games.  The German translation was improved in this version.
2.4.7 Practice your ability to mentally rotate objects with the great new Mental Rotations game. Fixed issue with crashing for Turkish devices.

comments: I really like this app and I even paid for the Pro version but! Why can't you verify my license? This already happened thrice and I already tried uninstalling and reinstalling the app for you to be able to verify my license , I don't want to keep on doing this.
I really like this mind game. It is really exercising my mind especially after I suffered a severe traumatic brain injury. It is really helping me a lot. Thank you.

Great App for developing memory and sharpening your focus.After a few weeks of playing a couple of games a day I found myself recalling more details in all aspects without really thinking about what I was trying to recall.
Huge collection of quick games suitable for waiting at the bus stop or doctor's office. Motivates self challenge to get better at the different skills. Great brain trainer.
Love all, but I thing the graphics not compatible with material desing.
is fun get it. ..😎

results.descriptionHTML: Published in 1926, George S. Clason's 'The Richest Man in Babylon' is a collection of cautionary tales on personal finance. Full of solid advice, yet entertaining from the first page thanks to its lively depiction of a luxurious and ruthless land, its recommendations and good practices on matters as diverse as saving, budgeting, starting a business or getting out of debt, strike as amazingly up to date.
results.title: The Richest Man In Babylon
results.summary: A classic on personal finance, written as short stories set in ancient Babylon.

Great work just love it. Many thanks...
Loved it...

The richest man in babylon This book change my mindset and gave me confidence...
I loved it . one of the best book to change one's life

results.descriptionHTML:
Be the first to know about market moving news and analysis on the stocks you follow.

• Real time, concise news created for rapid reading.
• Market moving analysis from investors and industry experts.
• Instant alerts of news and analysis on your stocks.

Seeking Alpha is the leading crowd-sourced equity research platform with over 8,000 contributors. In contrast to other stock market research platforms, investment insight is provided by buy-siders, investors, and industry experts rather than sell-side analysts.

Seeking Alpha has three outstanding characteristics:

• Breadth: Our community driven approach drives remarkable breadth of unique coverage including thousands of small cap and mid cap companies.
• Depth: More than 8,000 authors contribute 5,000+ editorially curated articles per month. Our community of 2.500,000+ registered users add to an informed and sophisticated discussion.
• Influence: Seeking Alpha articles frequently move stocks, due to a large and influential readership which includes money managers, investors, business leaders, journalists and bloggers.

Seeking Alpha primarily covers the U.S. stock market. For more information, check out seekingalpha.com

APP SUPPORT
If you are experiencing issues or have suggestions to improve the Portfolio app, please email: android@seekingalpha.com

comments: Articles in notifications tab loading too slow (some more than 5 seconds). Sometimes opened articles has huge font and not readable, need to open them multiple times until I able to read them. If you scroll down to comments then articles text disappeares when you scroll to it from comments back.

Alerts need a little more customization. Some things I just like to have in my watchlist without having every single push notification. Otherwise it's a fantastic app and makes finding relevant articles much easier

This is a great app for stock investment information. Lots of well articulated opposing views are great for understanding risks your getting into when you invest in a stock. Must read comment section give you a good idea of other investor sentiments.

Great community that provides high quality analysis both by the authors and the those that write comments related to articles. Authors are held accountable by the knowledgeable readers.  There is also a nice balance of bulls and bears to help you complete a thorough consideration of potential investments. I gain some unusual insights from the content on this app.  I highly recommend it.
Someone shared this app...then I got it. Love it. Easy, all my investments are accessible. Love the news feed and alerts...
Reliable and accurate information. IMO this is the best stock app out there for beginners day trading...

results.descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Tycoon Town - Day for your Hay! Build your own perfect and flourishing place. Design it wisely with a view to its future growth for all inhabitants and their needs.
Play the most popular city builder! With a new city builder “Tycoon Town – Day for your Hay you get the maximum of joy!
Try on the role real magnate that have to develop his village to the real metropolis!


Become a king! Protect your people from awful monsters attacks! Hundreds of various bloody thirsting monsters cast around in searching for feast. Only you the one and only king can defend your people and help them to defeat the monsters!
Deploy your best warriors to fight monsters’ bosses!

Strengthen the village economy and develop your business! Start up your own business empire!
Take care of your citizens. You will have to face many exciting tasks: build houses, gather crops, tame animals, explore mysterious caves! Take on leadership and rule them as you wish.

Embellish your township! You always can embellish your settlement with arts and decorations which could inspire your citizens! Transform your small village into beautiful and prosperous metropolis!
Tame the animals! This can be beneficial for your daily routine, and who knows, maybe you’ll compile the real zoo!
Perpetual circle of life! Citizens communicate with one another, work, play, relax: they are living real life! They can do their best with your help!

Entertain your citizens! Build lemonade bar, ice cream stand, entertainment center and candy shop!
Become a discoverer! Explore new lands and discover variety of incredible places!


Features:
- Discover the secret stashes with hidden rare resources for farming and countless treasures!
- 3 different life zones are available for your block crafting. All zones vary by lush flora and living creatures!
- Fight the monsters! Various sly and dangerous monsters endanger the safety of the world. Protect your township and its inhabitants!
- Run your own 3D house! Get engaged in agricultural activities! Enter the mass production of foods.
- Domesticate various animals and take care of your livestock! Create a real Zoo!
- Expand your lemonade business – open more lemonade bars!
- Broad system of achievements allow you to craft your own, unique, living block place!
- Choose skins from presets and enjoy new skins for minecraft - pocket edition for free.
- Start to craft new items, settle a town (your own castle), become the king!

In this magic world you not only have to create the most luxurious and fantastic township but also to explore new territories and fight cunning monsters!

It’s up to you to decide who you want to be in this amazing world!
A builder? You will make a huge municipality! Stories will be told about it and the best crafters keep coming to the city from out-of-the-world parts!
A business man? Your business empire will be the most prosperous and powerful, all the world will look up to you and trying to please you!
A warrior? Your warriors will defeat all evil monsters around the township, bosses will be smashed and the peace will be restored!
An explorer? You will discover the lands no one knew about and your citizens will praise you!
Will you succeed or not? It’s totally up to you!
Become the wealthiest person! Explore new lands!
The creators of Tycoon Town - Day for your Hay is not associated with minecraft - pocket edition (pe) or any other versions of Minecraft, SimCity Build it, Hay Day or Tycoon City.
It is not an official application of Mojang.
Minecraft is a trademark of Mojang AB, and this product is not connected with the developer of this game or its licensors, and is not approved by them.

comments: The game's awesome. I love just about everything it has to offer. Except one thing. I accidentally bought a small chest for 600 gems. All I did was accidentally click it, and it instantly bought! No yes or no option, just buys it! Not happy about that. Also, we can't sell decorations or buildings. Nor can we flip buildings and decorations. Please add that feature.

Love it! I love this game so much already (I haven't been playing for long) and I haven't found any glitches yet which is great! One small thing though, could you please add a fence or something to keep villagers in and monsters out? It would really help me :) I'm not sure if you'll read this or not but you have made an amazing game so thank you and I hope you keep updating etc :)

Don't buy anything If you like the -10 minute skip.  Once you pay for something you can never use the 10 minute skip ever again. Very bad. When I pay I don't expect a feature to be removed. It was always an option. Now it's gone. Why remove an option when it's not forced? Makes no sense. Bring back the 10 minute skip!

Game was fun until it started doing random apps while I was playing. . 3 game previews in less then 5min makes it hard to play a game when It's just videos. Games getting deleted. . Why have a game I can't play without watching a stupid app every 15 seconds.

Awesome!!! Duh. For those who were complaining about ads? TURN OFF YOU WIFI OR DATA. My phone is not so good but it is running perfectly. About the one who is always crushing, maybe your phone is the problem. nahh. but this game really rocks. And also it give me ideas about builds in minecraft. Thanks!!!

Not exactly my sort of game. A little too cookie cutter for my tastes. Simple build, upgrade, build, upgrade type of game that I've been playing for years. Thought there might be some genuine exploration or adventuring given the games visual influence, but was sadly disappointed by the extremely linear gameplay.  Every player, ever, is going to play this exactly the same way.

results.descriptionHTML:
In European War 3 you will be a commander leading your soldiers to fight for resources, promote economic and industrial growth, develop new technology and seize opposing territory. Whenever deploying army, navy or air force, you need to take much thought due to their strength and weakness. Work on your defenses when you are in a weak position; build airport if you need air support. Fighting the battle could earn your forces experience and when they come to Ace Forces, their combat effectiveness would be impressive! It’s also important to upgrade your commander level as you would take the lead. European War 3 also gives you a choice among different modes like Empire, Campaign, Conquest and Multiplayer.

Empire Mode:
conquest among 8 empires with 40 campaigns.[British Empire, German Empire, the United States, Japanese Empire, Qing Dynasty, French Empire and Austro-Hungarian Empire]

Campaign Mode:
30 actual historical campaigns (choose any force you like)

Conquest Mode:
choose any country to compete in Asia, Europe and America for hegemony.

Multiplayer Mode:
player versus player, available in 1v1, 2v2 or 3v3 format.

Features:
- 28 command cards make the battle full of change.
- 11 forces such as the army, navy and air force all have unique features.
- 32 nations are involved across Europe, Asia and America, 1271 administrative regions in total.
- Technology reaches up to five levels.
- Mini-map display
- The map can be zoomed in or zoomed out .
- 15 levels of rank promotion (from Private to Field Marshal)
- Auto-save
results.title: European War 3
results.summary: New Style World War I  Strategy Game

comments: Flawed but fun Developers, game crashed and I lost all my progress! Is there anyway to get back my work?  Update: Emailed developers, no response after three days. One star until I get a little customer service.

Good but could be better You see you nailed it by a 10/10 but you can add a total war mode that allows you to make alliances, disband alliances, declare war, make peace, trade, etc. I would love to see something like this.
Horrible Game is decent, but too many bugs. Always crashes, and recently it deleted all my progress and medals. When the app developers get serious, this review will go up. Until then, 1 star

Loved it! Yeah nice maps and bigger map! But technologies and the unit types are only a Few in world cnqueror2 i like the campange and the unit but i dont like the map.Pleased Copy the map of Europe and Asia, in this game and put in on the World Conqueror 2 and I Spend few Money to Win Bot Campaign Empire and Conquest mode.
All Medals Lost Every time I restart the app, all medals gained & the unlocked war are lost. It wastes my effort & time!!! Plz fix it asap~!
Fun but flawed I can praise this game for being historically accurate and fun. But there are a few annoying aspects like rules that the tutorial does not explain to you.

results.descriptionHTML:
SDG Achievers mobile learning and quiz game is a Match 3 based mobile game that enables all people to easily learn about the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals - SDGs, play out game roles that achieve the SDGs and suggest solutions to achieve them.

The SDGs are the targets of the United Nations 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development announced on 25-27 September 2015 at the United Nations, New York.

The 17 Sustainable Development Goals are all featured in the comprehensive game, enabling users to obtain a full education on the SDGs while having fun playing the game and taking the quiz.

Play the Game to have fun & learn while winning SDG Points.
Play the Quiz to test yourself and win SDG Hearts with correct answers so you can play more games.
Share to create SDG Awareness.

You start with 5 SDG Hearts. Each SDG Heart enables you to play a Match 3 SDG Game.

Learn SDG Facts & Goals that appear after a game to succeed with SDG Quiz. Play SDG Quiz when you are ready.

SDG Game players can suggest solutions to SDG challenges and when they do so, will receive an account in SDG.WORLD, the global network for the SDGs where members can share ideas and co-create solutions for achieving the SDGs.

The SDGs are:

1. No poverty in all its forms everywhere
2. End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture
3. Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages
4. Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all
5. Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
6. Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all
7. Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy for all
8. Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all
9. Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation
10. Reduce inequality within and among countries
11. Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable
12. Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns
13. Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts*
14. Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources for sustainable development
15. Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss
16. Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
17. Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the global partnership for sustainable development

results.descriptionHTML:
The amazing next-gen economic strategy game for true-blue businessmen!

Have you ever dreamed of becoming a business tycoon? Big Business Deluxe gives you the chance to turn that dream into reality! Build a modern metropolis, set up your own business and make millions right now! Of course, there is a bumpy road ahead. It’s easy to start a business; the real challenge is to make it profitable and successful. On your way to the top you will build factories, manufacture your products and learn the secrets of effective management to keep all your enterprises in the black.
Put your economic skills to work! Use different business tactics to stay one step ahead of your competitors and become the best entrepreneur in the world. On your way to fame and fortune, don't forget about your citizens. Expand your territory, develop infrastructure, extinguish fires and participate in public life.
Remember that your potential is limited by your ambition only! Start the game now: your boss chair is waiting for you!

Key features:
✔ An offline mode to play without the Internet. Enjoy it on a plane, on the subway, on the road!
✔ Realistic atmosphere: life in the city goes on even when you are not in the game. Everything changes, just like in the real world. Your employees work and factories grow, making you wealthier with each passing hour.
✔ Competitive spirit: play together with your friends, participate in exciting contests and win unique prizes. Prove that you are the best and achieve success faster than your competitors!
✔ Manage your city: you hold the real power here. Your word is law! Take advantage of the endless possibilities the game offers you and build the ideal city!

Facebook Community: https://www.facebook.com/BBusinessGame

Privacy Policy: http://www.game-insight.com/site/privacypolicy
Terms of Service: http://www.game-insight.com/site/terms

Read the latest news on Twitter: http://twitter.com/GI_Mobile
Follow us on Instagram: http://instagram.com/gameinsight/

results.descriptionHTML:
This is an excellent introduction to financial accounting, by downloading this free app you make the first step in the world of business and economy.

This is the perfect start o study accounting, thru this app you will easily & smoothly learn the basic and even some advanced matters of the financial accounting.

This app is suitable for commerce and business undergraduate and MBA students, its also suitable good news for professionals and experienced people who haven’t time to study accounting.

We should mention that this app is the first step to become a certified public accountant CPA.

This app contains the following chapters:
1-Introduction to Accounting
2-Methods of Accounting
3- Financial Statements
4-Users of accounts and accounting concepts
5-Introduction to Debits and Credits
6- Asset Accounts
7- Liability and Stockholders\' Equity Accounts
8- Introduction to Stockholders\' Equity
9- Income Statement Accounts
10- The Accounting Cycle: Accounting Process
11- Recording Transactions
12- Introduction to Bookkeeping
13- Accrual Method
14- detailed Accounting techniques
15- General Ledger Accounts
16-Chart of Accounts
17- Debits and Credits in the Accounts
18- Introduction to Payroll Accounting
19-Payroll Withholdings: Taxes and Benefits Paid by Employees
20 -Accounting for fixed assets
21- Depreciation of fixed assets
22-Bank Reconciliation
23-Adjusting Entries
24-Balance Sheet
25- Statement of Stockholders\' Equity
26- Closing Cut-Off and Controls
27- Introduction to Ratio Analysis
28 - How to become a CPA

Why should we study accounting ?


1st Reason

Accounting is growing field due to increasing of different business regulations . Different international laws is in favour that company accounts must be made under accounting principle so , we should study accounting and its principles


2nd Reason


Accounting have many different area of specialize . You can make specialize in making and maintaining of accounts , internal auditing , Forensic Accounting , independent auditing , management accounting or cost accounting .So in accounting you can make your personality with your specialization . For this you have to study accounting .


3rd Reason


Accounting subject can provide lot of jobs growth opportunities because every company need an accountant . So , they hire accountant and you can make your career in it .


4th Reason


Accouns gives opportunity to move to other areas of business . If you will do finance jobs in different business organizations . You can also learn different practical skills of business , so you can shift your career as a business and enjoy your life with independence . Almost all good businessmen start their career from accounting field , so we should study accounting .

Why Do We Need Accounting?

Accouns Importance to Business

So why do we need accounting? Asking that question of an accountant is like asking a farmer why we need rain.
We need accounting because it’s the only way for business to grow and flourish. Accounting is the backbone of the business financial world. After all, accounting was created in response to the development of trade and commerce during the medieval times.
Italy is our first recorded source for accounting entries, and the first published accounting work in 1494 was by a Venetian monk.
results.title: Financial Accounting Tutorial
results.summary: Get this app & learn the basics of financial accounting easily and smoothly.
results.description: This is an excellent introduction to financial accounting, by downloading this free app you make the first step in the world of business and economy.This is the perfect start o study accounting, thru this app you will easily & smoothly  learn the basic and even some advanced matters of the financial accounting.This app is suitable for commerce and business undergraduate and MBA students, its also  suitable good news for professionals and experienced people who haven’t time to study accounting.We should mention that this app is the first step to become a certified public accountant CPA.This app contains the following chapters:1-Introduction to Accounting2-Methods  of  Accounting 3- Financial Statements4-Users of accounts and accounting concepts5-Introduction to Debits and Credits6- Asset Accounts7- Liability and Stockholders\' Equity Accounts8- Introduction to Stockholders\' Equity9- Income Statement Accounts10- The Accounting Cycle: Accounting Process11- Recording Transactions12- Introduction to Bookkeeping13- Accrual Method14- detailed Accounting techniques15- General Ledger Accounts16-Chart of Accounts17- Debits and Credits in the Accounts18- Introduction to Payroll Accounting19-Payroll Withholdings: Taxes and Benefits Paid by Employees20 -Accounting for fixed assets21- Depreciation of fixed assets22-Bank Reconciliation23-Adjusting Entries24-Balance Sheet25- Statement of Stockholders\' Equity26- Closing Cut-Off and Controls27- Introduction to Ratio Analysis28 - How to become a CPAWhy should we study accounting ? 1st Reason Accounting is growing field due to increasing of different business regulations . Different international laws is in favour that company accounts must be made under accounting principle so , we should study accounting and its principles2nd Reason Accounting have many different area of specialize . You can make specialize in making and maintaining of accounts , internal auditing , Forensic Accounting , independent auditing , management accounting or cost accounting .So in accounting you can make your personality with your specialization . For this you have to study accounting .3rd Reason Accounting subject can provide lot of jobs growth opportunities because every company need an accountant . So , they hire accountant and you can make your career in it .4th ReasonAccouns gives opportunity to move to other areas of business . If you will do finance jobs in different business organizations . You can also learn different practical skills of business , so you can shift your career as a business and enjoy your life with independence . Almost all good businessmen start their career from accounting field , so we should study accounting .Why Do We Need Accounting?Accouns Importance to BusinessSo why do we need accounting? Asking that question of an accountant is like asking a farmer why we need rain. We need accounting because it’s the only way for business to grow and flourish. Accounting is the backbone of the business financial world. After all, accounting was created in response to the development of trade and commerce during the medieval times.Italy is our first recorded source for accounting entries, and the first published accounting work in 1494 was by a Venetian monk.
comments: Poor quality The grammar is horrible, even though it's mostly text, which makes it a pain to follow along. Might as well just read a book on the topic. How they are competent enough to manage the Java programming required for app creation is beyond me. Their incompetence is probably the reason that the app is so ugly. No graphic designing ability, either. And subject testing? Forget it. You're left to read their broken English, which talks about accounting. That's all. App is crap.

I Hate This App This app is very bad all content are not open and only theory no questions Plz don't download this app.
Its OK Cant go all accounting step..some are purchase in $.remaining accounting knowledge is best.
Very bad experience also it's free for students

results.descriptionHTML: The REALTOR® Action Center is brought to you by the National Association of REALTORS®. The REALTOR® Action Center is the premier resource for REALTOR® political news and engagement. This app, designed specifically with state and local association staff and political leadership in mind, features access to top political stories from the REALTOR® Action Center and the Washington Report, current calls for action, and online dynamic reports to help you track your state and local's REALTOR® Party engagement and Call for Action participation.

results.descriptionHTML:
La crisi che stiamo attraversando è la crisi dell’attuale modello di sviluppo basato sul binomio: maggiori consumi = crescita dell’economia. Un modello che ha come conseguenza diretta l’aumento progressivo della disparità tra chi sta meglio e chi sta peggio; una tendenza che produce un sempre maggior numero di poveri, di disoccupati, di persone a cui vengono negati i diritti umani basilari: un alloggio adeguato, l’acqua pulita, cure mediche essenziali, un ambiente sano in cui vivere. Aumentano così l’insicurezza, la disuguaglianza, l’impunità dei governi e dei grandi soggetti economici, la repressione del dissenso, il malessere sociale.
La crisi finanziaria dello scorso autunno non è stata che la manifestazione di una crisi molto più profonda e drammatica che è ambientale e sociale al tempo stesso.
Questa situazione è globale e si manifesta in particolare nelle differenze e nei conflitti tra il nord e il sud del mondo, ma è anche nazionale, perché vediamo gli stessi problemi in Italia, anche a livello locale. L’amministrazione comunale di Macerata non è certamente sfuggita allo sviluppo di quel modello consumistico che è alla base della crisi; un modello che qui si è concretizzato in particolare nella speculazione edilizia, con l’assalto degli immobiliaristi al territorio e nel disprezzo delle esigenze del suolo e di chi su quel suolo abita o vorrebbe abitare. Questo in controtendenza rispetto ad una crescente consapevolezza etica nei confronti del consumo – che si vorrebbe sempre più critico e responsabile – e dell’economia solidale nel senso più ampio; del risparmio energetico, della tutela dell’ambiente e del territorio; dell’inclusione sociale.
Tutto questo ha portato sempre più persone ad allontanarsi dalla politica attiva, agevolando il gioco di chi comanda e di chi della politica fa uno strumento ad uso e consumo personale. Ma la politica incide sulla nostra vita di ogni giorno, decide il nostro futuro e quello dei nostri figli, ed è giunto quindi il momento di cambiare rotta: cambiare rotta nell’unico modo possibile, attraverso l’impegno profondo e costante dei cittadini, liberi dai condizionamenti esterni, liberi dagli interessi privati di pochi, liberi dalle logiche di uno sviluppo scellerato.
Occorre adoperarsi per dare spazio ad un movimento al di sopra dei partiti, capace di governare insieme e non di essere solo governato, capace di creare benessere prima che ricchezza, capace di lavorare per il bene comune e non per quello dei soliti noti, capace di dare voce a tutti e non di suonare sempre la stessa campana. Un movimento capace di superare la falsa divisione tra “destra” e “sinistra” che oggi viene utilizzata da chi comanda per tenerci separati e continuare così a fare il proprio comodo indisturbato. Questo affinché la politica torni ad essere pienamente al servizio del cittadino.
Cooperative, associazioni, gruppi nati attorno alla necessità di praticare stili di vita virtuosi sono l’attuazione pratica di un modello che ha come obiettivo la crescita del benessere personale e sociale; un modello di cui è importante raccogliere il testimone per farne esperienza partecipata a tutti i livelli.
L’essere indipendenti ed alternativi alle forze politiche che negli anni ci hanno governato, senza alcuna eccezione, è una scelta irrinunciabile, senza la quale non è possibile proporre un modello realmente nuovo. Come cittadini ci mettiamo in gioco consapevoli delle difficoltà che questa scelta comporta, ma consapevoli anche che la situazione attuale non permette compromessi al ribasso: vogliamo una città attenta alle persone e al loro benessere, una città accogliente e responsabile, una città di cui essere orgogliosi.
results.title: Macerata Ti Amo Associazione
results.summary: Enjoy millions of the latest Android apps, games, music, movies, TV, books, magazines & more. Anytime, anywhere, across your devices.

results.descriptionHTML:
Have you tried quit smoking before? It is hard. Quitting is a great decision but this process is very stressful because it changes your daily routines.

We’re all aware of bad things that cigarettes are causing, and if you decided to stop smoking - this is application for you to become smoke free.

Quit smoking slowly application can be your truly companion in process of quit smoking - it can help you slowly reduce the amount of cigarettes per day, keep your cessation stress, nicotine cravings in normal and let you body adapt to less cigarettes daily, until you completely stop smoking. This way can let you accommodate with non-smoker life again, what you used to be. But the most important thing is your willingness to stop smoking and if you have it - install this application and use it.

Enjoy easier breathing by no smoking

How it works?
For example, if you smoke 20 cigarettes a day, that means that you smoke a cigarette approximately every 42 minutes (with hypothesis that you sleep 8 hours a day). After that it will calculate how much you need to extend that period over a time to stop smoking in desired time. After setting initial parameters, hit the green screen when you smoke the cigarette.

When screen is green, you can smoke. Click to record you smoked and wait for the screen to go green again.

When screen is red, you should not smoke. Try with Tips if it’s hard. If you didn't make it - tap and hold the red screen for 3 seconds. Try harder next period, and don’t break the maximum amount of cigarettes for the day.

Why should you try this method?
This app provides method that is different from just saying I won’t smoke anymore, because that’s really hard. Reduction of nicotine, and stress from no smoking are here coming in small doses.
Hypothesis here is that with this smaller portions of nicotine turkey and need for cigarette it is easier to adapt on life without cigarette and then completely quit smoking.

Remember: Willingness to quit smoking is most important. You can do it! :-)


Features
- Create your own quitting plan
- Track your progress
- Rich motivational tips
- Motivational videos, images and quotes
- Ongoing notification
- Resizable widget
- Designed for smartwatches (Android Wear)
- DashClock widget
- Data synchronization between all your devices
- Facebook integration - like, share and send


Wear application
This application is designed for Android Wear. After you set up parameters on your mobile device, you are ready to use wearable application. Tap smoke action on notification when you smoke. Search for settings on mobile device to control behavior of wearable notification. You can also open SmokeFree wearable application and tap when screen is green. Both mobile and wear applications can work when devices are not connected. Data is automatically synced when devices connect.


Check out SmokeFree Facebook page at http://www.facebook.com/pages/SmokeFree/1531303633774253
results.title: Quit smoking slowly SmokeFree
results.summary: You started smoking gradually. Now quit the same way! It is time.

comments: Basic but effective I like the idea, but could need some updates like choosing when your day starts and ends. For instance, I start my day at 1pm and end it at 3am. This messes up my day process. Next I sometimes forget to use the app when I smoke, so I'd love to be able to edit the amount I've smoked in a day on the next day so the amount saved is more accurate.

One of the best apps I have used for anything. It is very straight forward.  This app does work on you being honest also.  I drive for a living.  At times I have too much time on my hands and would grab a cigarette.  The how many hours a day part can be confusing.  I do wish it had a button to push for going to bed.  If you use this app honestly, you will be able to quit smoking.  Coming from being a 20 year smoker.  Has great features that will make you think.

Great for Quitting I like this app because it HELPS you quit, not like others where you say "I quit today" and that's it. I do not use it with the wearable application. I would like to see an option to have the time between smokes adjust itself for the allowed cigarettes left in a day if you smoke more/before the allowed to smoke time, and an option to change the start time for your day.

Smoke free Absolutely awesome app. Sometimes it's tough to stick to it but so far I've been able to do it and it works. I would like to be able to set it for the time I actually get up and go to bed instead of having the timer start at the time I install the app. I've smoked 15 today instead of my average of 3o and mostly haven't missed them. I always smoke more first thing in the morning and I just have to ignore the timer. But then the rest of the day if I don't hear the timer I'll go over by quite a bit.

An android app for quitting gradually Used to have an iphone and used the livestrong app to quit smoking a few years ago. This is definitely the closest you're going to get on an android. Really can't complain but I wish there was a way to turn the timer off, and add a feature that shows the time when you smoked each cigarette.

I like it alot This approach to quitting makes sense. I managed to suppress my cravings till the timer runs out. I'm also able to track the number of cigarettes I smoke each day. I'm not a non smoker yet but believe I will get there if I follow this program.

results.descriptionHTML:
In Shipping Manager you start out by creating your own shipping company at the location you desire.

Throughout the game you will need to make management decisions in order to see your company gain a profit.

You will be the one in charge of purchasing new vessels, creating routes for them, negotiating contracts, assessing risks, and managing the staff.

You will be able to see the share value of your company increase, as well as make well investments in other companies.

You can compete with your friends and find out if you can be a better manager than they can.

Do you have what it takes to run a billion dollar business ?
results.title: Shipping Manager
results.summary: Manage your own shipping company. Purchase vessels, invest and much more
recentChanges: - Fixed bug where incorrect account balance would show
- Fixed bug where app would crash

comments: Good game, BUT... Really enjoying this game and still playing however, completing achievements doesn't earn me my FOB points. I have posted in the error reporting and still no response from dev. I would even look at buying the points but if the game wont give me them when I've earned them, whats to say the developers aren't just going to take my money and run? Please fix this for 5 stars. Its a great game but don't expect to get any FOB points for achievements to unlock bonus items!

Good game but needs work. The game as a whole is well thought out and a lot of fun. However, the developer has put a feedback and error board within the game and they do not appear to be correcting the problems.  The main problem being with the FOB points not being distributed and the achievements not registering. There are numerous post within the outboard and I have yet to see a response from the developer.  If the developer correct these problems then I'll rate 5 out of 5.

It's a lovely game I love the game but I have a feeling that you will do just fine until you reach a certain level. The app gets harder (takes longer to fuel vessels when you have loads of them) and you shouldn't charge for the fuel capacity upgrade because the 900million self-made vessels charge 14k fuel. Please fix this in someway.. I get that you need to make money but the game gets boring when you have played abt. 1 year... I will gladly upgrade this to a 5 star when you do something about it! Thanks!

Cool - Start up there is a typo "contry" should be "country".  - FAQ also minor typos.  "i" should be capitalized.  It's got a cool concept but I started a game, filled up ship with fuel and sent it.  After that you don't do anything and have to wait many, many hours (8 hour wait for me) for your ship to travel.  So in that sense is pretty boring starts for the game.   Hopefully there is more to do after starting a new game.  Mini-game where you have to dock or load up some containers would be cool addition.

Good..  Can be Better Increasing your share capital does not increase cash in hand. The stock exchange needs improvement. Players selling shares should have a negative impact and vice versa. Vessels should be able to call multiple ports, specially oil tankers. Introduction of chemical, LNG tankers could breath new life into the game. Mobile version should have all features of Facebook version.

Needs further improvements Not getting the FOB points in the app for  achievements is nit good not one reply from the developer yet several people have posted on their forum about the issue. Needs better functionality with regards to freight carried as it shows as a %age rather than tonnes available to ship. Could be a 5* game but I'm being generous giving 3 just now due to the issues and need for further development

results.descriptionHTML:
(AD FREE VERSION)
Published in 1926, George S. Clason's 'The Richest Man in Babylon' is a collection of cautionary tales on personal finance. Full of solid advice, yet entertaining from the first page thanks to its lively depiction of a luxurious and ruthless land, its recommendations and good practices on matters as diverse as saving, budgeting, starting a business or getting out of debt, strike as amazingly up to date.
results.title: The Richest Man in Babylon Pro
results.summary: A classic of personal finance set as stories in the ancient Babylon.

results.descriptionHTML: Find dining options within minutes of your location! Complete nutrition information for each menu item makes planning healthy meals a snap and keeps you on track to meet your goals. Keeping up with restaurant nutrition on the go has never been easier! This convenient app—the companion to the book Eat Out, Eat Well by Hope Warshaw, MMSc, RD, CDE—puts the nutrition information for hundreds of restaurants at your fingertips. Search for restaurants near you, explore menus, and save your favorite dishes. You can even nominate your favorite local restaurants for consideration. The app also features healthy restaurant eating tips from the book and helpful resources from the American Diabetes Association, including news from the association and a Type 2 Diabetes Risk Test. With these valuable tools at your disposal, you’ll always be prepared to make healthy restaurant choices—whether you’re dining in a restaurant, taking out, or ordering food online. Eat well anytime, anywhere with the help of the American Diabetes Association.
results.title: Eat Out Well—Restaurant Finder
results.summary: Find healthy dining options with this app from the American Diabetes Association

comments: Very disappointed Where to begin with comments. Search: locations are incorrect, restaurants not in alphabetical order, have to scroll through the list. When I found the one I wanted and looked at carb count for desired meal, potato dishes NOT included. Shame on you, ADA. You should know how important that info is for type 1 diabetics.

Helpful The only problem I have with this app, (1) Some menus need updated. I have been a diabetic for 16 years now with no education for controlling my A1C and sugar level. I'm now in classes that are show me how to count carbs, this app is free and helpful.

Missed the boat If it is to promote healthy eating, why do the menus displayed show some of the worst food choices and omit, seemingly, all the best that a restaurant has to offer? Really a single menu item that has 57 carbs in one serving? I expected that the choices would eliminate the bad and emphasize the best!
Totally useless Why organizations like the ADA feel compelled to release junk like this is beyond me.  There's NO content here.
Eat Out Well Totally Useless!!!

results.descriptionHTML:
--- NOW WITH THE LATEST HDR INFO!!! ---

The Human Development Index (HDI) and country facts app. A great reference for the latest HDI and lots of country facts (growth, IHDI - inequality, gender inequality, GDI - gender development, poverty, health, education, economy, public spending, social, security, international integration, environment and population) of the world. Good to travel abroad as well as to increase your knowledge of your country and the world out there.

COUNTRY FACTS

Indexes and components
・Life expectancy index
・Education index
・Income index
・Mean and expected years of schooling
・GNI (gross national income) per capita
・Ranking
・List sortable by any major index

HDI growth (trends)
・Current, last year HDI & rank
・Average annual growth: last decades

Inequality
・IHDI
・Quintile ratio
・Palma ratio
・Gini coefficient
・Inequality-adjusted indexes

Gender inequality
・GII & GII rank
・Gender inequality index
・Maternal mortality rate
・Adolescent fertility rate
・Women in parliament seats
・Men and women with secondary education
・Participation in labour force

Gender development
・GDI & GDI group
・HDI - Men & Women
・Life expectancy
・Schooling
・Income

Poverty
・Multidimentional poverty index
・Population in poverty
・Population near/severe poverty
・Contribution of deprivation to overall poverty
・Pop. below income poverty line/National poverty line

Health (Children, Youth, Adult)
・Infants exclusively breastfed
・Immunization coverage for DTP and measles
・Child malnutrition
・HIV prevalence
・Infant, Under-five & Adult mortality rate
・Malaria, Tuberculosis
・HIV prevalence
・Life expectancy
・Health expenditure
・Physicians

Education
・Literacy rate (By gender, Youth & Adult)
・Population with some secondary education
・Gross enrollment ratio (pre-school, primary, secondary, tertiary)
・School teachers trained to teach
・Pupil-teacher ratio
・Performance in reading, mathematics and science
・Primary school dropout rate
・Expenditure on education

Economy and Public Spending

results.description: Миссия журнала Путник - рассказывать читателю о различных областях деятельности человечества с уклоном на практическую полезность для читателя в плане его саморазвития.Каждый второй выпуск бесплатный.Научно-популярный журнал Путник объединил в себе команду из нескольких десятков человек. В ней собрались мастера по политике, психологии, бизнесу, культуре, философии, истории и эзотерики. Мы сделали упор на конкретике и детальности описания. Наши статьи довольно обширны и не умещаются в три четыре абзаца. Во-первых, серьезную тему на одной странице не раскроешь, вы согласны? А во-вторых, наш журнал приятно почитать погрузившись в выбранную тему, а не скакать от одного раздела к другому.Для этого есть масса бесплатных предложений, где серьезные темы представлены в виде 10 картинок и двух абзацах, но мы считаем это не приемлемым.В нашем коллективе сидят люди, многим которым из них уже за 50, и все что мы хотим, - это донести до вас знания. Качественно, развернуто и интересно.Дорогие наши читатели, мы считаем, что в каждом из нас живет искатель знаний. Поэтому, на страницах нашего журнала, мы будем шагать с вами вместе. ***Разделы представленные  журнале: политика, психология, история, культура, спорт, общество, история, экономика, путешествия, эзотерика, политика России, мировая политика, мир и политика, большая политика, обзор политики, новости политики, журнал о жизни, интересный журнал, журнал, журнал о жизни, мода, новости моды, культура, журнал о культуре, философия, работа подсознания, секреты подсознания, новости спорта, журнал о спорте, статьи о спорте, общество, путешествия, статьи о путешествии, научные открытия и разработки, научные достижения, сила мысли, НЛП, Духовное саморазвитие, мужская психология, женская психология, Психология успеха, журнал по эзотерике, Бизнес коуч, бизнес журнал, бизнес статьи, Тренинги саморазвития, Тренинги личного роста, личностный рост, Таинственное и непознанное, космоэнергетика, биоэнергетика, развитие экстрасенсорики, сверх способности человека, СК терапия Кандыба, Самонастрои Сытина,  Астрология любви, Ведическая астрология обучение, Статьи по астрологии, статьи про бизнес, полезное для бизнеса, Психотехники, Психотехники общения, навыки общения, Снятие внутренних зажимов, Народная медицина советы, Философия, Школы философии, русская философия, западная философия,  Древний мир, История забытых цивилизаций, НЛО истории, Законы метафизики, Диалектика, Астральные практики, Методы астральных путешествий, астральные путешествия, Сущности астрал, Лярвы, Эгрегор денег, Эгрегор Любви, Развитие Ясновидения, Мишель Нострадамус, Ванга о России, Вольф Мессинг, практика оккультизм, Теория заговора, Мировое правительство заговоры, Золотой Миллиард, Медитации практика, советы медитации, Йога дома, йога самостоятельно, йога в домашних условиях, Практика релаксации, Мирзакарим Норбеков, Вадим Зеланд, Ошо, Владимир Леви, Луиза хей, Георгий Гурджиев, Виктор Кандыба, Валерий Синельников , Петр Донов, Двард Кроули, Джидду Кришнамурти, Карлос milestones.description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises, in particular in developing countries, to financial services, including affordable credit, and their integration into value chains and markets

By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

Enhance scientific research, upgrade the technological capabilities of industrial sectors in all countries, in particular developing countries, including, by 2030, encouraging innovation and substantially increasing the number of research and development workers per 1 million people and public and private research and development spending

Facilitate sustainable and resilient infrastructure development in developing countries through enhanced financial, technological and technical support to African countries, least developed countries, landlocked developing countries and small island developing States

Support domestic technology development, research and innovation in developing countries, including by ensuring a conducive policy environment for, inter alia, industrial diversification and value addition to commodities
Significantly increase access to information and communications technology and strive to provide universal and affordable access to the Internet in least developed countries by 2020

results.descriptionHTML:
It all started with an idea and a small team of former Eastern Germany product engineers and material scientists here in Salzwedel. Our dream is to support all currently available open charging standards, which enables charging services to widely available electric cars. Making things easy and fun for anyone, providing innovative and efficient technologies for Power Plug EV charging infrastructure. Our DC fast Power chargers are designed to provide the highest possible uptime.

Our patented Power Plug EV charger technology is unique. Out of the pack, our EV charger are easy to use too. We play a vital role in the development of sustainable mobility, providing innovative and efficient technologies for Power Plug EV charging infrastructure from the home to the great outdoors. We want to improve fast charger and re-imagine the EV stuff, combined with comprehensive solutions for user authorization, payment and network connectivity.

If we're honest, the first version of EV charger have been pretty horrible — made from waste wood mockups. But it helped us make our corporate EV plug and charge easier and more comfortable. We soon knew it could be amazing, we need Power Plug EV charging to feel gorgeous and it’d have a million uses. But it was only an idea. We got out our sketchbook and started imagining a world where this Power EV chargers, designed to provide the highest possible uptime, existed. We knew that, by tapping into people’s innate creativity, all kinds of chargers could be transformed and improved. I knew that we could adapt and drivers can count on our EV charger. When the most common questions were ‘how much is it?’ and ‘where can I get it?’, we got even more excited, and decided we had to make our concept real. We set up a small laboratory, and learned the charger basics so we could start what was to be 2 long hard years of formulation work. We had our first sucessful results in our Power Plug EV charger formulations, and applied for some patents.

We started to get consistently strong and fully-equipped Power Plug EV chargers, but lots of other electronic parts were still a big challenge. Our user trial group grew to over 100 people. Their feedback was feeding into our work, to tailor the maintenance and repair concept towards your service organization and competences. The pace of developments with the big Companies was very slow. We made a new years resolution. Stop listening to other peoples advice. Go with our gut. We set ourselves a deadline of 6 months to make it happen. It was now or never. We designed a brand to get ourselves excited. We made videos, designed packaging, and built a website about Power Plug EV charger running on an arduino. Having converted our lab into a little factory, we spent days and nights making and packing EV charger. All of our friends and family helped. It took an entire month of blood, sweat, tears and favours to make our first 1000 Power EV chargers.

While we were getting our factory and supply chain up and running, we started getting out – meeting our customers. We loved meeting all the awesome people we’d talked to online. We shipped to more than 40 countries. A lot of good people had been incredibly patient, and it felt great to share our idea of perfect EV chargers with the world. We had our Christmas party in our new factory. It's an amazing idea, and people are inspired. While continuing to keep community creativity at the heart of what we do, we get focused on bringing EV chargers to the next level. A simple and elegant solution that would be difficult to do without our EV charger - awesome! In the time since we launched, we'd had hundreds of emails asking for different colours. We're blown away! A strong interest in emobility and EV charging has been building in Scandinavia. EV charging has always been about so much more than itself. We felt strongly that we could help fuel a conversation about why a culture of e-mobility is important and was shared all around the internet.
results.title: Power Plug EV charger
results.summary: From "hmm" to "yay" via "eureka" and "wow".
recentChanges: The dream from the start has been to be in everyone's garage, as useful as light switch and plug socket. To get there, we need to get it into the big municipal energy supplier with our Power Plug EV Charging stations. We'd been trying for while, and at last we make a huge leap by launching in over 300 municipal utilities across the EU and Asia. Woop!

BBSBEC APP

Baba Banda Singh Bahadur Engineering College, Fatehgarh Sahib, is a center of erudition where we nurture young talents in different fields of Engineering. Our major emphasis of imparting technical educationis to encourage curiosity and innovativeness among our students and strengthen the foundation from where they can acquire quick learning ability to cope with fast changing needs of the industry. Our campus provides students with the opportunities to gain and use knowledge to build successful lives and careers, and become an integral part of the community. For imparting quality education, strong infrastructure is a must, but more important is the zeal and commitment for the burning desire to excel in all fields.


Developed by- Puneet Kaur and Ramandeep Kaur..

results.descriptionHTML:
Mechanical World (MW) es una organización con operaciones a nivel nacional, que sirve a la industria y a la construcción desde el año 2003.

Su especialización y capacidad innovadora la han llevado a crecer rápidamente en un mercado que busca cada vez soluciones con eficiencia y productividad. Actualmente su red de empresas abarca Lima, Piura, Chiclayo y Arequipa y prevé en un futuro próximo seguirse expandiendo.

Desde sus oficinas y centros de servicio técnico, ingenieros y técnicos de amplia experiencia en el rubro, atienden requerimientos de las mas importantes empresas que ejecutan obras de ingeniería civil, construcciones mecánicas, instalación de estructuras, montajes electromecánicos, montajes de tuberías, entre otras.

Como grupo, MW es reconocida en el medio industrial y en el de la construcción como una organización dinámica, competitiva y en constante desarrollo que se adapta a las necesidades de sus clientes, brindando soluciones integrales: desde la asesoría técnica en la selección de herramientas y materiales, hasta la venta, alquiler, servicio técnico y provisión de materiales y repuestos.

La expansión de la infraestructura, el crecimiento industrial y urbano del país nos dan un buen horizonte para seguir consolidándonos. La fe que ponemos en lo que hacemos sumada a la confianza de nuestros clientes y el respaldo de nuestras representadas, nos permite avanzar con confianza y mejorar día a día.

results.descriptionHTML:
Être Open, c’est intégrer l’un des acteurs de référence des Entreprises de Services du Numérique françaises, exerçant avec pertinence ses trois métiers : Consulting, Application Services, Infrastructure Services.
Être Open, c’est être innovant pour accompagner avec audace la transformation Industrielle et Numérique des entreprises.
Être Open, c’est être éthique & responsable et adopter une approche humaine en s’appuyant sur une politique RH active et attentive permettant l’épanouissement de tous ses collaborateurs.
Être Open, c’est rejoindre plus de 3 000 collaborateurs passionnés répartis sur tout le territoire et à l’international pour concevoir et intégrer les solutions innovantes de demain.
Être Open, c’est s’engager à apporter une qualité de service et à faire la différence en conjuguant Professionnalisme & Proximité, Valeur & Innovation.
Être Open, c’est un état d’esprit caractérisé par ses cinq valeurs d’entreprise : Pertinence, Audace, Ethique & Responsabilité, Passion, Engagement.

Et vous, qu’attendez-vous pour être Open ?

Grâce à l’application OPEN&MOI, en un clic, découvrez Open et accédez à votre espace candidat personnalisé pour consulter les nombreuses offres d’emploi.

En vous authentifiant, vous pouvez entrer dans votre espace sécurisé pour :
- consulter et mettre à jour vos données personnelles
- consulter les offres d’emploi et de stage proposées par notre réseau d’agences en France, en Belgique, au Luxembourg, au Pays Bas.
- créer une sélection d'offres en lien avec votre projet professionnel
- vous abonner aux alertes e-mail
- envoyer les offres sélectionnées à votre adresse mail pour postuler en ligne ultérieurement
- partager les offres d’emploi, inviter vos amis à télécharger l’application

Cette application vous permet également de rentrer dans l’univers Open :
- découvrir son Offre, ses solutions et services
- découvrir les agences d’Open en régions
- rechercher ou géolocaliser rapidement une agence avec la cartographie et entrer en contact avec elle
- rester au contact d’Open au travers de ses dernières actualités et ses événements
- découvrir les corners Facebook, Viadeo et Linkedin d’Open Carrières ainsi que son compte Google+ et sa chaîne Youtube
Retrouvez-nous également sur www.open-groupe.com

Enfin, dans la partie « &moi », possibilité pour les Clients d’Open de répondre à l’Enquête de Satisfaction proposée dans le cadre de la Démarche Qualité menée par Open. Cet accès est sécurisé par la saisie d’un code personnel, reçu au préalable.

Mots clés :
- Open & moi
- Openetmoi

Être Open, c’est s’engager à apporter une qualité de service et à faire la différence en conjuguant Professionnalisme & Proximité, Valeur & Innovation. Être Open, c’est un état d’esprit caractérisé par ses cinq valeurs d’entreprise : Pertinence, Audace, Ethique & Responsabilité, Passion, Engagement. Et vous, qu’attendez-vous pour être Open ?Grâce à l’application OPEN&MOI, en un clic, découvrez Open et accédez à votre espace candidat personnalisé pour consulter les nombreuses offres d’emploi.En vous authentifiant, vous pouvez entrer dans votre espace sécurisé pour :- consulter et mettre à jour vos données personnelles - consulter les offres d’emploi et de stage proposées par notre réseau d’agences en France, en Belgique, au  Luxembourg, au Pays Bas.- créer une sélection d'offres en lien avec votre projet professionnel- vous abonner aux alertes e-mail- envoyer les offres sélectionnées à votre adresse mail pour postuler en ligne ultérieurement- partager les offres d’emploi, inviter vos amis à télécharger l’applicationCette application vous permet également de rentrer dans l’univers Open :- découvrir son Offre, ses solutions et services- découvrir les agences d’Open en régions- rechercher ou géolocaliser rapidement une agence avec la cartographie et entrer en contact avec elle- rester au contact d’Open au travers de ses dernières actualités et ses événements- découvrir les corners Facebook, Viadeo et Linkedin d’Open Carrières ainsi que son compte Google+ et sa chaîne YoutubeRetrouvez-nous également sur www.open-groupe.comEnfin, dans la partie « &moi », possibilité pour les Clients d’Open de répondre à l’Enquête de Satisfaction proposée dans le cadre de la Démarche Qualité menée par Open. Cet accès est sécurisé par la saisie d’un code personnel, reçu au préalable. Mots clés :- Open & moi- Openetmoi

results.descriptionHTML:
The Siemens Motor Toolkit (patent pending) is the most powerful motor app ever designed for a mobile device. Motor Toolkit delivers comprehensive industry resources and connects industry professionals to motor support anywhere, anytime. Available for use with your phone or tablet, Motor Toolkit provides a wealth of information to help you broaden your knowledge of induction motors and find solutions that meet your motor challenges.

Whether you’re looking to upgrade your equipment with a new motor, order spare parts or troubleshoot your application in the field, the Motor Toolkit Camera feature connects you to our Siemens product or service teams. In a world where a failed motor can shut down processes and cost hundreds of thousands of dollars in lost product time, the Motor Toolkit contains critical information and direct communication channels with Siemens to respond preventatively and immediately to a motor problem.

Key features:

• Take a picture of any Siemens motor nameplate and get fast motor support.
• Forget a basic motor formula? No problem. Use common industry formulas to get quick results.
• Plan your project with the Lead Time Calculator.
• E-mail motor resources and training material straight from the app.
• Learn more about motor basics and where motors are used along with trouble shooting advice from Siemens motor experts through our White Papers.
• Find the right motor for your project by accessing motor features and viewing dimension prints to see how the equipment fits into your application.
• Find contact information to support your quotation and technical needs, connect to the right web site, look for solutions in other Siemens apps and understand more about what Siemens offers.
• Stay current with the latest trends in industry and how Siemens solutions are making companies more competitive.

Siemens is a global powerhouse in electronics and electrical engineering, operating in the fields of industry, energy and healthcare as well as providing infrastructure solutions, primarily for cities and metropolitan areas. For over 165 years, Siemens has stood for technological excellence, innovation, quality, reliability and internationality. Our almost 370,000 professionals based in 190 countries deliver sustainability and profitability to customers worldwide.
