results.descriptionHTML: Alles geht, nichts ist unmöglich. Coworking in der Produktion - Erfinder und Tüftler willkommen! Gemeinsam basteln, innovativ sein und aus Prototypen in Serie gehen. Coworking, wie auch das kooperative Arbeiten im Team, ist ein bekanntes Prinzip der Kooperative. Eeben auch Arbeiten4.0 oder Coworking genannt, um den Aspekt der Kooperation im Coworking herauszuarbeiten. Andernfalls fällt auch das Co-Engineering in die Facetten eines Coworking, wie aus Makerspace, FabLabs oder Maker Faire bekannt. Bislang jedoch zunächst auf das Cooworking in der Administration begrenzt, lassen sich diese Kooperations-Prinzipien auch auf die Fertigung übertragen. Dadurch, dass Coworking Produktion die gemeinsame Nutzung von Maschinen-Infrastruktur einschliesst, sind Coworking Ergebnisse und Kooperations-Effekt ungleich höher. Durch industrielles Coworking lässt sich die schleichende De-Industrialisierung verhindern und Innovationskraft stärken. Viele Coworking Ideen sind integraler Bestandteil der Industrie4.0 Prozesse in der Kooperation von Produktionen. Erfinder und Tüftler arbeiten beim Cooworking Hand-in-Hand mit der Stamm-Mannschaft. Keinesfalls ist Coworking Production losgelöst von gemeinsamer Betriebs- und Flächennutzung zu sehen: Coworking benutzt gerade diese kreativen und zeitlichen Freiräume. Beispiel für Produktions-Coworking sind Rapid Prototyping, 3D-Druck und Musterbau. Besonders für individualisierte KLeinserien eignet sich Coworking aus der Industrie4.0 Definition. Coworking ist somit vor allem Geisteshaltung und erst im zweiten Schritt kooperative Zusammenarbeit. Mittels Coworking lassen sich Auftragsspitzen glätten und die Schichtauslastung gewährleisten. In OWL, dem Mittelstand und der traditionellen Serienfertigung war Coworking zunächst unbekannt, bis Maschinen-, M2M- und Lagerkapazitäten knapp wurden, bei gleichzeitigem Anstieg an Kundenvarianten mit schneller Lieferzeit. Coworking bietet Unabhängigkeit von Kapitalbindung, Ort, Zeit und Menge. Vor diesem Hintergrund lässt Coworking das IoT oder Internet der Dinge in der Produktion zu. Coworking ist die Umsetzung innovativer Ideen mit Hilfe von Hochtechnologie, besonders CNC und M2M Coworking Steuerungen als remote Arduino Cloud-Anwendungen. Kooperatives und interaktives Coworking bedient sich gemeinsamem Workspace an Daten und Produktionsfläche zu pauschalierten Gemeinkosten. Intelligentes oder smart Coworking spricht Industrie4.0 Vorgehensweisen in Form von Arbeiten4.0 an. Damit ist Coworking kompatibel mit persönlciher Work-Life-Balance in Abstimmung und Kooperation von iterativen Coworking-Schritten. Gerade diese Coworking Vorteile machen es als Production Coworking so einmalig und gewinnbringend umsetzbar. Jede Branche, Maschinenbelegung und Personalteam kann Coworking umsetzen oder kooperativ begleitet anwenden. Der Begriff Coworking ist ja aus diesem Grund auch nicht auf die Produktion, sondern auch auf die Verwaltung erweiterbar. Coworking als App-Kooperation vereint Ideen und industrielle Industrie4.0 Kapazitäten perfekt.
results.title: Coworking
results.summary: Success through co-engineering. FabLab principles of individualized small batches.

Transportasi Indonesia sebagai sebuah media yang fokus pada industri transportasi dan infrastruktur. Inovasi terus dilakukan salah satunya dengan menghadirkan media online dengan alamat "transportasi.co" untuk kemudahan akses tercepat bagi pembaca setianya.

transportasi.co mengupas tentang perkembangan transportasi dan infrastruktur di Indonesia maupun Internasional. Transportasi Indonesia kini menjadi referensi transportasi dan infrastruktur oleh masyarakat umum, pelaku bisnis transportasi, akademisi, dan regulator.

Kami berharap sajian informasi dan edukasi yang bermutu, mendalam, dan lugas di sektor kelistrikan dan energi dapat dinikmati dan memberikan pencerahan kepada para pembaca.

Tak lupa, pada kesempatan ini Tim Redaksi transportasi.co mengucapkan selamat menjalani aktifitas anda.

results.descriptionHTML:
The Refrigerant Slider is an essential tool for HVACR professionals and gives you access to a user-friendly, quick pressure-to-temperature refrigerant converter. The tool covers more than 75 different refrigerants, also including natural refrigerants and you will find information about the various refrigerant types. This includes information such as Global Warming Potential (GWP) and Ozone Depleting Potential (ODP). The GWP value for mixtures is calculated based on the mass percentage of the individual components GWP value, as stated in the IPCC AR5 report, chapter 8, table 8.A.1
The tool is based on NIST Refrigerant Properties and is using the Antoine equations for the conversion. You will be able to see both dew and bubble point for refrigerants with glide.

How to use
On the left side of the screen a slider quickly helps you find the pressure or temperature reference. On the right side you can find the precise pressure and temperature. You can type in the precise pressure or temperature reading, and Refrigerant Slider will instantly give you the corresponding figure and move the slider for visual indication.
You can easily change pressure and temperature units within the most used metric (SI) and imperial units and switch between gauge and absolute pressures as you please.

Engineering Tomorrow
Danfoss engineers technologies that enable the world of tomorrow to do more with less. We meet the growing need for infrastructure, food supply, energy efficiency and climate-friendly solutions. Our products and services are used in areas such as refrigeration, air conditioning, heating, motor control and mobile machinery. We are also active in the field of renewable energy as well as district heating infrastructure for cities and urban communities. Our innovative engineering dates back to 1933 and today Danfoss is a world-leader, employing 22,500 employees and serving customers in more than 100 countries. We are still privately held by the founding family. Read more about us at www.danfoss.com.

Disclaimer
The Refrigerant Slider (“the Application”) is provided on an “as is” and “as available” basis for the intended purposes as determined by Danfoss only and any use hereof is at the user’s sole risk. The Application and results and information generated thereby cannot substitute technical advice but must be verified by the user, they are not promises and should not be relied on as accurate data or analyses.
Danfoss disclaims all warranties and conditions regarding the Application, whether express, implied, or statutory, including, but not limited to, conditions of merchantability, satisfactory quality, and fitness for a particular purpose, accuracy and non-infringement of third parties’ rights. Danfoss does not warrant that the Application will meet your requirements or that the operation hereof will be uninterrupted or error-free.
To the extent not prohibited by law, in no event shall Danfoss be liable for any direct, special, indirect or consequential damages, whatsoever, including, without limitation, damage to property, damages for loss of savings or profits, or loss of data arising out of any use of the Application.

Refrigerant Slider support, please send e-mail to: coolapp@danfoss.com
Please visit www.danfoss.com for more information and contact details.
For more information about local support please visit http://refrigerationandairconditioning.danfoss.com/contact/

results.descriptionHTML:
This innovative and interactive application invites you to explore a virtual education facility, filled with the very latest in Harman technology.

As you navigate your way around this state-of-the-art environment, you’ll discover how classrooms, lecture theatres, collaborative learning and innovation spaces can be systematically enhanced and technologically-simplified with integrated Harman solutions from AMX and world-leading brands like JBL, Crown, AKG and many more. Get a sense of how AMX adds value to the learning environment by giving teachers fingertip control of the audio-visual and presentation equipment at their disposal, enabling them to easily integrate technology into the lesson plan. Discover how these innovative systems can also integrate seamlessly with other building-wide functions such as audio, lighting, even blinds and air-conditioning, so that teachers can have fingertip control of their entire teaching environment. And, find out how, when used in association with other technologies such as SVSi, Vision 2 IPTV video delivery system and the Inspired Signage digital signage solution, AMX technology enables you to build a complete and integrated communications infrastructure.

Finally, learn how AMX can give you over-arching control over your entire education facility and its installed systems, all from one location. Whether for a single classroom or multi-site campus; this innovative solution networks multimedia equipment into one time-efficient, cost-cutting solution.

Harman has led the audio world for over 60 years, its world-class brands are evident in all types of installation, tours and music performance globally, Harman also provides many premium auto infotainment systems for brands including Ferrari, Audi and Jaguar. Now, with the inclusion of Martin (Lighting) and AMX control into the Harman family, the company offers the most expansive and cost-effective solutions in the AV industry.

AMX has been developing innovative technologies that simplify the education world for over 30 years. There is an increasing number of technologies and operating platforms in today’s classrooms and lecture theatres - AMX solves the complexity of managing and controlling these technologies with innovative, reliable, and user-friendly systems.

Get a complete overview of available spare parts and service kits for the large range of Danfoss Industrial Refrigeration products such as valves, strainers and other refrigeration line components.
Danfoss Industrial Refrigeration offers the largest range of refrigeration controls for industrial refrigeration branch and offers a wide range of service parts.
The products are shown as cut-away drawings and as illustrations showing the type of spare parts, where to mount them and what the service-kits includes of components.

How to use:
Search the product that need repair by browsing either by function or by type name. You can then identify the size of the valve or product to find the available service kits and the corresponding code number.

results.descriptionHTML:
With over 50 speakers and more than 65 sessions over 3 days, The Australian Engineering Conference is the largest Engineering industry conference of 2016.

Covering the topics of Defence, Leadership, Energy and Infrastructure this conference brings together Industry leaders and key decision-makers from across the engineering profession.

National and international keynote speakers will expose delegates to megatrends and thought leadership that will influence the future direction of engineering in Australia.

Whether you’re in a key engineering leadership role; riding changes drivenby technology and innovation; working in infrastructure and transport planning; adjusting to the energy industry transition or building your career in Defence, this conference is for you.
results.title: ausengcon 2016
results.summary: Australian Engineering Conference 2016

results.descriptionHTML:
COM IT Expo is India’s leading platform in which you can source end-to-end solutions, meet specific project needs, and generate leads. Benefitting from one-to-one interactions.

COM IT provides a platform for IT Software , hardware and service solutions. The tradeshow seeks to meet the objectives of generating sustainable growth for the IT sector and create new business and networking opportunities . It provides ample emphasis on IT , Security , Cloud Computing , IT Infrastructure , Web and Mobile solutions.

Com it also showcases new security solutions , mobile apps and software developers more than ever before. Mobility has changed the way people approach work and is making changes in the way business operations work and is also changing processes within marketing , IT , and app Development departments.

Its a dedicated exhibition which helps the exhibitor to connect and network with target audience. The exhibition is a large platform for showcasing and launching new products and creating awareness about latest trends in the industry. Its a global platform for the IT, Security & Mobile industry where innovative solutions find their target users.

With the trade show companion app you can do the following
- Browse exhibitor list, get full details of the exhibitors like contact names, numbers and email, get more information about exhibitors from their website and social media accounts. Filter events by categories and favourites
- Mark exhibitors as favourites with a simple tap. Easily take notes about each exhibitor
- Use interactive floor plan to easily find exhibitors with a simple tap. Also find exhibitors of interest by filtering and searching. Selected exhibitors are highlighted on the floor plan
- Browse product category and easily find exhibitors exhibiting products under a product category
- Get notification for any changes.
- Use News Feed and broadcast messages to get you up to date with the latest happenings
- Event venue maps and directions to reach there

Construction Week is the leading publication for the construction industry in the GCC.

With one of the most active construction markets anywhere on the globe, the GCC is home to billions of dollars worth of development in real estate, infrastructure and industry. Contractors, consultants and developers have invested heavily in being part of the region's growth, which looks set to continue.

Download the Construction Week app today and be the first to read the latest issue of the magazine on your Android device.

The app is being offered for free for a limited time only. Download now and gain access to our fantastic bonus archive feature.

results.descriptionHTML:
The SAFHE/CEASA biennial event is widely acclaimed as the flagship event for healthcare infrastructure in Southern Africa. It is the single most respected event for the industry bringing together delegates from both the public and private healthcare sectors.

Both SAFHE and CEASA fully support the Government’s mission to deliver quality healthcare services throughout South Africa by assisting in making affordable healthcare services available to all.

This event brings together people who can make a difference in exploring the ever increasing challenges and complexities, in order to find affordable and meaningful solutions.

Challenges include:
National Health Insurance (NHI) – what are the implications?
Enhancing patient care
Aligning communities, healthcare services platform and infrastructure
Optimising life cycle cost of service delivery
Providing services in rural areas amidst growing urbanisation
Rapidly ageing infrastructure and changing geographical needs
Build new or refurbish?
Digital, electronic, and high tech solutions
Curbing the growth of dreaded diseases
Safety in growing trends of violence and theft
Energy – affordable, reliable, renewable?
Skills development and producing the actual skills needed
Quality control and real-time performance monitoring

Designing, constructing, equipping and staffing along with operations and maintenance are becoming complex issues for healthcare planners and subsequently require much more innovative and creative thought for future sustainability.

So come along and join us, whether as a speaker, sponsor, exhibitor or visitor, you will be most welcome and will certainly value the experience of networking with the key role players and decision makers in the healthcare industry in Southern Africa.
results.title: SAFHE / CEASA 2015
results.summary: SAFHE/CEASA is the flagship healthcare infrastructure event in Southern Africa.

results.descriptionHTML:
The app is a complete free handbook of Power Plant Engineering which covers important topics, notes, materials, news & blogs on the course. Download the App as a reference material & digital book for electrical, energy, nuclear science engineering programs & degree courses.

This useful App lists 230 topics with detailed notes, diagrams, equations, formulas & course material, the topics are listed in 5 chapters. The app is must have for all the engineering science students & professionals.

The app provides quick revision and reference to the important topics like a detailed flash card notes, it makes it easy & useful for the student or a professional to cover the course syllabus quickly before an exams or interview for jobs.

Track your learning, set reminders, edit the study material, add favorite topics, share the topics on social media.

You can also blog about engineering technology, innovation, engineering startups, college research work, institute updates, Informative links on course materials & education programs from your smartphone or tablet or at http://www.engineeringapps.net/.

Use this useful engineering app as your tutorial, digital book, a reference guide for syllabus, course material, project work, sharing your views on the blog.

Some of the topics Covered in the app are:

1. FUEL SYSTEM OF THE DIESEL POWER PLANT
2. INTRODUCTION TO POWER PLANT
3. POWER
4. ENERGY
5. SOURCES OF ENERGY
6. REVIEW OF THERMODYNAMIC CYCLES RELATED TO POWER PLANT

10. REHEAT CYCLE
11. REGENERATIVE CYCLE

17. STEAM POWER PLANT
18. NUCLEAR POWER PLANT
19. DIESEL POWER PLANT
20. FUELS AND COMBUSTION
21. STEAM GENERATORS
22. STEAM PRIME MOVERS
23. STEAM CONDENSERS
24. SURFACE CONDENSERS
25. JET CONDENSERS
26. TYPES OF JET CONDENSERS
27. HYDRAULIC TURBINES
28. IMPULSE AND REACTION TURBINES
29. SCIENCE VERSUS TECHNOLOGY
30. SCIENTIFIC RESEARCH
31. SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY INFRASTRUCTURE
32. FACTS VERSUS VALUES
33. ATOMIC ENERGY
34. HIGHLIGHTS OF THE NUCLEAR POWER PROGRAMME
35. NUCLEAR POWER CORPORATION OF INDIA LIMITED
36. OCEAN ENGINEERING APPLICATIONS
37. INTRODUCTION OF STEAM POWER PLANT
38. STEAM POWER STATION DESIGN
39. COAL HANDLING
40. DEWATERING OF COAL
41. ESSENTIALS OF STEAM POWER PLANT EQUIPMENT
42. TYPES OF FUEL BURNING SURFACES
43. METHOD OF FUEL FIRING
44. AUTOMATIC BOILER CONTROL
45. PULVERIZED COAL
46. BALL MILL
47. BALL AND RACE MILL
48. SHAFT MILL
49. PULVERISED COAL FIRING
50. CYCLONE FIRED BOILERS
51. WATER WALLS
52. ASH DISPOSAL
53. ASH HANDLING EQUIPMENT
54. SMOKE AND DUST REMOVAL
55. TYPES OF THE DUST COLLECTOR
56. FLY ASH SCRUBBER
57. FLUIDISED BED COMBUSTION
58. TYPES OF FBC SYSTEMS
59. INTRODUCTION OF STEAM GENERATOR
60. CLASSIFICATION OF THE BOILERS
61. COCHRAN BOILER
62. LANCASHIRE BOILERS
63. LOCOMOTIVE BOILER
64. BABCOCK WILCOX BOILER
65. INDUSTRIAL BOILERS
66. MERITS AND DEMERITS OF WATER TUBE BOILERS OVER FIRE TUBE BOILERS MERITS
67. REQUIREMENTS OF A GOOD BOILER
68. LA MONT BOILER
69. BENSON BOILER
70. LOEFFLER BOILER
71. SCHMIDT-HARTMANN BOILER
72. VELOX-BOILER
73. CLASSIFICATION OF STEAM TURBINE
74. THE SIMPLE IMPULSE TURBINE
75. COMPOUNDING OF IMPULSE TURBINE
76. PRESSURE COMPOUNDED IMPULSE TURBINE
77. SIMPLE VELOCITY-COMPOUNDED IMPULSE TURBINE
78. PRESSURE AND VELOCITY COMPOUNDED IMPULSE TURBINE
79. IMPULSE-REACTION TURBINE
80. ADVANTAGES OF STEAM TURBINE OVER STEAM ENGINE
81. STEAM TURBINE GOVERNING
82. STEAM TURBINE PERFORMANCE

Each topic is complete with diagrams, equations and other forms of graphical representations for better learning and quick understanding.

Power Plant Engineering is part of electrical, energy, nuclear science engineering education courses and technology degree programs of various universities.

results.descriptionHTML:
A high performance, reliable cabling system is critical to your network infrastructure. Use Siemon's app for an inside track into essential Data Center, Intelligent Building and LAN resources. This app is a must-have for keeping up with Siemon's latest innovations.

FEATURES:

- Instant access to "INNOVATE: Cabling For The Future" interactive digital magazine

- Network Cabling White Paper Library and Case Study Library

- Quickly access product data, spec sheets and installation instructions for data centres, ConvergeIT Intelligent Building Solutions, Fibre Optic Cabling Solutions, Copper Cabling Solutions, Cable Management Solutions

- Read the latest news on the Siemon Infrastructure Blog

- Access Siemon's video library of demonstrations and tutorials

- Gain knowledge on ISO, IEEE, TIA Standards as relates to structured cabling

- Learn about the benefits of shielded cabling in the Shielded Cabling Resource Center

- See Siemon's updates on Facebook, Twitter and other social media channels

- Easy access to contact Siemon offices around the world

- Locate Siemon partners

- Siemon Partners can login to access special partner resources including the Partner Support Center and TapIT

ABOUT SIEMON:

Established in 1903, Siemon is an industry leader specializing in the design and manufacture of high quality, high performance low voltage infrastructure solutions and services for Data Centers, LANs and Intelligent Buildings. Headquartered in Connecticut, USA, with global sales, technical and logistics expertise spanning over 100 countries, Siemon offers the most comprehensive suite of copper and optical fiber cabling systems, cabinets, racks, cable management, data center power and cooling systems and Intelligent Infrastructure Management solutions. With over 400 patents specific to structured cabling, Siemon Labs invests heavily in R&D and the development of Industry Standards, underlining the company's long-standing commitment to its customers and the industry.

results.summary: Siemon product data app

results.descriptionHTML:
NY EDTECH WEEK is a global education innovation festival in New York City. The Festival celebrates education entrepreneurship and serves as a meeting point for the education innovation industry focusing on how entrepreneurship and edtech drive advancements in education and learning.

New York City and its neighbors are home to the most significant learning infrastructure in the world. NY EDTECH WEEK offers the best of New York City — connections, customers, capital, and culture — in this must-attend event for the edtech and education communities.

The festival attracts, develops, and supports education entrepreneurs and edtech investors — and consequently supports advancements in learning outcomes. NY EDTECH WEEK brings together hundreds of technology innovators, early-stage investors, entrepreneurs, policymakers, media representatives, researchers, and teachers to foster new partnerships and exchange best practices.

Learn more at www.NYEDTECHWEEK.com

Get a Sneak Preview of Upcoming Toughbook Devices

The Toughbook Innovation Forum is designed to: provide you with an opportunity to learn what is new in technology and in your industry, share and discuss best practices, and network with other organizations in your region. There will be presentations from Intel and Microsoft on upcoming developments and a chance to learn about the full infrastructure available to support mobility initiatives in your organization. During industry breakouts you will hear customers share their experiences, and you can join roundtable discussions to explore where new technologies can be maximized. If you attend one conference this year, the TIF will help you stay ahead on what's coming next.

FREE! Construction Week! – India’s leading magazine for infrastructure and real estate.

Download the Construction Week app today and get all the latest news, analyses and project details, and keep yourself abreast with the latest in the world of construction, infrastructure and real estate

Get access to all the latest developments in the world of construction — from policy issues and innovative technology to upcoming projects.

With strong emphasis on need-to-know information and insights, Construction Week is the first choice of policy makers, infrastructure and real estate head honchos and industry leaders.

The magazine has a dedicated Plant, Machinery, Vehicle (PMV) section that keeps you updated with all the latest developments in the Indian construction equipment, machinery and vehicle segments. In addition, there is also a special Mechanical, Electrical and Plumbing (MEP) section focusing on innovations in products and technology.

So, why wait for your monthly edition to reach your office when it can be delivered on time, every time and straight to your digital newsstand? Whether you’re in India or abroad, you will never have to miss an issue again.

Our new app includes all the fabulous features you’ve seen in the magazine. So download the app now and get it all at your fingertips, literally!

Plus, you can keep all of your favourite issues in your very own Construction Week library. Sign up today!

results.descriptionHTML:
S&D MAGAZINE est un support de presse dédié à la sécurité et à la défense la revue Sécurité & Défense. Il répond à un besoin éditorial en matière de continuum sécurité & défense.
Revue haut de gamme (disponible en version papier), elle joue la carte de l’influence au travers d’une ligne éditoriale marquée.
Elle s'est rapidement imposée auprès des donneurs d’ordres, prescripteurs, industriels, entreprises, cabinets de lobbying et acteurs majeurs de la sécurité et de la défense, comme un média de qualité où communiquer, discuter,
critiquer, convaincre, argumenter, bousculer est possible, en toute finesse et intelligence.
Il associe l’expertise rédactionnelle et opérationnelle d’hommes et de femmes spécialistes des questions de sécurité et de défense.
Il traite des sujets suivants : Big Data - La sécurité urbaine - La cybersécurité - La sécurité des Etats - L'Industrie -
La sécurité des objets connectés La sécurité civile - La sécurité des grands évènements - La robotique - Les drones
La sécurité maritime - La sécurité des aéroports - La sécurisation des accès - Grandes innovations & technologies
Sujets géopolitiques, marchés & économiques - L’export - Sécurité privée - Les institutionnels de la sécurité - Les systèmes d’information et de communication - La gestion des identités - La criminalité financière - La fraude
La gestion des risques - Le Moyen-Orient - L’Asie - Tribune des PME - Protection des infrastructures critiques
La sécurité aérienne - La sécurité des frontières - Les risques naturels - etc...

results.summary: Magazine dedicated to security and defense
results.description: S&D MAGAZINE est un support de presse dédié à la sécurité et à la défense la revue Sécurité & Défense. Il répond à un besoin éditorial en matière de continuum sécurité & défense.Revue haut de gamme (disponible en version papier), elle joue la carte de l’influence au travers d’une ligne éditoriale marquée.Elle s'est rapidement imposée auprès des donneurs d’ordres, prescripteurs, industriels, entreprises, cabinets de lobbying et acteurs majeurs de la sécurité et de la défense, comme un média de qualité où communiquer, discuter,critiquer, convaincre, argumenter, bousculer est possible, en toute finesse et intelligence.Il associe l’expertise rédactionnelle et opérationnelle d’hommes et de femmes spécialistes des questions de sécurité et de défense.Il traite des sujets suivants : Big Data - La sécurité urbaine - La cybersécurité - La sécurité des Etats - L'Industrie - La sécurité des objets connectés La sécurité civile - La sécurité des grands évènements - La robotique -  Les dronesLa sécurité maritime - La sécurité des aéroports - La sécurisation des accès - Grandes innovations & technologiesSujets géopolitiques, marchés & économiques - L’export - Sécurité privée - Les institutionnels de la sécurité - Les systèmes d’information et de communication - La gestion des identités - La criminalité financière - La fraudeLa gestion des risques - Le Moyen-Orient - L’Asie - Tribune des PME - Protection des infrastructures critiquesLa sécurité aérienne - La sécurité des frontières  - Les risques naturels - etc...

milestones.description: By 2030, progressively achieve and sustain income growth of the bottom 40 per cent of the population at a rate higher than the national average
By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status

Ensure equal opportunity and reduce inequalities of outcome, including by eliminating discriminatory laws, policies and practices and promoting appropriate legislation, policies and action in this regard
Adopt policies, especially fiscal, wage and social protection policies, and progressively achieve greater equality
Improve the regulation and monitoring of global financial markets and institutions and strengthen the implementation of such regulations

Ensure enhanced representation and voice for developing countries in decision-making in global international economic and financial institutions in order to deliver more effective, credible, accountable and legitimate institutions
Facilitate orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility of people, including through the implementation of planned and well-managed migration policies
Implement the principle of special and differential treatment for developing countries, in particular least developed countries, in accordance with World Trade Organization agreements

Encourage official development assistance and financial flows, including foreign direct investment, to States where the need is greatest, in particular least developed countries, African countries, small island developing States and landlocked developing countries, in accordance with their national plans and programmes
By 2030, reduce to less than 3 per cent the transaction costs of migrant remittances and eliminate remittance corridors with costs higher than 5 per cent

results.descriptionHTML:
Are you having trouble with Algebra 1? Show me the answer! may be able to help! It solves many different types of Algebra 1 problems. It's unique in that it shows the WORK and ANSWER to the Algebra 1 problems YOU enter. Please note that in this free version of the app, you can only view the work and answers to the example Algebra 1 problems provided.

It currently supports the following types of Algebra 1 problems:
Number Systems
- Absolute Value of a Number
- Find Value of Expression
- Convert Rational Numbers to Fractions
- Find the Largest or Smallest Number in a Group
- Find a Rational Number Between Two Other Rational Numbers
- Write a Rational Number as a Repeating Decimal
- Classify Numerical Expressions as Integers, Rational Numbers, Irrational Numbers, etc.
- Sort a Group of Numerical Expressions from Highest to Lowest or Lowest to Highest
- Write Number as a Power
- Express Number in Scientific Notation

Operations and Properties
- Simplify Numerical Expressions
- Test Equation for Equality

Algebraic Expressions
- Simplify Algebraic Expressions
- Substitute Values into Algebraic Expressions and Simplify

First Degree Equations and Inequalities in One Variable
- Solve Equation for a Variable
- Solve Equation for a Variable in Terms of Another Variable

Operations with Algebraic Expressions
- Add or Subtract Algebraic Expressions
- Multiply and Divide Monomials
- Multiply Polynomials
- Divide by Binomial
- Multiply and Divide Powers with the Same Base

Graphing Linear Functions and Relations
- Find Slope of a Line From Two Points
- Find X and Y Intercepts of a Line

Writing and Solving Systems of Linear Functions
- Create Linear Equation from Slope and Point
- Create Linear Equation from Two Points

Special Products and Factors
- Classify Number as Prime, Composite, or Neither
- Express Number as Product of Prime Numbers
- Find all Integral Factors of Number
- Find Greatest Common Factor of Two Monomials or Numbers
- Square or Multiply Polynomials (Monomial or Binomial)
- Factor Polynomials (Binomial or Trinomial)

Operations with Radicals
- Express Radical as Rational Number
- Reduce Radical to Simplest Form
- Determine Rational Approximation of Irrational Number
- Find Principal Square Root of Monomial
- Simplify Radical Expressions

Quadratic Relations and Functions
- Solve Quadratic Equations
- Solve Systems of Equations Algebraically

Algebraic Fractions, and Equations and Inequalities Involving Fractions
- Reduce Algebraic Fraction to Lowest Terms
- Add, Subtract, Multiply, and Divide Algebraic Fractions
- Solve Equations and Inequalities with Fractional Coefficients
- Solve Fractional Equations

results.descriptionHTML:
MATH Domain helps you improve your understanding and problem solving skills for math topics typically introduced in Pre Algebra.

General Features
+ A reading area that introduces concepts and problem solving steps.
+ A quiz-like area to reinforce concepts and steps introduced in the reading area.
+ A practice area to further reinforce concepts and improve problem solving accuracy and speed.
+ A progress area that keeps track of progress made in the practice area.

There are four general areas:

Learning Area explains topics in an easy-to-read format. All Topics have and Introduction section that outlines what you will be learning. Topics are broken into Sections (where possible). Sections introduce problem solving steps and provide examples covering these steps. Some of these Sections are broken up by Concept Check areas.

Concept Checks quiz you on important concepts and problem solving steps for several topics. These quiz-like areas typically give less than 10 multiple choice questions. The questions are always the same and can be repeated any number of times.

Practice Area is the place to improve problem solving accuracy and speed. There are an unlimited number of randomly generated multiple choice problems. Step by step solutions are available for each problem after the question is answered. You can set your fastest average times or your longest streaks of correct answers for many topics and can post your results to the Leaderboards.

Progress Area keeps track of progress made in the Practice Area, Achievements, and Leaderboards. It displays the total questions answered, the total correct, percentage correct, assigned letter grade, fastest average time, longest streak, and current streak for many topics. You can also use this area to go directly to a Topic's Practice Area.

Outline of Topics
BASICS
A. Numbers
B. Decimals
---- i. Place Value
---- ii. Rounding
C. Fractions
---- i. Equivalent Fractions
---- ii. Reducing
---- iii. Lowest Common Denominator
---- iv. Improper to Mixed Number
---- v. Mixed Number to Improper
D. Exponents
---- i. Evaluation
E. Radicals
---- i. Evaluation
F. Absolute Values
G. Conversions
---- i. Fraction to Decimal
---- ii. Decimal to Fraction
H. Inequalities
---- i. Comparisons
FUNDAMENTALS
A. Multiply, Divide, Add, and Subtract
---- i. Integers (positive and negative numbers)
---- ii. Fractions
SIMPLIFYING
A. The Order of Operations
---- i. PEMDAS

This is a free-to-download, ad-supported app with in-app purchasing.

Available Languages:
- English (U.S.) only


Thanks for any support.

MATH Domain Development

results.descriptionHTML:
Download the SDGs in Action app and take action to help the Sustainable Development Goals - the world’s to-do list to end poverty, reduce inequalities and tackle climate change - become a reality.

Learn about the 17 SDGs, get news on your favourite goals, find out what you can do how you can take action to help achieve them, create your own events actions and invite others to join you in sustainable actions and events.

The SDGs in Action app features:
- Detailed information about each of the 17 goals, including targets, explanatory videos, key facts and figures, and suggestions on how you can help achieve them take action
- The latest sustainable development news from around the world See how innovation is helping to achieve the goals, interact with global citizens around the world and see the latest news
- The ability to choose what goals are important to you and receive notifications about that goal.
- Access to the World’s Largest Lesson explaining each of the Sustainable Development Goals
- Find actions and events near you that you can join to support the goals
- The ability to create Actions you’re planning in your area, and invite others to join

About the Sustainable Development Goals:
The UN’s 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development, featuring the 17 Sustainable Development Goals, was unanimously adopted by world leaders at a historic UN summit in September 2015. By aligning national priorities with the 2030 Agenda and working together with the private sector and civil society, governments have started mobilizing efforts to end poverty, address inequalities and tackle climate change by 2030.

About the app:
The SDGs in Action app is brought to you by the GSMA, which represents the interests of nearly 800 mobile operators worldwide, and Project Everyone, a non-profit global campaign to spread the messaging of the Global Goals.

comments: Pretty, but buggy. The app has a noble purpose and looks great, but needs improvement. It's quite buggy. The only sign-up option I was able to use was Twitter. Also, when you try to download reports from articles, the app crashes. If you share articles to Twitter, it posts the whole text (3700 words!) into the field + the link. And this is only what I found from five minutes of using it...
#SDGs Information Closer to us This app as been highly resourceful to know more about Global Goals and proactive action towards a measurable impact to create share prosperity and equality

Sharing needs improvement When I share an article to Twitter, I get the entire text pasted into Twitter instead of a link to the article on the web. Request for the developers to provide a fix for this.

Be more social This is indeed a great app to get more people engaged with the SDGs! I wish that the app would be more social by linking at least Twitter account, and add comments feature so that the participants in a particular activity can interact with one another :-)
Great application on the SDGs Gives access to information on the SDGs, news, videos, and a very useful what can I do section. It also runs smoothly and has a great interface.
It's a great step It's a good step towards the betterment of our lives and society but it would've been great if we could choose more than 4 issues to work on.

* Simplify both, numerical and literal expressions
* Solve nth-degree literal equations
* Solve nth-degree inequalities (new and experimental)

results.descriptionHTML:
MathAlly Graphing Calculator is quickly becoming the most comprehensive free Graphing, Symbolic, and Scientific Calculator for Android.

Here are some of our current features:

Basics:
-Enter values and view results as you would write them
-Swipe up, down, left, or right to quickly switch between keyboard pages.
-Long click on keyboard key to bring up dialog about key.
-Undo and Redo keys to easily fix mistakes.
-Cut, Copy, and Paste.
-User defined functions with f, g, h

Symbolic Calculator:
-Simplify and Factor algebra expressions.
-Polynomial long division.
-Solve equations for a variable.
-Solve equations with inequalities such as > and <
-Solve systems of equations.
-Simplify trigonometric expressions using trigonometric identities.

Graphing:
-Graph three equations at once.
-View equations on graph or in table format.
-Normal functions such as y=x^2
-Inverse functions such as x=y^2
-Circles such as y^2+x^2=1
-Ellipses, Hyperbola, Conic Sections.
-Inequalities
-Logarithmic scaling
-Add markers to graph to view value at given point.
-View delta and distance readings between markers on graph.
-View roots and intercepts of traces on graph.
-Regression

Calculus:
-Differentiation.
-Definite integration.

Other Features:
-Complex numbers
-Hyperbolic functions
-nCr and nPr functions
-Change numeric base between binary, octal, decimal, and hexadecimal
-Bitwise operators AND, OR, XOR, and NOT
-Matrices.
-Vector dot product and norm.

FAQ’s

Q. Is there are tutorial anywhere explaining how to use the graphing calculator?
A. There are three into tutorials in the app for the calculator, graph equations, and graph screens. Additional tutorials can be found on our website http://www.mathally.com/

Q. How do I get to the keys for pi, e, solve, etc?
A. There are four keyboard pages. Each swipe direction across the keyboard moves you to a different page. The default page is the swipe down page. To get to the page with trig functions, swipe left. To get to the matrix keys, swipe up. To get to the last page, swipe right. No matter what page you are on, the swipe direction to move to a specific page is always the same.

Q. What do you have planned for future releases?
A. You can keep up to date on the latest news on our blog at http://mathally.blogspot.com/ . This news will include what is coming up in future releases. Also feel free to leave comments and let me know what you think!

If you find a bug or have questions, please email me.

Math Ally

comments: The best so far. This is the only program, of this type for Android, that is truly functional and well done.  The UI is intuitive and easy to use.  The plotting feature is easy and informative - unlike any other app so far.  The plotter give possibilities like no other app of this type, the same with the rest of the program.  Many critical functions not found in any other app, including GeoGebra.  The free version is really useful and the paid version is worth EVERY cent - I would know, I'm using this program since two years and can't imagine being without it, even when using GeoGebra or other suits.  Sure, it has it's limitations, but which program doesn't.  Really indispensable.

Amazing! I love this calculator!  As an engineer and math teacher, I am on the constant look out for a new reliable, comprehensive calculator.  After trying many others, MathAlly has knocked me off my feet in astonishment!  I consider myself very lucky to have found such a noteworthy app.  MathAlly has placed itself high on my list of best app developers.  One of the easiest 5 stars I have given

So far very impressed Love the gesture keyboard. Up is always what you expect. Hate these context sensitive swipes where what you get depends on where you are. In Some apps its always a complete surprise. IMO if you can't explain to someone what they must over the phone without first asking what they see then your interface has failed. Love the tuts. Concise and to the point. Well worth the money.. It's free? Can't be...

Great Calculator This calculator has an amazing amount of functions. Just found out today that it can solve systems of equations. It can also do definite integrals and matrix operations. I haven't done too much with the graphing part, but what I have done is amazing. I'd prefer this calculator over a $140 one.

An excellent app but I miss indefinite integration.. also i want regression analysis to be included in this & make data import & export possible either via csv or text..also i don't find how to evaluate a function f(x) at x=constant. suppose i want to take derivative of f(x) @ x=constant..

This app is absolutely amazing. I'm seriously confused about the low ratings. There's some things I'd personally add but that would just make me crazy picky. This calculator tops any $100 calculator and it's free. It's great

results.descriptionHTML:
Futoshiki, also known as "Inequality", is a challenging logic puzzle game from Japan. Similar to Sudoku, the aim of the game is to place the numbers 1-5 in a grid, using the inequality signs to aid you. Every puzzle has just one solution, that can be reached through clever logical deduction.

An elegant and relaxing brain game for people of all ages.

Features:
- 100 puzzles in 4 difficulties.
- Soothing sounds of the hang drum as you play.
- Save your position in any puzzle to come back to later.
- Use the Note function to pencil in squares you're unsure of.
- No ads, no special permissions requested.

---------

You may also know this game as Hutosiki, More or Less or 不等式. Futoshiki puzzles are published in the UK in The Times, The Guardian and The Daily Telegraph.

results.summary: Futoshiki is a challenging logic puzzle game from Japan, similar to Sudoku.

Every puzzle has just one solution, that can be reached through clever logical deduction.An elegant and relaxing brain game for people of all ages.Features:- 100 puzzles in 4 difficulties.- Soothing sounds of the hang drum as you play.- Save your position in any puzzle to come back to later.- Use the Note function to pencil in squares you're unsure of.- No ads, no special permissions requested.---------You may also know this game as Hutosiki, More or Less or 不等式. Futoshiki puzzles are published in the UK in The Times, The Guardian and The Daily Telegraph.
comments: Great free game I have played all the levels. Only on the very last puzzle did I notice it has soothing sounds. I generally keep the noise off on my phone so I can use it at work. There are more than enough puzzles for you to be able to figure out whether the paid version is worth it to you. I will probably get the paid version soon.

Nice Enjoyed this very much. Could maybe go up to 6 or 7 and Deadly is still easy to do within ten minutes. Not keen on the orange though, not easy to see. I will go through them again to reduce my time, <2 minutes for Easy, <3 for the next etc. Also, I agree with those who wish for an Undo All button to start again.

What is wrong with the game??? I have loved playing this for years, and now when I open it the screen is black and nothing happens. I've uninstalled and reinstalled and still a black screen. Anyone else have this problem??

Excellent. Small bug with error display: sometimes the error color is not removed until I clear the square and retype the number. It also needs some features like undo, save/load checkpoint, some automation of notes.

Any way to take off the sound? The puzzle is very interesting but I find very annoying that you can't take off the sounds. If I can, I will give a five. If I can't, I will uninstall it and give a one.

Pretty good implementation One of the best implementations of a Futoshiki game I've found, but needs a few extra tweaks to make it great. It needs an undo feature, in case you accidentally set a number when you didn't mean to. It needs to record the fastest time to solve a level rather than the last time. Also an indication of which level you just solved on the list would be great. Fix them and I'd probably buy the game.

results.descriptionHTML:
Need more than free videos to learn math? YourTeacher's Algebra app is like having a personal math tutor in your pocket.

**

“It’s like a private school math classroom, but you are the only student.”
John

"I just love YourTeacher and the way you explain things. I felt like I was in a classroom instead of just looking at examples."
Diane

"My daughter is doing Algebra 1 in 8th Grade. She had been getting really low grades because they are moving through the material so quickly. She had a test 3 days after we bought your program and she got 94% (the highest score in the class) because we had her work through the modules over and. She really enjoys the program and her motivation is good again."
Melanie

******

Need more than videos to learn Algebra…

YourTeacher’s Algebra app replicates the entire math classroom experience with your own personal math teacher.

Our lessons include:

-Multiple video example problems
(similar to how a teacher starts class at the board by explaining the examples from the textbook)

-Interactive practice problems with built-in support
(similar to how a teacher assigns practice and walks around the class providing help)

-A Challenge Problem
(similar to how a teacher assigns a higher level problem which students must work on their own to prove mastery)

-Extra problem worksheets
(similar to how a teacher assigns additional problems for homework)

-Review notes
(similar to how a teacher provides summary handouts or refers you to your textbook)

******

Scope and Sequence

YourTeacher’s Algebra app covers an entire year of Algebra 1.

results.description: Need more than free videos to learn math?  YourTeacher's Algebra app is like having a personal math tutor in your pocket.  **“It’s like a private school math classroom, but you are the only student.”John"I just love YourTeacher and the way you explain things. I felt like I was in a classroom instead of just looking at examples."Diane"My daughter is doing Algebra 1 in 8th Grade. She had been getting really low grades because they are moving through the material so quickly. She had a test 3 days after we bought your program and she got 94% (the highest score in the class) because we had her work through the modules over and. She really enjoys the program and her motivation is good again."Melanie******Need more than videos to learn Algebra…YourTeacher’s Algebra app replicates the entire math classroom experience with your own personal math teacher.Our lessons include:-Multiple video example problems(similar to how a teacher starts class at the board by explaining the examples from the textbook)-Interactive practice problems with built-in support(similar to how a teacher assigns practice and walks around the class providing help)-A Challenge Problem(similar to how a teacher assigns a higher level problem which students must work on their own to prove mastery)-Extra problem worksheets(similar to how a teacher assigns additional problems for homework)-Review notes(similar to how a teacher provides summary handouts or refers you to your textbook)******Scope and SequenceYourTeacher’s Algebra app covers an entire year of Algebra 1. comments: Just started using - helping so far! Hit a rough spot in my studies and these videos are really helping me understand what I missed. The instructor has all the charisma of Ben Stein, but he does an excellent job of explaining the problems. Overall very helpful!

Helpful but laggy Application looks okay, is very laggy because it seems to be browser based, streams all videos which sometime take a lot of time to buffer, up to 10 minutes for a 3 minute video,   takes 5-10 seconds to load each tab when you navigate as well ... Never seen an app this slow before, have tried two devices and three net connections. Would definitely not purchase again, shame I missed the refund window. Unusable

Occasional wrong answer to practice questions. So far, I'm only through the "consecutive integers" section, to which the "xtra" question 7 asks for an even integer answer, but the key lists odd integers. Now the videos on age questions won't play... Also, regularly, the teacher says "this is a good habit to get into" but infuriatingly, never, ever volunteers the logic behind this statement.  Practice 6 of wind current problems mixes kph and miles. Whoever edited this should be fired.
You won't regret it It's a bit pricey at 10 bucks but i couldn't  put a price on understanding algebra..at last!

Easy to use Read the reviews and bought it it is the best math help I've ever had I have struggled for years and could not understand it this app helped me learn math that I wish I was able to back in high school it is helping me enhance my career and personal enrichment

Excelent courses I'm reviewing my math after about 30 years and I'm on my second course. These courses are excellent.   The format is similar to programmed learning with small amounts of information with a challenging set of exercises to reinforce the knowledge.  I only wish they covered higher math subjects.

results.descriptionHTML:
If you're looking for a graphing calculator app that works smoothly and seamlessly, you've found it! Graphing Calculator by Mathlab is a scientific graphing calculator integrated with algebra and is an indispensable mathematical tool for students in elementary school to those in college or graduate school, or just anyone who needs more than what a basic calculator offers. It is designed to replace bulky and costly handheld graphing calculators and works on virtually any Android phone or tablet.

Furthermore, Graphing Calculator by Mathlab displays calculations as it performs them on the high-quality display of the Android device, making it easier for the user to understand the calculations and see them clearly. This app has two great strengths. First, it acts as a fine scientific calculator, but, more than that, it displays the intermediate results of the calculations as you type. It allows the students to both watch and learn how the calculations are made and how to find the final answer. Second, the graphing ability is absolutely stunning! Not only does the calculator beautifully display the graphs, but it automatically generates the x- and y- values and displays them as well.

Video: https://youtu.be/6BR8Lv1U9kA
Help site with instructions and examples: http://help.mathlab.us
If you have a question, send email to calc@mathlab.us

PRO FEATURES
* Full screen graphs
* 9 workspaces
* Longer input and history
* Save constants, functions and expressions in the library
* Physical constants
* Internet is not required
* No advertisements
* 30 days refund

SCIENTIFIC CALCULATOR
* Square root, cube and higher roots (hold √ key)
* Exponent or power, use x^ key, (x^2)
* Logarithms ln(), log(), log[base]()
* Trigonometric functions sin π/2, cos 30°, ...
* Hyperbolic functions sinh, cosh, tanh, ... (hold "e" key to switch)
* Inverse functions (hold direct function key)
* Complex numbers, all functions support complex arguments
* Derivatives sin x' = cos x, ... (hold x^ key)
* Scientific and engineering notation (enable in menu)
* Percent mode
* Binary, octal and hexadecimal numbers, 0b1010, 0o123, 0xABC
* Save and load history

GRAPHING CALCULATOR
* Multiple functions graphing
* Implicit functions up to 2nd degree (ellipse 2x^2+3y^2=1, etc.)
* Polar graphs (r=cos2θ)
* Parametric functions, enter each on new line (x=cos t, y=sin t)
* Function roots and critical points.
* Graph intersections
* Tracing function values and slopes
* Slide to scroll
* Pinch to zoom
* Fullscreen graphs (PRO)
* Function tables
* Save graphs as images
* Save tables as csv
* 3D graphs

FRACTION CALCULATOR
* Simple and complex fractions 1/2 + 1/3 = 5/6
* Mixed numbers, use space to enter values 3 1/2
* Use parentheses (1+2)/(3+4)=3/7

ALGEBRA CALCULATOR
* Linear equations x+1=2 -> x=1
* Quadratic equations x^2-1=0 -> x=-1,1
* Approximate roots of higher polynomials
* Systems of linear equations, write one equation per line, x1+x2=1, x1-x2=2
* Polynomial long division
* Polynomial expansion, factoring
* Linear and quadratic inequalities

PROBABILITY AND STATISTICS
* Hold n! key to enter functions, double tap dot to enter comma
* Combinations nCr(5,2)=10
* Permutations nPr(5,2)=20
* Sample A=[1 2 3 4 5]
* Sample B=[2 3 4 5 6]
* Sum sum(A) = 15
* Average avg(A) = 3
* Median median(A) = 3
* Sample variance var(A) = 2.5
* Population variance varp(A) = 2
* Standard deviation stdev(A) = 1.58..., stdevp(A) = 1.41...
* Covariance cov(A,B) = 2.5
* Correlation corr(A,B) = 1

MATRIX CALCULATOR
* Matrix and vector arithmetic operations
* Vector cross product, dot product (hold *) and norm
* Matrix determinant, inverse, transpose and trace functions

LIBRARY
* Physical constants (PRO)
* User defined constants and functions (PRO)
* Save expressions for future reference

comments: Awesome! It's one of the calculators I use most. The free version also works fine, but it's got ads. They are not the disturbing popup data-draining kind of ads, so you can give the free version a try before upgrading if you want. Keep up the great work!

Background without grid lines This app is the the best math app I have ever used, it's very simple and easy to use. I really enjoy when I use it. But one thing I don't like about it,  it's the grid lines in the workplace. We really would love to see an option to get the background without these grid lines as soon as possible. The app deserve even 10 stars

9.99/10 would buy again Redifining the basics! New review: the new edit mode is great and supresses the need for keyboard arrows. Also, I just realized you can compute double definite integrals! In my opinion the next step involves improving the 3D grapher. Wishlist: function and programming support with recursion.

Love it! It is great for helping my son understand calculus! Pro tip,  to see the slope of the tangent line at a point,  tap on the point after dragging the x or y axis line to intersect the point you are interested in!
Awesome App for Maths Amazing app for sloving maths question really helpful for me. Highly recommended to every one to use the pro version. Thank you mathlab for making this amazing app. ❤

It has a learning curve to figure out how to set up problems, but it is an excellent app. In fact, I probably should have read the manual like the developer says, so I'm going to go back and raise my review. Not their fault I didn't RTFM.

results.descriptionHTML:
Math Tricks 2016 is designed for those who want to learn interesting mathematical tricks to speed up the calculating.
New skills you can use in the store, at school, at college, at work - wherever thanks to quick calculation skills can save a lot of precious time. Available in many languages, this is a perfect app on Google Play that provides all basic formulas in mathematics. It's very convenient for all students in high school or university and engineers to look for any easy or complicated formulas.
These tricks will help solve part of the mathematical problems and tasks much faster than classical. Will also be helpful to those who want to hone basics such as the multiplication table.
When you learn these mathematical tricks, you'll be able to show off your skills to friends and prove to them that you have a talent for mathematics.
This app also has many tools to calculate the geometric shapes or find the roots of equations. Users can also share any formulas with friends by many ways: email, message, or Facebook.
Not only for smartphones, this app is also suitable for tablets with compatible interfaces.

results.descriptionHTML:
SDG Game & Quiz enables all people to easily learn about the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals - SDGs, invokes the importance of doing everything possible to achieve them and enables users to suggest solutions to achieve them.

The SDGs are the targets of the United Nations 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development announced on 25-27 September 2015 at the United Nations, New York.

The 17 Sustainable Development Goals are all featured in the comprehensive game, enabling users to obtain a full education on the SDGs while having fun playing the game and taking the quiz.

Play the Game to have fun & learn.
Play the Quiz to test yourself.
Share to create SDG Awareness.

Engage virtual gold coins to collect cool and super power avatars. Win SDG Hearts with correct Quiz answers to win extra lives.

Learn SDG Facts & Goals that appear after a game to succeed with SDG Quiz. Play SDG Quiz when you are ready.

SDG Game players can suggest solutions to SDG challenges and when they do so, will receive an account in SDG.WORLD, the global network for the SDGs where members can share ideas and co-create solutions for achieving the SDGs.

The SDGs are:

1. No poverty in all its forms everywhere
2. End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture
3. Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages
4. Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all
5. Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
6. Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all
7. Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy for all
8. Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all
9. Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation
10. Reduce inequality within and among countries
11. Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable
12. Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns
13. Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts*
14. Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources for sustainable development
15. Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss
16. Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
17. Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the global partnership for sustainable development

milestones.description: By 2030, ensure access for all to adequate, safe and affordable housing and basic services and upgrade slums

By 2030, provide access to safe, affordable, accessible and sustainable transport systems for all, improving road safety, notably by expanding public transport, with special attention to the needs of those in vulnerable situations, women, children, persons with disabilities and older persons
By 2030, enhance inclusive and sustainable urbanization and capacity for participatory, integrated and sustainable human settlement planning and management in all countries
Strengthen efforts to protect and safeguard the world’s cultural and natural heritage

By 2030, significantly reduce the number of deaths and the number of people affected and substantially decrease the direct economic losses relative to global gross domestic product caused by disasters, including water-related disasters, with a focus on protecting the poor and people in vulnerable situations
By 2030, reduce the adverse per capita environmental impact of cities, including by paying special attention to air quality and municipal and other waste management
By 2030, provide universal access to safe, inclusive and accessible, green and public spaces, in particular for women and children, older persons and persons with disabilities
Support positive economic, social and environmental links between urban, per-urban and rural areas by strengthening national and regional development planning

By 2020, substantially increase the number of cities and human settlements adopting and implementing integrated policies and plans towards inclusion, resource efficiency, mitigation and adaptation to climate change, resilience to disasters, and develop and implement, in line with the Sendai Framework for Disaster Risk Reduction 2015-2030, holistic disaster risk management at all levels
Support least developed countries, including through financial and technical assistance, in building sustainable and resilient buildings utilizing local materials

results.descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Serenbe. The best reason to live here is the life here.

Serenbe is a 1,000 acre sustainable community based on the principals of wellness, the arts and agriculture. It’s distinctive hamlets are connected by country roads and well-worn footpaths, linking visitors and residents to shops, restaurants, cultural and recreational events as well as the natural environment.

Serenbe is home to three farm to table restaurants featuring produce from our 25- acre organic farm, a seasonal Farmer’s Market and thriving CSA Program.
Year round cultural events include the outdoor theatre group Serenbe Playhouse, music happenings, culinary festivals, films and lectures plus a robust Artist in Residence program featuring artist dinners and talks. Serenbe Trailriding, The Spa at Serenbe and cooking classes and workshops at the Bosch Experience Center round out the many experiences at Serenbe.

Located just south of Atlanta's Hartsfield-Jackson International Airport nestled within 45,000 acres of the city of Chattahoochee Hills, GA , Serenbe is a place where residents look forward to coming home and visitors make plans to return. Serenbe devotes 70% of its land to green space and this vast natural playground is where resident and visitors stroll, hike, bike, fish, ride horses or simply gaze on meadows or tree-filled woodlands. Living in harmony with nature is more than a catchphrase; in Serenbe, it's the way of life.

Serenbe is a place you can experience for a meal, a weekend or to call home for a lifetime.

Download our Serenbe app to:
- plan your visit to Serenbe
- stay updated on our latest events and happenings
- get GPS directions to all of Serenbe's restaurants and shops
- search all of our real estate opportunities
- get one touch calling to all of Serenbe's amenities
- enroll in our loyalty programs
- and much more!

results.descriptionHTML:
Join us in the fight against food waste!

Receive notifications when local stores and supermarkets post offers on food about to reach its expiration date.

Local cafés, stores, restaurants and supermarkets often have excess food at the end of the day, which you can prevent from going to waste by joining YourLocal and at the same time cashing in on great offers.

Follow your favorite stores in order to receive big discounts every time they post an offer near you.

- YourLocal is a great way to discover the local delicatessens and stores near you, taking an active part in reducing food waste and contributing to a sustainable community.

Are you a store owner?
You can easily sign up your business and instantly start posting offers, when you’ve created an account. If you have any questions regarding sign-up, there’s a direct chat function and a “Do you need help?” option under account settings.

YourLocal was founded with the help of volunteers in Copenhagen, Aarhus, Aalborg and Malmö, and will soon be expanding to other cities.

comments: Flot, meeeen... Efter jeres flotte nye look, har min app haft problemer med at lokalisere min placering. Er på en Nexus 6P, Android 7.1.1.

Okay, men... Ikke muligt at fjerne lyd notifikationer, hvilket normalt er standard funktionalitet i app's nu til dags. Det er hårdt irriterende, specielt når man sidder i et møde. Virker heller ikke som om der bliver gjort meget for at få flere forhandlere på.
44 MB... ... is a bit too much for an application like this.

Super idé MEN ærgeligt "nærmeste" tilbud er over 200km væk/primært Sjælland, når man bor i Jylland. Så pt ikke særlig anvendelig, synes jeg. Håber det ændre sig..ellers må appen nok vige pladsen igen.
Største problem er at tilbud ikke bliver dateret
Godt koncept men dårlig app.

results.descriptionHTML:
YourGOV is a simple Citizen Request Application that allows you to personally report non-emergency issues and service requests such as potholes, fallen trees, vandalism, street light outages, and more. Designed for use nationwide, YourGOV helps prompt quicker responses to requests and issues and keeps local governments mindful of the things that affect your life every day.

By connecting citizens and government together, YourGOV opens new lines of communication, providing the access and transparency that helps us build smarter, more sustainable, and more collaborative communities.

Quick and Easy

* Simply identify the location, fill in your details, and submit. Once submitted, YourGOV will automatically deliver your request to the appropriate participating organization.

Google Map

* Google Maps provides a familiar, user-friendly environment. Use your current location; search for a location; perform a Long Press to drop a pin; or simply hold and drag the pin to the issue's location when submitting a request.

Community Aware

* YourGOV automatically determines which local government should receive your request, giving you an active community role wherever you go. The request is automatically entered into the organization's Work and Asset Management System - Cartegraph. This also allows participating communities to specify which issues they can address, and which issues can be reported via your smartphone.


YourGOV — A Citizen Request Application that connects you to your government.

comments: City Hall recently recommended this app to citizens. So I thought I'd give it a go. The only issue I have so far is that it can't be set by your location. In other words the app doesn't recognize my location because lack of userness.(my phone location is on) So I have to put in my city and state within search. Otherwise you end up in Timbuktu!
Not working.  Can't sign in.  Even with my password reset I repeatedly get "problem signing in" error.  It used to work.  Now it doesn't.

Not working for me at all I have tried web, Android, and iPad versions and have had no success. I cannot register - Android app stops and the other two report an error (probably from the server). I cannot submit anonymously. Android and iPad apps claim they cannot determine location (although on Android the map resolves to the right place). On web there are no options in the Issue Type drop down and it appears without selecting one the submit button will not activate. Frustrated - as much as I am by the potholes I want to report.
My gov Need improvement, very slow and will not submit request
Love this app. Quick response from local government.
Service Request Reported a pothole, was handled in 1 day. Awesome service and quick response from Cobb County, kudos, Cheers

results.descriptionHTML:
My Green Space™ is a mobile app that helps you grow your own food with confidence.
Plan the garden of your dreams in minutes. My Green Space™ customizes your garden plan based on your city, sunlight exposure, size of space and season.
Daily reminders and easy tutorials keep you on track from seed to harvest. A built-in plant doctor helps you troubleshoot pests and diseases with ease. What are you waiting for… grow your own food… We can help.

Whether you want to grow a few herbs on your patio, set up a garden for your kids, or have veggies-on-tap at the office, you can do it with My Green Space™.
We believe that gardens grow people and community, while they benefit your health and the planet.

After years of experiencing the benefits of growing our own food, we are honoured to share this app with you to do the same.

Join the global growing community. Plan and manage one free box or enjoy unlimited premium features with a My Green Space™ subscription. Download our app and get started today!


Key Features:
- Customized Garden Plan: Tailored to your unique conditions.
- Visual Garden Map: Know where to plant what and how much room it needs.
- Automated Companion Planting: Our algorithm knows which plants belong together for enhanced growth, plant health and flavour.
- Maintenance Reminders: Our app intelligently sends you reminders of when to plant, water, thin, troubleshoot and successfully harvest your crops.
- Rapid Troubleshooting: Debug your plants in seconds; nip any pests and diseases in the bud.
- Exclusive Content: Weekly updates including the latest tips, tricks, and recipes from garden experts and foodies.

We believe every space deserves a garden.
Our vision is to have thriving, nutritious, fresh food gardens in every home, office and green space on earth. A more sustainable world is a couple of seeds away. Once you are empowered to grow your own food, the impact is everlasting.

comments: Limited Plant Options I built 3 successful beds last winter and added a hugelkulture bed this fall. I am looking for a garden planner that takes into consideration: plot orientation, sunlight and, season length. It would be nicw for a garden app to also include soil type, but in my case it is not necessary. This is not the app for me.
Lame Can't believe it started charging me after one bed design that was vague and limited. The database of plants needs more herbs and flowers with the vegetables.
Awesome! Excited to try this for my patio garden! I've been looking for something to keep me on track and help me with issues I'm having with some of my plants.
I downloaded this and started to add my garden beds.  This app said it was FREE, yet it wouldn't let me add a 2nd bed unless I paid for a monthly or yearly subscription.  Uninstalled it immediately.
app tried taxing me didnt help me grow bud
Great App What a unique and modern take on growing your own fresh produce! I am a new gardener and I rely very heavily on this app.

results.descriptionHTML:
The City of Columbus has released a free Mobile Application for iPhones allowing area residents enhanced access to city and community resources. The App puts City Services at the fingertips of residents and visitors, bringing to life many of Andrew J. Ginther mayoral initiatives to improve the quality of life of the Columbus residents.

The App uses many integrated technologies, such as GPS for location services, RSS for City News Feeds, and has an entire Social Media Center providing access to Twitter, Facebook, and YouTube information. The App encompasses four mayoral initiatives to help city residents: My Neighborhood, Get Active, Get Green, and 311. The My Neighborhood campaign allows residents to easily select and map government buildings, local entertainment and retail venues, as well as other useful Columbus sites. Users can access COTA bus schedules, view Capital Project information, learn about Neighborhood Pride areas and events, view Health Inspections of area restaurants, markets, pools, spas, and tattoo parlors as well as other various information. The Get Active initiative enables residents to access information about parks, community centers, golf courses, pools, sports facilities, schedules and standings, learn if your game is rained out, view an events calendar, park and trail guides, and read tips from prominent community members on healthy eating and exercise. The Get Green initiative encourages sustainable behavior with environmental facts and pointers in addition to information on what restaurants, business and non-profit organizations are GreenSpot members. The app also includes a 311 service center submission section where residents can submit and check on the status of service requests from their mobile devices. In addition, residents can enter their address in the settings to customize the app to send push notification about trash, recycling, and yard waste days. Additional push notifications are available for those who wish to receive News and Alert information.

This iPhone App is one piece of the foundation of a strategic mobile program for the City of Columbus. With smart phone use already at 50% for much of the US, the Columbus App was the obvious next-step in improving city-to-resident communication. The City of Columbus hopes to capitalize on this phenomenon and make public services more accessible and engaging to residents. Since its launch in 2011, the City of Columbus, Department of Technology has been received a CITE (Consumerization of IT in the Enterprise) Award for ‘Best Customer App’ for its accomplishments with the MyColumbus app.

ACCOLADES:
2014 CITE Award for Best Customer App “The MyColumbus app and their innovation in getting a design school involved is genius. I like that the hometown ecosystem was heavily leveraged. The app layout is intuitive and well thought out.”
2013 Computerworld Honors Laureate
2011 Finalist for the TechColumbus Innovation Award

comments: Buggy 311 request using map feature doesn't work.
Very useful app. This is really an impressive app.  Great for refuse pickup and recycling pickup schedule and updates.  The 311 services are outstanding, and really do get responses!  Thanks!!

Don't upgrade Upgraded yesterday, and now I keep getting an Error 1015. Can't set up alerts now. This app used to work well on my old iphone. Please Fix this!!! I have elderly neighbors that want to use this app to remind them to take out their  trash and recyclables but it's became very unreliable.
App sucks Can't load address anymore but even when you could, it would not show the correct trash/recycling days after a holiday. The alerts also have never worked for those days either. Garbage

Latest update broke the app After the latest update, the app no longer allows you to set your address (required for looking up your refuse collection day) or submit a 311 request. The only thing this version is good for is taking up 20mb of space.

Update does not work The update broke what used to be a usable app.  The previous version worked great!  Doesn't anyone follow up on all the complaints.  Oh yeah... the previous version worked great on tablets.

results.descriptionHTML:
DoneGood makes it easy for you to find businesses that share your values--and make a positive impact with every purchase!

If you want to buy local, shop organic, go green, stand with workers, back women-owned or minority-owned businesses and more, DoneGood is the place to quickly find businesses you can feel good about supporting.

- Discover great nearby businesses that share your values

- Customize search results to find businesses that have done good on the issues that matter most to you

- Get info on businesses’ social impact from trusted organizations and from others like you in the DoneGood community

- Rate businesses to help others find places that have done good

- Support businesses doing good in the world and create an incentive for more businesses to follow suit!

The DoneGood community now includes over 1,000 businesses in Greater Boston. We'll soon be adding businesses in other cities as well.

As the DoneGood community grows, we can support more businesses that have done good for people and the planet—and encourage more businesses to do the right thing.

Together, we can change the way the world does business.
