results.descriptionHTML:
Simulate 2 centuries of history, from the industrial revolution to the green revolution, in this fast-paced, challenging, apocalyptic, original and independant strategy game !

- Manage the world's mines of limitated energetical resources (coal, oil, gas, uranium)
- Teach countries how to build dams, windmills, and other renewable energy devices.
- Deal with the crisis and wars generated by the decreasing stocks of resources.
- Switch to green energies before earth is destroyed by pollution and hurricanes.
- Avoid hurricanes to make a rampage amongt your fragile green cities
- Plant trees to calm down pollution a moment
- Protect the key countries and try to exploit their resources wisely
- Deal with the grey empires that spread themselves like a plague in your 165 countries !

DISCLAIMERS :
Some subjects of this game seem to be quite polemic in some countries. Here are some disclaimers about them

1. This indie game does not try to express or convince you about any political point of view. It's main purpose is being a game and a time waister.

2. This indie game doesn't try to convince you about the reality of global warming if you don't believe in it. It's just a videogame using mechanics in a strategy game for you to enjoy as it is. If you want to play it but are bothered about that, you could consider the global warming part of the game (= fossile combustion rises temperature) represents 5% of its overall mechanics (amongst other things like the mechanics of the limitated fossile resources consumption, pollution, economic race, offshore banks, crises, wars, peace ... which don't make much controversy) . If you still are bothered about that, then I can't do anything more about it and I'm sorry if this game doesn't fit your thoughts and beliefs.

3. Scientists have not proved (yet?) that the rise of temperature has something to do with a rise of hurricanes power but I just believe it's a fine idea of gameplay and a good metaphor of the dangers of the rise of temperature. Again, this an old-school videogame, not an essay.

4. The position of mines, climate conditions, proportions of rivers, economic rankings etc. tend to reflect reality but are not the "real reality" ... for sure. If you think there's a problem with a country, please tell me so ! I'll cross check your facts and I'll change its stats in the game if possible.

5. About borders. The map has been made in 2014 from a 2000's source. You may feel borders are not accurate. I'm sorry if it hurts you but this game isn't about borders and can't resolve the conflicts there were about them in the last century.

6. The borders are not the 1850's ones and it may seems a odd because it is said that the game starts in 1850. It's like this because the world was, at the time, very different from now, with lots of differents names, small kingdoms, Empires and colonies and much more problem with borders than now ... It would have been quite difficult to add a way to deal with that across time in a game that try to focus on the story of the burning energies' process. Also, the game needs you to recognize quickly the countries' names of the world so these are some reasons why it has been chosen to keep the beginning of the XXI century's world's (midly accurate) borders.

7. Nuclear power. The game may please and displease both anti-s and pro-s nuclear : when there is a growth, Nuclear is perfectly safe (with no words about radwaste and hurricane-proof !) but when there's a crisis, when countries have no more money, nuclear plants may explode, just like Tchernobyl, meaning with an economic impact. Again, this is a sci-fi game and the developer is not a lobbyist.

***

I hope you'll have a nice time playing that not-so serious game and saving planet earth from auto-destruction, numerous times!
results.title: Energy wars
results.summary: Fast paced indie strategy game about ecology, energies, wars and peace
recentChanges: - choose your langage in the option button on the title screen (bewteen : english, french, italian, german)
- better italian version part 2 / 2 (there still can be some mistakes, please, tell me so)

comments: Good concept but some levels are too hard and it lacks variety.
Hard to follow what they are talking about in the game

This game is brilliant and super fun, I'd love to see it expanded on and fine tuned.  After hours of gameplay, I noticed I had come away with a pretty visceral sense of the way nations are desperately vying for economic security, and of the dangers of increasing the average global temperature; even though they are only hinted at in the game, a small gauge ominously clocks the increase as you play. I'm grateful for having this new sense, brilliant.  Don't forget to donate the price of coffee if you enjoyed it 👍

I love how this game forces to make you think about economy against the consequences of the environment. However I feel it is very limiting on economic growth, due to the fact not all income is by product sales of CO² inducing materials. I feel like it is very jarring as a small country with no materials to consume and sell.  The game's mechanics are simple yet a fun time waster. However I feel like that economic growth in this game should a more political degree other than causing wars. Since economy requires trade, it should be a mechanic to help the player and to cut off others from income. It is very weird for the entire world to have an economic grade agrement witheach other.

I think the games is very fun. A few things keepe from giving it a 5 star though: the game goes by very quickly, only time i have ever seen the year 2000 was when i played with unlimited money. The fact that uranium is used so fast is kinda weird as it is gone before i can even realize it was used lol. Other then that its very fun!!!

In all honesty this barely a "green focused" game. The early and mid game are how much can you increase productivity in order to get past the $50M threshold required to start having green cities. The end game is wiping out all the more wealthier countries to put yours at the top. So ya, ignoring life is how you win.  Edit: It's a great time waster, I'm just pointing out that your path to saving the environment is to utterly destroy it, which I find amusing.

milestones.description: By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds, in particular from land-based activities, including marine debris and nutrient pollution

By 2020, sustainably manage and protect marine and coastal ecosystems to avoid significant adverse impacts, including by strengthening their resilience, and take action for their restoration in order to achieve healthy and productive oceans
Minimize and address the impacts of ocean acidification, including through enhanced scientific cooperation at all levels

By 2020, effectively regulate harvesting and end overfishing, illegal, unreported and unregulated fishing and destructive fishing practices and implement science-based management plans, in order to restore fish stocks in the shortest time feasible, at least to levels that can produce maximum sustainable yield as determined by their biological characteristics
By 2020, conserve at least 10 per cent of coastal and marine areas, consistent with national and international law and based on the best available scientific information

By 2020, prohibit certain forms of fisheries subsidies which contribute to overcapacity and overfishing, eliminate subsidies that contribute to illegal, unreported and unregulated fishing and refrain from introducing new such subsidies, recognizing that appropriate and effective special and differential treatment for developing and least developed countries should be an integral part of the World Trade Organization fisheries subsidies negotiation

By 2030, increase the economic benefits to Small Island developing States and least developed countries from the sustainable use of marine resources, including through sustainable management of fisheries, aquaculture and tourism

Increase scientific knowledge, develop research capacity and transfer marine technology, taking into account the Intergovernmental Oceanographic Commission Criteria and Guidelines on the Transfer of Marine Technology, in order to improve ocean health and to enhance the contribution of marine biodiversity to the development of developing countries, in particular small island developing States and least developed countries
Provide access for small-scale artisanal fishers to marine resources and markets

Enhance the conservation and sustainable use of oceans and their resources by implementing international law as reflected in UNCLOS, which provides the legal framework for the conservation and sustainable use of oceans and their resources, as recalled in paragraph 158 of The Future We Want

results.descriptionHTML:
Survive the harsh life of being stuck on a raft in the middle of the ocean! You’re are no longer stranded on a lonely island, yet worse you’re lost in the middle of the ocean! No civilization! Only cold salt water and wild, hungry sea creatures!

Gather debris from the water to craft necessary equipment. Build axe, hammer, rope and other stuff to create new walls, pillars, shelters. Expand your raft and create a more comfortable living for yourself. Maintain your health by cooking food and filtering sea water. Be wary of the dangers of the ocean! Especially the shark coming to destroy the raft and munch on you! The game has an advanced crafting system and will be interesting to people who love crafting, building as well as survival games!

FREE Game Features:
— Gathering - Collect all necessary items from the ocean: tools, crafting materials, food and more!
— Crafting and Building - Advanced crafting system: Items, Buildings, flooring, pillars, rafting stairs, tools, —weapons and more!
— Cooking - Cook your food and filter the salt water!
— Fishing – Try to catch fish and other sea animals to not die out of hunger!
— Farming - Grow vegetables and palm trees!
— Survival – Keep yourself alive at all costs!
— Wilderness survival simulator 3D - Avoid or fight the mighty sea creatures such as the fearless shark!
— A lot of activities to do – crafting, collecting materials, building, fishing, farming, cooking, fighting sharks!
— Real adventure – amazing gameplay and lots of fun guaranteed!
— Cool graphics and easy navigation - an easy and memorable game to play!

Beautiful ocean, wind, waves, what else is needed? Your only goal? - to survive! So throw your hook and begin the adventure now!
results.title: Raft Survival Simulator
results.summary: Raft Survial Simulator is all about Building, Surviving and Crafting!

comments: I liked the game! But it cause a little problem i don't know if my Android Phone is the one who has problem or the game. When i trying to use any item that make's light like water purifier, cooker or a torch it crashed the game! Pls fix just in case!

Its like minecraft, but its coo its actually pretty dope. But i saw in the distance a line of items just sitting there, so i wasted like alot of planks to find out it was a glitch, you couldnt pick up the items. Smh but its coo and add some more items and things to do. Im kinda bored

Super easy to learn, the debris doesn't move as fast as everyone is complaining about. Repelling sharks is easy. Takes less than a day to beat. But the images shown for the game are maps you have to pay to get. Otherwise, you just endlessly build a raft. Buggy, glitchy, and laggy every now and then. Gets rather boring. The ads are often, borderline annoying, but not too bad.

The ads that pop up are super annoying and the controls were at first too. I paid to get rid of the ads.  The game itself was fun at first, I love crafting stuff. But I have built everything you can build now im kind of at a standstill. This game needs to be expanded so there is more to build! Pretty decent game, just needs more to it.

It's a good game and has an abundance amount of potential, I've managed to build a few of everything. just wish was more things to craft or for future possibilities it could eventually end up on an island or travel elsewere and get a new set of craftables? N so on, For now maybe increase running speed? It's a touch slow for me as my raft is as long as the range of the items that spawn etc it takes a lil time to get from one end to another in case of shark attack.
Great game so far really addicting. One thing to note i hope the material gets rebalancing soon since the increase or im afraid the player counts gonna drastically decrease

results.descriptionHTML:
Tired of a usual island survival simulators? Dive into the wilderness exploring sea world & fight for your life at the bottom of the ocean!
Survive after Great Flood! Feel yourself like a lonely aqualunger, lost in the deep vast of the sea at the underwater base! Explore the sea bottom, quarry resources, “hunt” fishes and cephalopods, search for fresh water and don’t forget about your level of oxygen – if it drops to zero, you’d die soon! Unravel all secrets of the sea bottom, find treasures or hidden weapons and, maybe, the method to leave this place and get home! Be a real survivor with our Underwater Survival Simulator!
Live the life of aqualunger and keep your weapons alert!
Fight for your life with underwater predators – they never sleep and would chase yours until death, it's or yours. Find weapons to protect yourself – or craft new one from materials, found over the bottom. Build shelters to prevent attacks of sharks and do your best to survive at all costs with Underwater Survival Simulator!
Hunt for predators, build shelter & craft tools – feel like a lonely diver with this underwater survival simulator in 3D!
Watch for your character indicators - health, energy, fullness. If one of these drops – no chance to survive! Especially mind your oxygen level – if it drops to zero, you’d never dive again! Do all that you can – there is a lot of things you can do here, on the ocean bottom. Earn experience and raise up your skills! Craft weapons and special tools – it would help you to stay alive! Collect different materials – it can be very useful!
Stay alive at all costs! Spending time at the bottom of the ocean is not easy as on the survival island!
Control your character using the joystick, hunt sea creatures, craft tools and weapons or build shelters, which would help you to survive! But remember, the ocean is full of predators ready to attack you, so keep your weapon alert! Use all your exploration, battling and survival skills to stay alive at all cost with Underwater Survival Simulator!
Underwater Survival Simulator features:
  • Huge vast of picturesque ocean’s bottom to explore
  • Different indicators of character’s status – health, energy, fullness and oxygen
  • Find hidden treasures to ease the survival process
  • Craft weapons and tools – it can save your life someday
  • Unusual survival experience

Be ready for really unusual survival simulator in 3D!
Spend your time at the grim and empty ocean bottom, battle against hungry predators and do your best to stay alive at this harsh place with Underwater Survival Simulator!

comments: Good concept, very interesting. The whole thing is really good, but it runs too slowly on a 4core, 1GB RAM tablet, where many 3D games run fine, even with bloom.  Please add graphics details options and try to optimize the game, make it faster.  Also, the pink stones or whatever they are look really silly and ruin the immersion effect.  Stone must look like stone, though may look somewhat more special so that I know that I can 'pick it up'.  Also, I did not find any other material than 'fiber', no stone or metal.  On the map my heading must be shown - the direction that I'm facing/going.  A compass is needed on the HUD, and better yet, make a translucent map on the HUD, small or full screen when needed.  Until then, I can't say any more, will be looking at this in the future. Thanks.

Fantasic game Love this game dont get why it hasn't got a higher rating id like to see some stuff added but the game is very nice one hint watch free adds for credits before you leave the base then you can craft a wepon to defend yourself sharks in water lol id like to see more fish and more things to do and maby be a little easier to level up and alot more options for building stuff other than that grate game love it

Love hate I don't know what everybody is talking about it doesn't take but one minute to download the graphics are great and what do you mean not like the real subnautica this game is it's on the game and not based off of subnautica unless you can find and actually show me some evidence I don't believe any of you

It's a great underwater survival game idea. Good graphics and all. Just minor bugs that need fixed. Such as moving around. Plus I understand the fact that it's a free game. But you really don't need to put in ads every two minutes.
Coin earning Doesn't pay out. Ive watched an ad twice now with not a single coin being given to me for it. Thats a huge rip off. I think the games cool. But that one thing just ruins it.

Don't download Add interrupted first 30 seconds of game play. Had just started playing and the screen was diverted to an add. I am not interested in a game that interrupts play to show an add. Uninstalled immediately.

results.descriptionHTML:
Submerge your device with this elegant live wallpaper. Calm and relaxing underwater ambience.

Free, without any advertisements.

Features full 3D high definition photo realistic animation with Open GL ES 2.0.

You can choose between two elegant water themes, set up the "godrays" intensity and choose optimal frame rate for your device. With the latest version you can also change the caustics pattern drawn by sunlight onto seabed and also appearance of waves on surface.

Hope you will enjoy it.
_____

How to use it: press "Home" > long press on background > choose "Live Wallpapers" > select "Under the Sea Live Wallpaper" from list.

This is a live wallpaper and not an application, so you will not see it as an icon installed under applications. It is only available in "Live Wallpapers" menu.

comments: I tried Loads of live wallpapers and static images before settling on this one.  Most wallpapers are too busy/intricate and make it difficult to see icons and their labels.  I use this wallpaper on my Ugoos UT3S Android device connected to an LED TV.  It scales beautifully on the TV screen.  The subtle animation LOOKS GREAT.   If only there were sharks with frickin’ lasers that would randomly swim by…. Just kidding.  It is great AS IS.   Thank you.

Awesome Awesome light on RAM live wallpaper. By the way, people are so silly that they don't know how to open a live wallpaper and are giving low ratings. I would like to advise such people to long press on their home screen, select wallpaper and then live wallpapers. JUST PLEASE DON'T PROVIDE AN APP A RATING THAT IT DOESN'T DESERVE.

This is one sweet wallpaper. I haven't had it installed long enough to know what it does to battery levels, but it's certainly beautiful.   I'd like to see two things: 1. Higher lateral parallax further back in the 3D scene when swiping between screens. 2. Maybe red, green, yellow and purple color alternatives.

The absolute best I had this on my galaxy s4 mini and it was perfect. Calming, pretty, doesnt clash with app icons,and you can set it to your own wave preferences! Now that I've finally upgraded to the s7 this was the first app I re-downloaded! Looks even better on my new phone! As a stressed out, ocean obsessed marine bio student this is the perfect live wallpaper for me.

Amazing and breathtaking on 1080p TV Got this on my TV using MK908V, looks incredible. Please please add an option with some realistic fish! And to all the idiots who say they can't open it, do a google search on how to apply a live wallpaper!!!! Not fair on the dev to give a 1 star rating just because you don't know how to apply it!!!

Congrats Designers!!!! ♥★ You (the designer of the app) is the TOP #1 best seller in my opinion! Just so you know, I am really Burrock Obama.  I disguised my name as, "Emily Moore." I know this feels wierd for me but if you would like to chat please call me by my last name, Obama. If you want to chat with me please chat with me on Facebook.     Thank You, Burrock Obama ★

results.description: ✭Under the Sea Live Wallpaper✭ offers you the best background images for your mobile. This awesome app is for everyone who likes the sea and sea waves! If you have ever wanted to have your own sea life aquarium, you can have it on your screen! This amazing new app offers you free screen savers and wonderful mobile wallpapers of sea life in deep blue water. Dive into a deep sea with these free live wallpapers. Travel the world and seven seas with these free wallpapers. Wonderful sea images will make you happy. Cool backgrounds are a click away from you. Download “Under the Sea Live Wallpaper” and decorate your screen with colorful fishes. Beautiful wallpapers and fantastic screen savers are waiting for you! - Amazing 3D live wallpaper for your phone!- Animated sea pictures decorating your screen;- Full support for landscape mode and home - screen switching! - Amazing HD graphics;- Social share button and more- This beautiful, free and enjoyable background is waiting for you!Follow the installation instructions: Home - > Menu - > Wallpapers - > Live Wallpapers- Motion of flashes and lights keeps changing with time.- You can choose from several different background themes.- Optimized Battery Usage- Compatible with 99% mobile phone devices.- The wallpaper app will sleep when your phone is inactive, so this live wallpaper will not drain your battery.- Sea Live Background fully supports horizontal orientation and looks amazing on both mobile phones and tablet devices.Dive into the blue sea water and meet amazing marine ecosystem. Sea world contains a lot of marine species and sea plants. There is nothing more fun than diving into the deep sea and meeting face to face with the most unusual sea animals. Most of the plants and animals in the sea live in its uppermost layer, where sunlight reaches, but there are awesome sea creatures that are part of a seabed. With this awesome underwater wallpaper see lovely dolphins, a scary shark and a killer whale. Beautiful sea fish, stunning sea shell, fabulous starfish and many more sea creatures that live underwater can be your sea wallpapers or screen savers. Explore sea world with your favorite sea background. With these “sea pictures” you will have the best wallpapers for your Android™ phone. Use the best “live wallpaper” and favorite sea picture to decorate your screen. With these fantastic sea pictures you can dive into the blue Caribbean Sea, Mediterranean Sea, Bering Sea, Adriatic Sea, Baltic Sea, Aegean Sea, Arabian Sea or Red Sea. The Red Sea in the Indian Ocean has the saltiest water, it is also known as the Dead Sea as its water is so salty that nothing can remain alive in it. Explore life “under the sea” with these wonderful background images. Amazing sea photos offers you the best 3D wallpaper for your phone screen. Get ✭Under the Sea Live Wallpaper✭, the best background image for your new Samsung Galaxy. Best wallpapers and free screen savers are a click away from you.These backgrounds are so realistic that you will experience the deepest ocean and most amazing ocean creatures. You will have your own marine aquarium. The most wonderful images of sea fishes, starfishes, seahorses, sea shells, sea snakes, sea turtles and other sea animals offer you the best sea view on your phone screen. This best new app offers you fabulous animated backgrounds of colorful and exotic sea creatures living among wonderful coral reefs. Do not miss this fabulous opportunity to beautify your Samsung Galaxy mobile phone with “sea wallpaper” for free! Get these HD Wallpapers, inspired by sea world completely free of charge. This is the chance to meet sea life, wait no more, download ✭ Under the Sea Live Wallpaper✭ and enjoy great sea paradise pictures on your screen. *Android™ is a trademark of Google Inc.*This app is not affiliated with or endorsed by Samsung.
comments: Waste of time. The fish don't move. This was actually someone's job to design this P.O.S.
Under the sea wall paper Fish do not move.   This WP sucks
Loads of ads whilst you're trying to set it up. Good otherwise.
Beautiful! I love its beauty... Its also relaxing anytime.
Fantastic,,relaxing,,best for destressing a truly enjoyable app.
Coral reef The clear water and bubbles are soothing but i thought that the coral reefs would b swaying in the water

results.descriptionHTML:
Watch Koi happily explore their pond! Colorful fish and beautiful backgrounds make Koi Live Wallpaper better than the real thing!

Everything is 3D rendered in OpenGL 2.0, with fully interactive water that supports multitouch. Both tablets and phones are fully supported in both portrait and landscape modes!

Double-tap to feed your fish!

If you enjoy this, please support us by getting the full version! It has access to the settings screen, with controls for your fish population, background image (custom ones, too!), raindrops, plants, and more!

TO USE: home->menu->wallpapers
results.title: Koi Free Live Wallpaper
results.summary: Koi Live Wallpaper: Colorful fish and interactive water!
results.description: Watch Koi happily explore their pond!  Colorful fish and beautiful backgrounds make Koi Live Wallpaper better than the real thing!Everything is 3D rendered in OpenGL 2.0, with fully interactive water that supports multitouch.  Both tablets and phones are fully supported in both portrait and landscape modes!Double-tap to feed your fish!If you enjoy this, please support us by getting the full version!  It has access to the settings screen, with controls for your fish population, background image (custom ones, too!), raindrops, plants, and more!TO USE: home->menu->wallpapers
comments: Beautifully developed I originally installed the free version of this app,  but didn't actually apply it as my screen saver for months. After my new Koi fish phone case arrived I decided it was the perfect wallpaper to match my case.  I fell in love with watching the different fish swim across my screen and feeding them. I don't normally buy apps, but for this wallpaper I've decided to make an exception. This will be the first app I have ever purchased and I feel every penny is worth it. Developers keep these wallpapers coming.

Very nice Really nice view on my Samsung Tab Pro .  When running it responses to a screen touch with ripples in the water and the fish movement responds too.  On my tablet I start it as an app when ever I want.  The other apps I download want to be setup as wallpaper, I am concerned that would slow down everything else.  Don't know if that is a valid concern.

BEST & MOST BEAUTIFUL Live Wallpaper ever! I had the free version on my Samsung Infuse many years ago, and loved it; there's nothing that conpares, as far as live wallpapers go.  I later tried to install it on my Samsung Galaxy Note 2, without success. I just found the free version again yesterday and installed it on my Galaxy Note 4, it's absolutely gorgeous! The full/paid version allows for great customization! Thanks for this beautiful wallpaper!

Old but brilliant Live Wallpaper The Koi Fish Live Wallpaper is an awesome live wallpaper. Unlike many other free live wallpapers out there this one goes quite easy on the battery, so you don't have to worry about  sacrificing battery life for great visuals. The only negative thing I can say about the free version is that the amount of fish, background etc. Can't be customized at all, but it would be nit picking as it's a free version. Two thumbs up. Test Device: LG Nexus 5

Definitely worth the upgrade Just over a dollar for all these amazing fish and backgrounds and so many options! I recommend even if you can't get the upgrade though you really should. 10 out of 10 fish flakes. People, its a dollar! If you want to customize it, spend a buck! They need money to make things like this!

Love this, but I tried to buy the full version, and VERY WORRINGLY, I had to enter my card details 4 times.  You now have my personal details, but I cant complete the purchase, it keeps asking me for my google password, which I have forgotten, and the questions they are asking are too intense!  Tried 4 times to purchase the full app, so am now rushing to my bank account to see if I've been charged 4 times,  Not happy at all.

results.descriptionHTML:
The world's most popular marine & lakes app! A favorite among cruisers, sailors, fishermen and divers. Find the same detailed charts as on the best GPS plotters. This app includes the overwhelming value of Navionics+. Alternatively, you may have found a free version on the store offering basic features, where Navionics+ can be purchased In-App. If you have a tablet, please search our HD app.

NAVIONICS+ includes:
√ Download of the following chart layers that will reside on your device even after expiration:
- NAUTICAL CHART for all essential cartographic reference detail. The most accurate and thorough set of information based on Hydrographic Office data, Notices to Mariners, new publications, our own surveys, and reports from users. It provides port plans, safety depth contours, marine services info, tides & currents, navigation aids and more.
- SONARCHART™: the award-winning 1 ft/ 0,5 m HD bathymetry map that reflects ever-changing conditions. Be part of the community and contribute by uploading your sonar logs to enhance it.
- COMMUNITY EDITS made by users (rocks, wrecks, etc.) and shared for all to benefit.
√ CHART UPDATES: we deliver more than 2,000 updates every day! Take advantage of our updates as frequently as you like.
√ ADVANCED MAP OPTIONS to highlight Shallow Areas and filter Depth Contours. Includes a Fishing Mode that enables Fishing Range for targeting key fishing areas.
√ NAVIGATION MODULE for advanced route planning with ETA, distance to arrival, heading to WP, fuel consumption and more!
√ DOCK-TO-DOCK AUTOROUTING quickly creates detailed routes even through narrow waterways and channels, based on chart data and navigation aids. POIs are automatically shown nearby your destination.
√ WEATHER & TIDES provides real-time weather data and forecasts. Access daily and hourly forecasts for your favorite locations and get wind, weather buoys, Tides & Currents overlaid on your map. Buoy data is retrieved from NOAA and can include wind speed, gust and direction as well as air pressure, water temperature, wave height and other relevant marine data.

Note: Download detailed maps by zooming in or from Menu>Download Map. Check navionics.com for coverage.
Navionics+ is a one year subscription. At expiration you can renew with a discount of up to 50%. If you don’t renew, you can still use the charts you previously downloaded, along with several free features:

TRACK your journey, view speed, distance, time and COG.
ROUTES: create and edit, based on speed and fuel consumption
Measure DISTANCE, add MARKERS, get WIND FORECASTS and sun/moon cycles
MAP OPTIONS: Satellite/Terrain, adjust shorelines to selected Water Level, choose Depth Shading and Easy View to begin
(not on Govt. Charts)
SYNC Tracks, Routes & Markers among your mobile devices
MAGAZINES & GUIDES for location-based articles from leading industry publishers
GOVT. CHART in US
SONARCHART™ LIVE - allows you to create new personal 1ft/0.5 m HD bathymetry maps that display in real time while navigating. Upload your sonar logs to build even better local charts for your area connecting wirelessly to a compatible sounder/plotter.
PLOTTER SYNC - Compatible Wi-Fi enabled plotter owners can transfer routes and markers, activate and update their eligible plotter card and upload sonar logs for improved SonarChart™! Learn more at www.navionics.com/en/plotter-sync
COVERAGE- Does not include Bermuda, which can be found on Boating Caribbean & South America. Visit navionics.com for the lake list.

Navionics has certified several Android models where the app is designed to load and operate correctly with an OS of 4.0 or higher. Please refer to our Compatibility Guide, which is continuously updated at http://www.navionics.com/en/compatibility/mobile. We cannot guarantee flawless operation or provide support for non-certified devices. ALL SALES ARE FINAL on Google Play.

Why is the GPS messed up I go to a hump for 20ft and I drill whole through ice and it's 39 ft it worked fine last year and the year before now it don't work fix plz
Lake maps in MN are so inaccurate from lake to lake that it's almost worthless to use.
Needs to be easier to use, start up

Waste of money I downloaded and first couple times it worked great. Now it says I'm heading in a complete opposite direction, it freezes, not accurate and half the time it does not work and was a waste of money. I Would really like my money back. I would caution anyone on buying this app!

You get for what you pay for?? 😥 I have some issues with uploads at times using this app offline, with a lot of inaccuracies with water depth. I would hope that this app that was bought was going to be better than the trial, I was wrong. Ice fishing or on a boat this app isn't very helpful with the water depth. With the most disappointment of water depth to me. I also dont get a good loadup of offline use on navonics maps when I'm offline. I know navonics don't claim to be accurate spot on but it's not even worth the bang for the buck.

results.descriptionHTML:
Get the GAME OF THE YEAR award-winning puzzler!

Help Swampy by guiding water to his broken shower. Each level is a challenging physics-based puzzle with amazing life-like mechanics. Cut through dirt to guide fresh water, dirty water, toxic water, steam, and ooze through increasingly challenging scenarios! Every drop counts!
• Original Stories & Characters – Play through 4 unique stories featuring Swampy, Allie, Cranky and Mystery Duck. That’s over 500 amazing puzzles!
• Innovative Mechanic – See water in various forms and use your creativity to solve the puzzles – totally stimulating!
• Collectibles, Challenges, and Bonus Levels – Collect special items uniquely designed for each character and complete cool challenges to unlock bonus levels! “Tri-Duck” each level for ultimate bragging rights!

SWAMPY’S STORY
Swampy the Alligator lives in the sewers under the city. He’s a little different from the other alligators – he’s curious, friendly, and loves taking a nice long shower after a hard day at work. But there’s trouble with the pipes and Swampy needs your help getting water to his shower!

ALLIE’S STORY
Allie is the sewer's most creative alligator. Her quirky spirit and artistic talents made her a star. Now, the gators have crafted a one-of-a-kind steam-powered musical instrument, and can't wait to hear her play it! Help Allie get the steam she needs and enjoy her take on classic Disney tunes.

CRANKY’S STORY
Cranky, a real gator’s gator, has a big appetite and will eat anything, from tires to old fish bones. But he refuses to eat his greens! Use the dirty purple water to clear the algae on Cranky’s plate so he can gobble up his “food”.

MYSTERY DUCK
Catch this fancy teleporting Mystery Duck in this special chapter and hint hint - timing is everything! Find all kinds of surprises including the biggest duck ever, MegaDuck and cute little Ducklings!

Some stories may require a small additional price but try the FREE levels today!
Visit www.facebook.com/WheresMyWater for more hints, tips and secrets. Follow Swampy @SwampyTheGator on Twitter.

Before you download this experience, please consider that this app contains social media links to connect with others, in-app purchases that cost real money, as well as advertising for The Walt Disney Family of Companies and some third parties. In App Purchases from $0.99-$4.99

Terms of Use: http://disneytermsofuse.com/

Visit the official Where's My Water? website – http://games.disney.com/wheres-my-water-app

For additional information about our practices in the United States and Latin America regarding children’s personal information, please read our Children’s Privacy Policy at https://disneyprivacycenter.com/kids-privacy-policy/english/.

comments: So fun so good so perfect Started with Where is my water 2 free game. The idea was exellent but attrocely bloated with ads, crashed all the times etc...This one is exellent. Better actually than the no 2. Addictive, clever, fun. I play it, my 5 years old loves it..one of a few games made for all members of the family. Bought the full version and cant see the end of the game. So many levels. As said this game is one of the best i have seen in Years!!!.

This game has provided me with countless hours of fun.  It's unique, the artwork and animation are very well done, the physics are very accurate.  I could go on and on.  I purchased the game years ago on my Galaxy S3.  I later got an S4 and now have an S5, and I downloaded it to each phone and finished the game 100% each time.  It's a great game, very fun and challenging at times as well.  You can get stuck on a level for quite a while sometimes.  Definitely worth getting!  Also, here's a helpful tip: pay attention to the names of the levels.  They're often a hint on how to beat them!

Genuinely fun. I heard about this game when it came out, I looked it up and I really didn't think too much about it. So, I never downloaded it myself. Then my son decided he wanted to get it and he's too young to play it by himself so he kept asking me for help on the hard levels. Instantly I was hooked. Is is a cute puzzle game that is genuinely fun to play. I didn't think twice about spending the two bucks on it. I'm hooked and am glad that my son was adventurous enough to discover it.  10/10

It's fun! It need some thinking.. It's pretty challenging but still quite easy to solve.. It had some extra level which is unlockable via collectibles that can be found in game.. It also had.. Err.. Microtransaction that I assume for people who can't wait to unlock the level, it also kinda let you try the different variation of the game mode like "Allie","Cranky", and "Mystery Duck" which is can be fully  unlocked by purcashing it.

Good game Started off I seen my kid playing the game on my phone, I decided to help her on a level that she asked to help her beat. I then got hooked and helps pass the time when your stuck at  a boring place like dmv or work hahhaha

where's my update? I purchased the game a few months ago. I absolutely love it! I even got Cranky's Story. However, when I try to update it, I couldn't find it in Google Play. It said it's incompatible with my HTC Desire S. I think it's unfair. I paid for it and I can't get an update? Please fix it.

Swampy is what seems to be a not novice players i invited my self to play it free gameplay good graphics lol he is swampy the alligator boy stuck waiting for a shower to run. There are 4 to 5 missions in each chapter and the are really less chapters .In other words you'd finish this game in a day and if you want to play more you have to pay for it. Really this game could have been so much more if they have some kind of in game currency and earned money through advertisements like Crissy road.
This app is stupid Theres only 15 levels,seriously?15 levels only.Do not play this game.Disney is EVIL.They NEVER EVER make free games!!I would give give it a 0 stars.PLZ DO NOT PLAY IT

Makes you want to buy it There aren't that many levels on the free version, but this is a great quality game.  I bought the full version for my son, and it has become something we can do together for fun.  Great planning and problem solving.

results.descriptionHTML:
Take a look at this brand new Starfish Live Wallpaper that allows you to take a peek at the amazing colorful “underwater world”, showing you the wonderful “starfish images”” This lovely sea animal presented by our awesome free “Starfish HD wallpaper” for smartphone or tablet can now rest on the palm of your hand in all its beauty and mystery! If you miss the “sunny beach” and walking on warm white sand, our fantastic free Starfish wallpaper for Android™will remind you of the happy times and reveal all the secrets of your favorite sea souvenir-the “sea star”! Get yourself a superb collection of starfish and discover everything about these amazing “sea creatures”! Download our adorable free “Starfish pictures” now!

Main features:

▫ Beautifully animated “sea star live wallpaper” for you!
▫ Choose a “ocean wallpaper” for your phone or tablet–more starfish HD backgrounds are added daily!
▫ Amazing “sea wallpaper” of these fascinating animals for the screen of your smartphone or tablet!
▫ These awesome “underwater world wallpapers” are very easy on the battery – they sleep when the device is inactive!
▫ Enjoy this new, free “sea animals wallpaper” – get it now!

Follow the installation instructions:
Home -> Menu -> Wallpapers -> Live Wallpapers

▫ HD graphics and open GL.
▫ Optimized Battery Usage.
▫ Compatible with 99% mobile phone devices.
▫ These “animal wallpapers” fully support horizontal orientation and look amazing on tablet devices as well as on mobile phones.

Fall in love with this gorgeous creature living under the sea, and our awe inspiring “Starfish live wallpaper” will inspire you to admire these animals even more! Although it's called the starfish, it's not actually a fish, and it's a cousin of the “sea cucumber”. Its upper surface is covered with spikes as a protection from predators, and the underside is soft and wiggly due to their tube feet. If you get these beautiful “Starfish wallpapers” now, you'll find out that there are 2 000 species of sea stars, and that not all the “star fish” have 5 arms. The sun star, for instance, has 40! These iconic marine animals presented by our cool free Starfish android wallpaper your your mobile phone have an incredible power of regeneration. If a starfish loses an arm, the new one will grow up! They are so amazing that some species grow an entirely new starfish from one arm!

Download these gorgeous “Starfish live wallpapers” and feel the magic of the sea star at your finger tips! Did you know that their beautiful bodies are full of weird surprises? They lack a brain, but they have eyes on their feet. They have no blood, but they can digest outside their body! These gentle looking ocean animals on Starfish free wallpapers on your screen obviously seem to defy the laws of animal biology! These dreamy new “Starfish HD wallpapers” for your smartphone or tablet will melt everybody's heart, and who would say that these delicate animals are exceptional predators! The scientific research of the sea star body remains one of the most interesting subjects on this planet. results.descriptionHTML:
Enjoy epic fishing challenge and explore the underwater sea life at paradise island. Play Spear Fishing Scuba Deep Dive, the amusing water hunter game for spearfishing lovers. Become a scuba diver and shoot harpoon with speargun to catch wild shark in underwater fishing game.


Dive deep into Blue Ocean and play as underwater hunter. Ocean life is full of amusing inhabitants like white shark, clownfish and starfish. Ace Scuba divers and fish hunter are out on sea adventure. Beware of wild shark attacks while fishing in Paradise Island. Grab your sniper rifle and go around for catching whale & goldfish. Put on the scuba diving suite and take your fishing gear from fisherman. Sail boat and make bait for angry sharks. Fisherman chase lionfish and starfish while sailing in fishing boat. Fire harpoon from your spear gun before the killer shark kill you with its razor sharp jaws. Become ace shooter enjoying angling with your rifle in lake with seamless cozy water. Find redemption killing sharks with guns.

Get ready for the most exciting fish hunt game in 3D. Experience fishing with harpoon as well as with bow arrow and forget the ordinary angling. In Spear Fishing Scuba Deep Dive; take a break from being ordinary anglers. Here you are an ace diver & swimmer breaking into the fishing world. Catch fish underwater with spear gun without angling rod. There is nothing more thrilling than hunting fish with a rifle. To hunt dolphins peeking above water use bow arrow. Throw spear like an expert fisherman for harpooning. Dive deep in Blue Ocean and swim around to explore big fish live aquarium with eels and squids. Feeling fishy get rid of angling rod and tension gauge jump in freshwater swim towards fish horde reduce distance. Take aim striking pin avoid damage fish and catches hooked fish with spear.

Spear Fishing 2016 Features:


10 amazingly challenging hunting and shooting missions
Sail fishing boat and scuba dive into Blue Ocean for spearfishing
Explore the realistic sea life with dolphins, whales and Sharks
High quality 3D graphics and underwater environment


Get rid of ridiculous fishing ways with hook and bait, who love waiting for fishing hook all day long. Download Spear Fishing Scuba Deep game in android phone and tablets for thrilling adventure more than bird hunting and animal hunter.

results.descriptionHTML:
The world’s coolest new matching 3 adventure, Water Splash!
Match the colorful water balloons and feel cool streams!
Adorable otter Oris really loves water!
One day, evil crocodile Mr. Croker invaded the Animal’s cities and stole town’s water!
Match the balloons as many as possible with Oris and defeat the evil crocodile!
Clear levels and bring water back for Oris and his friends!
You can take on this delight alone or play with friends and family to see who can get the highest score!

Water Splash features
• Never ending exciting match 3 puzzle game!
: Over 1,000 awesome levels! Updates will be continued!

• What if I match the cross balloon with the color balloon…?
: Match the various types of balloons as many as you can!
If you match more than 4 balloons, you will get a special balloon! You can even crush solid rocks!

• Who is the best match 3 mania?
: Play with friends and see who can get the highest score! If you get the highest score, you are the best match 3 mania!
Can you clear all levels with 3 stars? If you have a mania for match 3 game, challenge now!

• Who moved my candy?
: If you match the balloon with the candy, you will get sweet candies!
Match the candies as many as you can and get special gifts! Candies await you now!

• Go! Rubber Duck! Get rid of all obstacles!
: With the colorful and powerful items, you can get rid of all obstacles such as mini crocodiles, dolphins and rubber cones!

• Whenever, wherever you are, matching must go on!
: You can still enjoy Water Splash without internet access.
Anywhere, anytime, match the balloons!

• App store free download
: Water Splash is free to download and play, however some game items such as extra moves or lives can also be purchased for real money.

• Don’t miss out special gifts!
: If you sign-in to Water Splash via Facebook, you will receive special bonus and find various functions!

If you have a mania for match 3 game,
If you have a mania for puzzle game,
If you have a mania for crush game,
You must play this cool game!

A great way to pass time, Fantastic Matching 3 Adventure, Water Splash!
Are you ready for Water Splash? Like us on Facebook! .io.

https://www.facebook.com/Water-Splash-Community-694392933990759/

Get the new version of Water Splash now! :D
We are adding more levels once every two weeks.
Please wait until then and you should have new levels after you update the App.

comments: Game As you get on in levels you loose connection before and after you finish a level and im getting really frustrated with it. Its also locking my extra bonuses so i cant use coins to use a colour balloon or anything else. Its also freezing sometimes after i finish a level and i have to redo that level even if its been one that i have been on for days or weeks which gets me really angry needs to be fixed or im gonna have to uninstall it as i cant keep having it happen i love the game and want to keep.

Addictive!!! I really like this game and so does my grandson. I had to uninstall it because right in the middle of playing it would stop,  saying sorry but water splash has stopped. It started doing it every time I played. I am installing it again to try. I hope that it is fixed. I just tried playing it and it stopped again right in the middle of playing. Please fix this! I will have to uninstall it again then forget it if it keeps this up.
I really like playing this game but it's a crap shoot everyday to see if it will be reporting. Please fix. Had problems like this last year too. Others I have talked to have had the same problem!
Is there an error on game 1834. I've coloured all the squares blue but it says I still need to cover another 64. There's no more squares left though? Please help
I'm awake a lot as my husband snores like a beast next to me. This game keeps me from putting a pillow over his face so yeah..  2 thumbs up!

Good game but the shortcut isn't working and I need to access game from Google PlayStore. Needs some more tweaking. And why aren't the bombs shovels etc not working. I have several of each but when I click on them the prices comes up instead. Very frustrating!!

results.descriptionHTML:
Return to the underwater adventures once again! Explore sea bottom, hunt, keep your amount of oxygen and unravel secrets with Underwater Survival Simulator – 2!

Be a lonely survivor after Great Flood, lost in the ocean depths only with your aqualung! Fortunately, you find yourself near the underwater military base, but it’s lost and forgotten too, so you should repair broken modules or even builds a new one. Explore the sea bottom to quarry resources and restore this base! “Hunt” fishes, whales and cephalopods to provide you with food and search for the sources of fresh water! And, of course, don’t forget about your level of oxygen – if it drops to zero, you’d die soon!

Fight for your life with underwater predators – they never sleep and would chase yours until death, it's or yours. Find weapons to protect yourself – or craft new one from materials, found over the bottom. Build shelters to prevent attacks of sharks and do your best to survive at all costs with Underwater Survival Simulator - 2!

Watch for your character indicators - health, energy, fullness. If one of these drops – no chance to survive! Especially mind your oxygen level – if it drops to zero, you’d never emerge again! Do all that you can – there is a lot of things you can do here, on the ocean bottom. Earn experience and raise up your skills! Craft weapons and special tools – it would help you to stay alive! Collect different materials – it can be very useful!

Hunt for predators, build shelter & craft tools – feel like a lonely diver with this underwater survival simulator in 3D! Stay alive at all costs! Spending time at the bottom of the ocean is not easy as on the survival island!
Unravel all secrets of the sea bottom, find treasures or hidden weapons and, maybe, the method to leave this place and get home! Be a real survivor with our Underwater Survival Simulator - 2!

Underwater Survival Simulator -2 features:
• Ultimate simulator of aqualunger
• Beautiful of picturesque ocean’s bottom to explore
• Many hidden treasures to ease the survival process
• Crafty opponents – these underwater predators are more dangerous than you could think
• Varies craft recipes - craft weapons and tools ‘cause it can save your life someday

Live the life of aqualunger and keep your weapons alert! Literally dive into the wilderness, explore sea world and fight for your life at the bottom of the ocean with Underwater Survival Simulator – 2!

comments: Ads make game unplayable Fighting a shark, ad kills me, go figure. Wish the programmers would have some pride for their games and have respectable ad content.

Liked it but it's a bit dull I totally liked the game, it was smooth, and fun but its boring. The sea creatures were few and it made it boring. Please make an update that has a lot of different sea creatures and I will really love it if you add sea monsters.

I like it, but.. Why does everything I create in my home base disappear, even when I save? I keep having to rebuild everything I've already built.. Not cool. Also needs more ways of getting food then sharks and whales as those are the only real sea creatures.

has potential Love the idea just needs some work , sharks are a little too easy n you should only get abit of meat, if there was a night n day cycle, a few more things to harvest , a very hard sea monster randomly roaming n the only safe place was the home, I'd love that please update n keep on working on this one, oh n alittle faster swim
Not bad It's a good start, controls are a little hard to master but not a big deal. I hate that ads show up while your playing.
I can't get in. I can't even enter the game. All it shows is that ''POWERED BY UNITY'' thing. Please fix this, as I really want to play this game. It looks like it would be really fun.

results.descriptionHTML:
Beautiful realistic water live wallpaper. Touch a screen of your phone to make ripples and waves. Enjoy watching the water movement.

* Realistic water live wallpaper that reacts to touch
* Touch the screen to add water drops and cause ripples
* Move your finger and make virtual water waves
* Select background from a set of beautiful built-in photos
* Custom background option so you can choose a photo from your own gallery
* Water simulation performance/quality control
* Automatic water drops option to simulate rain
* 100% free and without ads!

To enable the wallpaper, go to:
Home screen -> Menu -> Wallpaper -> Live Wallpapers -> Real Water Live Wallpaper

Remember, the higher the quality, the more battery it consumes.

If you run into any problems, please send me an email. If you have an idea for a new feature, please let me know !

comments: Perfect! This is just what I was looking for. I agree with Kate that a crop feature would be nice to have. However I can live without since this live wallpaper is perfect, I have installed even purchased others and nothing did what I wanted like this one does. It runs and looks amazing on my Galaxy Note 2. If it wasn't free I would definitely purchase this one (Big thanks for having no ads!). Thanks for this great live wallpaper app!!!

This is my personal favorite. Not only is it a truly fluid experience, but the creators were thoughtful enough to allow you the option to choose your own background. A treat for my creative sense and a relaxing screen to interact with. *BONUS* NO OVERLY NOSEY PERMISSIONS!

I agree that it needs a crop feature. The image is almost never centered when chosen. The water effect on the other hand was very well made. The icon dissapeared from my home screen and i had to go searching for it. If you could just put a crop feature on it I'd give it 5 stars

Awesome App so far! There is an icon on the home page, but if you delete it, it can be hard to find, so be careful.  Effects are top notch and the #2 graphics setting looks real.  I don't see any battery drain.or performance lag.

Beautiful and simple Can use custom background, no ads (that I saw), and the water flows naturally. I haven't used it long enough to test battery life. So far so good. Thanks for developing a quality app!

Custumization I love this and that it is free. My only problem is that it doesn't allow tp choose reflection from sides. I want my ripples to go off the screen like the ocean not bounce back like an aquariom Thank you. :)

results.descriptionHTML:
The free Fitbit app is designed to work with Fitbit activity trackers and smart scales.

GET ACTIVE. EAT BETTER. MANAGE WEIGHT. SLEEP BETTER.

- Wirelessly SYNC your Blaze, Alta, Charge 2, Flex 2, Surge, Charge HR, Charge, Flex, Aria, One or Zip tracker with your Android device.
- Track your DAILY GOALS and progress over time for STEPS, DISTANCE, CALORIES BURNED and more
- Use GPS to track your RUNS, WALKS & HIKES
- LOG ACTIVITIES like YOGA and WORKOUTS to keep you on track
- LOG FOOD to see how many CALORIES you consume each day, and manage your WEIGHT over time
- COMPETE with FRIENDS with daily or weekly CHALLENGES and compare stats
- ALL DAY HEART RATE TRACKING with Fitbit Surge and Charge HR

Learn more about Fitbit activity trackers and smart scales at www.fitbit.com
See list of supported devices at www.fitbit.com/devices

comments: I just got my Charge 2 a few days ago, and I love it. It syncs up quickly aswell. Everything is pretty acurate and works as it should. I only have 2 little problems. Sometimes, when tracking my sleep, it will say that the first/last part of me sleeping was being awake. How, I don't even know. Also, with the number of floors. I live in a bungalow. If I am not well, but want to keep moving, I can't achieve number of floors, because I don't have any. I don't know how you would fix this, but it's great otherwise.

I'm disabled and often don't feel well. I used to be very active riding my bike 25 Miles a day or walking 6-7 miles a day. I did dance videos or work out videos so this lifestyle is very different. There are 2 major reasons why I like this 1st it helps to see I'm doing something! 2nd on the days I'm not showing even a mile walked I can see I met a goal of water intake which helps with my self-esteem. Also I can go back and say to the doc, hey I wasn't feeling good this day or that because I can see my activity wasn't where it normally was. It's easy to understand. It was easy to sync with my phone. I'm very pleased. One last note I had something very close to this with WW and I loved it but you have to pay to use theirs. If you buy it  it definitely will help whether you are an exercise junky or just trying to improve your mindset.

I would definitely recommend this app as it can tell you what friends have got in their daily steps and can see if you have beaten them or not! It also tells you what your average amount of steps are throughout the week along with calories, sleeping and how many stairs you have gone up! I also like the way everything is set out and it looks great! 👍

Worked great for one month before the calorie tracking section starting freezing the app and it stopped showing my "in" calories. The only way i can enter them is the quick add. The other methods cause it to freeze. Then, despite what I add, I says I have eaten zero calories. Other parts of the app work great. Please fix this.

Had my charge hr since Christmas 2015, been fantastic in helping me improve fitness, linked it with My Fitness Pal app, together they are great. HOWEVER, just installed the latest bug fix update and now my charge HR is not found! Keeps saying "Looking". I've never had this before. Please fix this.

New dashboard tiles don't update to reflect daily activity as you navigate back to past days.  These tiles only reflect current days activity.  Old dashboard works as expected so just a problem with new dashboard. Makes it useless to track progress towards goals over time.  Once fixed I will update rating.  Also syncing is more tedious and doesn't always work, syncing should be more steady.

results.descriptionHTML:
Dolphin Live Wallpaper allows you to feast your eyes on these lovely and playful sea animals while they play around and put on the cutest show on the planet. You will almost be able to hear the magical dolphin music while you gaze at a beautiful sunset in the sky – just tap on your phone or tablet screen and see more joyous dolphins jumping together. The sight is truly marvelous! Breathtaking images capturing the magic of the dolphin show can be yours for free – just download this cool wallpaper and watch them leap in and out of the ocean water.

- Greatest LWP for Android™!
- Keep tapping on the screen and new pictures will appear!
- Full support for landscape mode and home-screen switching!
- This animated background is your best choice!
Follow the installation instructions:
Home -> Menu -> Wallpapers -> Live Wallpapers
Motion of flashes and lights keeps changing with time.
- You can choose from several different themes.
- HD graphics and open GL.
- Optimized Battery Usage.
- Compatible with 99% mobile phone devices.
- Dolphin Live Wallpaper fully supports horizontal orientation and looks amazing on tablet devices as well as on phones.

These highly intelligent and social mammals will brighten up any day and cheer you up as soon as you see their adorable stunts and tricks. See an adorable bottlenose dolphin, or some wild animals from the delphinidae family, like the porpoise, or even the “killer whale” swimming in the crystal clear water– the choice is up to you. Discover unique “Dolphin Backgrounds” depicting magnificent sunsets that mirror in the still water surface disturbed only by gentle waves and the splash of dolphins' cute fins and flippers. A feeling of serenity will overwhelm you as if you were in a zen garden! Get the front seat to the “sea world” show with this stunning “live wallpaper” and swim with the dolphins under the sea whenever you desire. Have you always wanted to take dolphin pictures from up close and to capture their playful nature in an image? “Dolphin Live Wallpaper” to the rescue! The gorgeous Irrawaddy dolphin and many other species can beautify your phone or tablet screen for free right now. This “free download” is so much fun – just tap on the screen and the dolphin games may begin! All you need to do is to pick one of the cute backgrounds this free live wallpaper offers and beautify your new Galaxy mobile phone for free. A heavenly day starts with a divine sight of sea life! Beautiful dolphins can cover your whole screen with their adorable beaks if you keep tapping on it! This wonderful app for Android™ is ideal both for boys and girls – everybody adores cute ocean animals that seem to be happy all the time. There is no other nature wallpaper like this one – so vividly colored and lively, it will relax and impress you at the same time. Witness the lapping of the white-crested waves and discover this magnificent animal jumping sky high and meeting with the vast blue sky joyfully. You do not have to go to the zoo to see these sea beauties swim in an aquarium anymore – just download new “Dolphin Wallpaper” free of charge and swim along. This background wallpaper will take you to the best adventure under water; just give it a try, it's better than snorkeling! Anchors away!


*Android is a trademark of Google Inc.

results.descriptionHTML:
This is the ocean adventure you’ve been waiting for! From the creators of Flutter comes Splash, the spectacular new game that challenges you to restore life to a beautiful underwater world.

As a reef caretaker, the fate of a vibrant and diverse ecosystem is in your hands. With the population of the ocean dwindling, you must raise and release a multitude of species to repopulate and fill it with life. Along the way be sure to keep your Aquapedia handy, as you’ll document exciting real-life facts about each species you uncover. Watch in wonder as your sanctuary comes to life, teeming with creatures that are both visually stunning and unique in personality and behavior.

So take the plunge! Splash is overflowing with eye-catching fish, beautiful ocean environments and relaxing gameplay that is sure to keep you entertained for hours to come.

KEY FEATURES:
- Not an Aquarium. Build a bustling coral reef of fish and coral
- Discover a huge range of real world species from Angelfish and Lionfish to Seahorses and Jellyfish
- Collect spectacular decorations to adorn and power-up your environment
- Catalogue your discoveries and learn more about the ocean in the Aquapedia
- Release fully grown fish into the wild to repopulate the great ocean
- Level up to unlock more fish, decorations, and space for your reef
- Play with your new ocean friends, guiding them through the reef and observing their quirky interactions with each other
- Connect with friends to exchange gifts and help each other along your journey
- With the new Splash-Cam you can become an underwater photographer and take snaps of your favorite fish
results.title: Splash: Underwater Sanctuary
results.summary: Repopulate a coral reef by discovering and photographing species of fish!
recentChanges: This new update increases the level cap to 45, and adds a bunch of new content for longtime Splash players!
- Discover the incredible Royal Angelfish set. A new core set of 6 species.
- Unlock the new Barnacle and Starfish characters at levels 44 & 45. Both characters are permanent additions to your sanctuary and each one has a special ability!
- The Decoration Placement menu has finally had a massive overhaul and is now way more user-friendly!

comments: Adorable, and educational. Its a win! I can even incorporate it into my homeschooling curriculum for ocean science a bit.                                                            Only thing is can only connect with friends through Facebook, I don't have a  Facebook account and don't want one. For me this is the only problem, and occasionally the game pausing.

Love it so far,  but every time my phone goes to sleep when this is open,  my phone freezes,  and stutters after I type in my password.  It will only work and unlock properly after Splash crashes.  Help?
Looked great but gave me error code whenever tried to start tutorial even reloaded and uninstalled with fresh reinstall to see if would help no luck.
Really like this game, but if i turn my phone screen off while playing when i turn it back in i get "not responding" message. Please fix
I love the game but im giving a bad review because the app wont load it say it loading but it never will, please fix this I really enjoyed the game
Don't do the Fyber's offers, they don't reward you and then CS says they do. Runaway, love the game, change to Tapjoy. They honor completed tasks.

results.descriptionHTML:
Best of 2016 App, Top Trending App and Best Self-Improvement App selected by Google Play.

Water Drink Reminder reminds you to drink enough water. Proper hydration keeps your skin healthy and helps you lose weight.
Featured by Google Play! No.1 heath app over 30 countries, top 5 over 90 countries! The best water tracker app ever! Helps you stay hydrated.

GOOGLE PLAY AWARD: TOP DEVELOPER
The Water Drink Reminder now supports Google Fit

Do you drink enough water?
Do you always forget to drink water regularly?
Are you in good shape?
You need Water Drink Reminder - a water tracker app to help you develop good habits of water drinking!

This water tracker app reminds you to drink water every day to keep you hydrated.

Just enter your current weight, and Water Drink Reminder will help you determine how much water your body needs every day. Remember to update the app each time you drink a cup of water. Then the app will remind you when it's time for another drink. Hydration helper not only tracks what you drink, but also reminds you when it's time for another drink.

The benefits of drinking water:
* Stay in shape and keep fit; water is calorie free
* Clears up your skin
* Keeps your skin and nails healthy
* Helps prevent kidney stones
* Keeps you hydrated

Key Features include:
* Water tracker that will remind you when and how much water to drink throughout the day
* Customized cup and standard (oz) or metric (ml) units
* You can set your start and end time to drink water for each day
* Graph and logs of your schedule
* Syncs weight data with Google Fit.
* Syncs weight and drink water data with S Health.
* You can login through your Google account.
* You can backup and restore your drinking data through the water tracker.

In our day-to day life, drinking water regularly can be challenging, despite its numerous health benefits. This water tracker app makes it easier to stay hydrated. It may even help you lose weight and prevent certain illnesses.

Water Drink Reminder is a secure app. Please contact us if you have any security questions.

Water Drink Reminder Pro version: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.northpark.drinkwaterpro&referrer=utm_source%3DWater_Free

comments: This app is very user friendly.  It is very intuitive and has a short learning curve.   Changing water sizes is very quick and  easy and shows different shapes.  I have added two new ones and removed others. You can check hot Weather or Sports to have the app increase the water target .   The weight reporting is great for me, and shows a graph and an Average Weight line.  You can also add or edit previous days.   You can set vibrate and/or tones for reminders, or none at all. Any number of reminders can be set at any time of the day.   The app is fast and very stable. Highly recommended!

Excelente app! The best water remind in my opinion! Simple,  clever, easy to understand,  easy to use. One of the things I really like is when I drink minutes before the alarm goes, the app doesn't remind me again unnecessarily ( like the others water reminders I had before what was annoying). That's why as well this one is my favourite! Thank you for such very useful app! 👍

It's an awesome app, helps me keep my water intake up as  never drank water do to being a pepsiholic for 40 years. Best app I've ever had on my cell phone. Because I drink more water my bowel problems are gone and I'm so happy. Thank you for making this app.

I'm a kidney stoner and have gotten myself in trouble by getting dehydrated and drinking the wrong things *cough Cherry Coke cough*.  This app is easy to use and love that it works so well with Android wear.  It really helps me make sure I'm drinking enough water, and hopefully I will be able to keep the stone at bay.

It used to be my the most frequently used app. I liked the design and idea. But something changed in recent version. It is so sloooooow now. It connects with the server every time I log another cup of water. So frustrating...

Great app! You can easily put pre-set default drink sizes like coffees tea, glass of water, big bottle and so on, you can customise the default drink sizes and if you don't want any notification (like me) because you use it not as remainder but as a drinking counter you can turn them all off and still track your intake, lobe the fact that you can easily modify the daily target with buttons like sport and weather that will add up for you the extra required intake.  Best of all is free! Few ads but thankfully different than most of free apps on android the amount of time ads pop on screen is really limited, I use it a lot and I barely encounter ads.  Great app! Tried other drinking trackers but this is one is above all! I normally don't bother with reviews but they do deserve one as they made a great free app and also they kept the in app ads to a minimum.  Well done!

If you want to know the life under the sea, you should get this 3D fish wallpaper right now! Ocean pictures that this app for Android™ brings will blow your mind! Look into the eyes of a shark without fear – you will see the cool backgrounds that you have dreamed of! Feel like a king of all the oceans on the planet and share this great app with your friends! Enjoy this free download!*Android is a trademark of Google Inc.

milestones.description: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services, in particular forests, wetlands, mountains and drylands, in line with obligations under international agreements
By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally
By 2030, combat desertification, restore degraded land and soil, including land affected by desertification, drought and floods, and strive to achieve a land degradation-neutral world
By 2030, ensure the conservation of mountain ecosystems, including their biodiversity, in order to enhance their capacity to provide benefits that are essential for sustainable development
Take urgent and significant action to reduce the degradation of natural habitats, halt the loss of biodiversity and, by 2020, protect and prevent the extinction of threatened species
Promote fair and equitable sharing of the benefits arising from the utilization of genetic resources and promote appropriate access to such resources, as internationally agreed
Take urgent action to end poaching and trafficking of protected species of flora and fauna and address both demand and supply of illegal wildlife products
By 2020, introduce measures to prevent the introduction and significantly reduce the impact of invasive alien species on land and water ecosystems and control or eradicate the priority species
By 2020, integrate ecosystem and biodiversity values into national and local planning, development processes, poverty reduction strategies and accounts
Mobilize and significantly increase financial resources from all sources to conserve and sustainably use biodiversity and ecosystems

Mobilize significant resources from all sources and at all levels to finance sustainable forest management and provide adequate incentives to developing countries to advance such management, including for conservation and reforestation
Enhance global support for efforts to combat poaching and trafficking of protected species, including by increasing the capacity of local communities to pursue sustainable livelihood opportunities

results.descriptionHTML:
A safe community built specially for boys and girls, LEGO® Life is 100% free to download and 100% fun to use. Conquer LEGO challenges, watch LEGO videos, get LEGO news, find new LEGO sets and see creations from other LEGO fans. It’s all in a day of LEGO Life!

Be inspired!
• LEGO Life is full of fun, inspiring, awesome and cool stuff. And it’s all yours.
• Check out images of what others are building – then try them out with your own LEGO bricks!
• Share images of your genius creations.
• Get the latest LEGO news about LEGO DIMENSIONS™, LEGO City, LEGO Friends, and more.

Be challenged!
• Stretch your building skills and free your imagination with LEGO challenges.
• Test your knowledge with LEGO quizzes about LEGO City, LEGO NINJAGO®, LEGO Elves, and more.
• Get stuck into arty sticker activities featuring the best LEGO images, like Batman™ from LEGO DIMENSIONS.

Watch LEGO videos!
• Chill out with mini movies and webisodes from LEGO Elves, LEGO Friends, LEGO City, LEGO NINJAGO and LEGO NEXO KNIGHTS™.
• Go behind the scenes and watch LEGO videos featuring LEGO sets and LEGO characters like Kai from LEGO NINJAGO, Stephanie from LEGO Friends, Merlok 2.0 from LEGO NEXO KNIGHTS, Emily Jones from LEGO Elves, and Batman from LEGO DIMENSIONS.
• Learn more about your favorite LEGO ninja like Lloyd, Zane, Master Wu or Cole with LEGO NINJAGO videos.
• Get closer to the LEGO Friends with LEGO videos about Stephanie, Olivia, Emma, Mia, Andrea, and Livi.
• Power up to become a hero with LEGO videos featuring Robin, Jestro, Aaron, Lance, and Macy from LEGO NEXO KNIGHTS.
• Uncover the magical world of LEGO Elves with LEGO videos about Emily Jones, Skyra, Ragana, and Elandra.

Upgrade for free!
Get a LEGO ID account, and then sign in to enjoy all of LEGO Life:
• Buddy-up with LEGO minifigures like Aaron from LEGO NEXO KNIGHTS, Emma from LEGO Friends and Master Wu from LEGO NINJAGO by following their profile and liking their posts!
• Design your own awesome LEGO minifigure for your profile, choosing between tons of cool outfit combinations.
• Join fan groups and get the latest LEGO news for the stuff you love.
• Discover even more about your favorite free LEGO games and apps.
Important information
• The LEGO Life app is FREE to download.
• It’s suitable from 5 years and up, but kids and tweens aged between 8-12 are likely to enjoy it the most.
• There’s no third-party advertising. LEGO marketing content and information is served, for instance LEGO news about LEGO sets and other LEGO games, in hope of inspiring children’s creative play.

The LEGO Group is dedicated to making LEGO Life safe:
- To fully enjoy the app, kids need a parent or guardian’s permission to create a LEGO ID account.
- Kids use a display name when commenting or liking content.
- All user comments are moderated.
- Direct chatting is prohibited.
- Images revealing personally identifiable information are rejected.

As part of the LEGO ID sign-up, we will collect the following information:
- The country in which you live
- Your email address

We’ll utilize your personal information and anonymous data to manage your account and to provide a safe, contextualized, and excellent LEGO Life experience. You can learn more here http://aboutus.lego.com/legal-notice/Privacy-Policy and here http://aboutus.lego.com/en-us/legal-notice/terms-of-use-for-apps

When you upload a picture or a comment to LEGO Life, it becomes part of our app. That means it becomes the property of the LEGO Group. It also means that we own the rights to your picture, the way you have presented your model, your suggestions, comments or questions (your “Material”). The LEGO Group has the right to use your Material for any purpose whatsoever, without compensation.
Our privacy policy and terms of use for apps are accepted if you download this app.
LEGO, the LEGO logo, the Brick and Knob configurations and the Minifigure are trademarks of the LEGO Group. ©2017 The LEGO Group.

results.descriptionHTML:
Welcome to the Land of Magic! Find hidden objects while exploring magical lands, featuring fantastic castles and giant mushrooms!

Free Play
Choose exactly how you want to search for items. Find items by their Picture, Silhouette, Word, or Random combination. Play Casual rounds with no time pressure, or more challenging timed modes.

Campaign Mode
Challenge yourself to complete the map of 200 beautiful levels with increasing difficulty. Hunt for hidden objects in a variety of ways, play timed levels, and fun bonus rounds.

HD Images with Zoom
Images are in beautiful HD with some objects courtesy of scrapbookgraphics.com and Lorie Davison. Zoom and pan the images, tap on the search objects to enlarge them.

Coins and Daily Reward
Use coins earned while completing levels to unlock more content. Try your luck in the Daily Reward for bonus coins!

Mini Games
Have fun and earn extra coins by playing the Match 3 and Memory Mini Games.

3D Art Gallery
Images are brought to life with subtle 3D effects as you tilt your device!

And much more!
Hints available for when you get stuck, 3-star ratings and highscores, change your avatar, plus lots more!

Start your magical adventure today!
